      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1360"></td>
        <td id="LC1360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1361"></td>
        <td id="LC1361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;All this she must possess,&quot; added Darcy, &quot;and to all this she must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1362"></td>
        <td id="LC1362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet add something more substantial, in the improvement of her mind by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1363"></td>
        <td id="LC1363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extensive reading.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1364"></td>
        <td id="LC1364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1365"></td>
        <td id="LC1365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am no longer surprised at your knowing _only_ six accomplished women.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1366"></td>
        <td id="LC1366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I rather wonder now at your knowing _any_.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1367"></td>
        <td id="LC1367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1368"></td>
        <td id="LC1368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Are you so severe upon your own sex as to doubt the possibility of all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1369"></td>
        <td id="LC1369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1370"></td>
        <td id="LC1370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1371"></td>
        <td id="LC1371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I never saw such a woman. I never saw such capacity, and taste, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1372"></td>
        <td id="LC1372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">application, and elegance, as you describe united.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1373"></td>
        <td id="LC1373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1374"></td>
        <td id="LC1374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Hurst and Miss Bingley both cried out against the injustice of her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1375"></td>
        <td id="LC1375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">implied doubt, and were both protesting that they knew many women who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1376"></td>
        <td id="LC1376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered this description, when Mr. Hurst called them to order, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1377"></td>
        <td id="LC1377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bitter complaints of their inattention to what was going forward. As all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1378"></td>
        <td id="LC1378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation was thereby at an end, Elizabeth soon afterwards left the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1379"></td>
        <td id="LC1379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room.</td>

        <td id="L1380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1380"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1381"></td>
        <td id="LC1381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Elizabeth Bennet,&quot; said Miss Bingley, when the door was closed on her,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1382"></td>
        <td id="LC1382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;is one of those young ladies who seek to recommend themselves to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1383"></td>
        <td id="LC1383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other sex by undervaluing their own; and with many men, I dare say, it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1384"></td>
        <td id="LC1384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">succeeds. But, in my opinion, it is a paltry device, a very mean art.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1385"></td>
        <td id="LC1385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1386"></td>
        <td id="LC1386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Undoubtedly,&quot; replied Darcy, to whom this remark was chiefly addressed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1387"></td>
        <td id="LC1387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;there is a meanness in _all_ the arts which ladies sometimes condescend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1388"></td>
        <td id="LC1388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to employ for captivation. Whatever bears affinity to cunning is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1389"></td>
        <td id="LC1389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">despicable.&quot;</td>

        <td id="L1390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1390"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1391"></td>
        <td id="LC1391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Bingley was not so entirely satisfied with this reply as to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1392"></td>
        <td id="LC1392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continue the subject.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1393"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1394"></td>
        <td id="LC1394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth joined them again only to say that her sister was worse, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1395"></td>
        <td id="LC1395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that she could not leave her. Bingley urged Mr. Jones being sent for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1396"></td>
        <td id="LC1396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immediately; while his sisters, convinced that no country advice could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1397"></td>
        <td id="LC1397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be of any service, recommended an express to town for one of the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1398"></td>
        <td id="LC1398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eminent physicians. This she would not hear of; but she was not so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1399"></td>
        <td id="LC1399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unwilling to comply with their brother&#39;s proposal; and it was settled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1400"></td>
        <td id="LC1400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Mr. Jones should be sent for early in the morning, if Miss Bennet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1401"></td>
        <td id="LC1401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were not decidedly better. Bingley was quite uncomfortable; his sisters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1402"></td>
        <td id="LC1402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">declared that they were miserable. They solaced their wretchedness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1403"></td>
        <td id="LC1403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, by duets after supper, while he could find no better relief</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1404"></td>
        <td id="LC1404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to his feelings than by giving his housekeeper directions that every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1405"></td>
        <td id="LC1405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attention might be paid to the sick lady and her sister.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1406"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1407"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1408"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1409"></td>
        <td id="LC1409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chapter 9</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1410"></td>
        <td id="LC1410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1411"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1412"></td>
        <td id="LC1412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth passed the chief of the night in her sister&#39;s room, and in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1413"></td>
        <td id="LC1413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning had the pleasure of being able to send a tolerable answer to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1414"></td>
        <td id="LC1414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inquiries which she very early received from Mr. Bingley by a housemaid,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1415"></td>
        <td id="LC1415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and some time afterwards from the two elegant ladies who waited on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1416"></td>
        <td id="LC1416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sisters. In spite of this amendment, however, she requested to have a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1417"></td>
        <td id="LC1417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">note sent to Longbourn, desiring her mother to visit Jane, and form her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1418"></td>
        <td id="LC1418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own judgement of her situation. The note was immediately dispatched, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1419"></td>
        <td id="LC1419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its contents as quickly complied with. Mrs. Bennet, accompanied by her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1420"></td>
        <td id="LC1420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two youngest girls, reached Netherfield soon after the family breakfast.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1421"></td>
        <td id="LC1421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1422"></td>
        <td id="LC1422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Had she found Jane in any apparent danger, Mrs. Bennet would have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1423"></td>
        <td id="LC1423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very miserable; but being satisfied on seeing her that her illness was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1424"></td>
        <td id="LC1424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not alarming, she had no wish of her recovering immediately, as her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1425"></td>
        <td id="LC1425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">restoration to health would probably remove her from Netherfield. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1426"></td>
        <td id="LC1426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would not listen, therefore, to her daughter&#39;s proposal of being carried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1427"></td>
        <td id="LC1427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">home; neither did the apothecary, who arrived about the same time, think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1428"></td>
        <td id="LC1428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it at all advisable. After sitting a little while with Jane, on Miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1429"></td>
        <td id="LC1429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bingley&#39;s appearance and invitation, the mother and three daughters all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1430"></td>
        <td id="LC1430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attended her into the breakfast parlour. Bingley met them with hopes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1431"></td>
        <td id="LC1431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Mrs. Bennet had not found Miss Bennet worse than she expected.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1432"></td>
        <td id="LC1432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1433"></td>
        <td id="LC1433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Indeed I have, sir,&quot; was her answer. &quot;She is a great deal too ill to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1434"></td>
        <td id="LC1434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moved. Mr. Jones says we must not think of moving her. We must trespass</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1435"></td>
        <td id="LC1435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a little longer on your kindness.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1436"></td>
        <td id="LC1436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1437"></td>
        <td id="LC1437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Removed!&quot; cried Bingley. &quot;It must not be thought of. My sister, I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1438"></td>
        <td id="LC1438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sure, will not hear of her removal.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1439"></td>
        <td id="LC1439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1440"></td>
        <td id="LC1440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You may depend upon it, Madam,&quot; said Miss Bingley, with cold civility,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1441"></td>
        <td id="LC1441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;that Miss Bennet will receive every possible attention while she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1442"></td>
        <td id="LC1442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remains with us.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1443"></td>
        <td id="LC1443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1444"></td>
        <td id="LC1444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Bennet was profuse in her acknowledgments.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1445"></td>
        <td id="LC1445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1446"></td>
        <td id="LC1446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am sure,&quot; she added, &quot;if it was not for such good friends I do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1447"></td>
        <td id="LC1447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know what would become of her, for she is very ill indeed, and suffers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1448"></td>
        <td id="LC1448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a vast deal, though with the greatest patience in the world, which is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1449"></td>
        <td id="LC1449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always the way with her, for she has, without exception, the sweetest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1450"></td>
        <td id="LC1450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">temper I have ever met with. I often tell my other girls they are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1451"></td>
        <td id="LC1451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing to _her_. You have a sweet room here, Mr. Bingley, and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1452"></td>
        <td id="LC1452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charming prospect over the gravel walk. I do not know a place in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1453"></td>
        <td id="LC1453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country that is equal to Netherfield. You will not think of quitting it</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1547"></td>
        <td id="LC1547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did not. Perhaps he thought her too young. However, he wrote some verses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1548"></td>
        <td id="LC1548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on her, and very pretty they were.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1549"></td>
        <td id="LC1549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1550"></td>
        <td id="LC1550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And so ended his affection,&quot; said Elizabeth impatiently. &quot;There has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1551"></td>
        <td id="LC1551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been many a one, I fancy, overcome in the same way. I wonder who first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1552"></td>
        <td id="LC1552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discovered the efficacy of poetry in driving away love!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1553"></td>
        <td id="LC1553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1554"></td>
        <td id="LC1554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have been used to consider poetry as the _food_ of love,&quot; said Darcy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1555"></td>
        <td id="LC1555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1556"></td>
        <td id="LC1556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Of a fine, stout, healthy love it may. Everything nourishes what is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1557"></td>
        <td id="LC1557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strong already. But if it be only a slight, thin sort of inclination, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1558"></td>
        <td id="LC1558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am convinced that one good sonnet will starve it entirely away.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1559"></td>
        <td id="LC1559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1560"></td>
        <td id="LC1560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darcy only smiled; and the general pause which ensued made Elizabeth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1561"></td>
        <td id="LC1561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tremble lest her mother should be exposing herself again. She longed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1562"></td>
        <td id="LC1562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speak, but could think of nothing to say; and after a short silence Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1563"></td>
        <td id="LC1563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bennet began repeating her thanks to Mr. Bingley for his kindness to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1564"></td>
        <td id="LC1564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jane, with an apology for troubling him also with Lizzy. Mr. Bingley was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1565"></td>
        <td id="LC1565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unaffectedly civil in his answer, and forced his younger sister to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1566"></td>
        <td id="LC1566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">civil also, and say what the occasion required. She performed her part</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1567"></td>
        <td id="LC1567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indeed without much graciousness, but Mrs. Bennet was satisfied, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1568"></td>
        <td id="LC1568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soon afterwards ordered her carriage. Upon this signal, the youngest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1569"></td>
        <td id="LC1569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her daughters put herself forward. The two girls had been whispering to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1570"></td>
        <td id="LC1570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">each other during the whole visit, and the result of it was, that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1571"></td>
        <td id="LC1571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">youngest should tax Mr. Bingley with having promised on his first coming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1572"></td>
        <td id="LC1572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the country to give a ball at Netherfield.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1573"></td>
        <td id="LC1573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1574"></td>
        <td id="LC1574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lydia was a stout, well-grown girl of fifteen, with a fine complexion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1575"></td>
        <td id="LC1575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and good-humoured countenance; a favourite with her mother, whose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1576"></td>
        <td id="LC1576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affection had brought her into public at an early age. She had high</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1577"></td>
        <td id="LC1577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animal spirits, and a sort of natural self-consequence, which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1578"></td>
        <td id="LC1578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attention of the officers, to whom her uncle&#39;s good dinners, and her own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1579"></td>
        <td id="LC1579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">easy manners recommended her, had increased into assurance. She was very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1580"></td>
        <td id="LC1580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">equal, therefore, to address Mr. Bingley on the subject of the ball, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1581"></td>
        <td id="LC1581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">abruptly reminded him of his promise; adding, that it would be the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1582"></td>
        <td id="LC1582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shameful thing in the world if he did not keep it. His answer to this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1583"></td>
        <td id="LC1583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sudden attack was delightful to their mother&#39;s ear:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1584"></td>
        <td id="LC1584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1585"></td>
        <td id="LC1585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am perfectly ready, I assure you, to keep my engagement; and when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1586"></td>
        <td id="LC1586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your sister is recovered, you shall, if you please, name the very day of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1587"></td>
        <td id="LC1587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ball. But you would not wish to be dancing when she is ill.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1588"></td>
        <td id="LC1588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1589"></td>
        <td id="LC1589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lydia declared herself satisfied. &quot;Oh! yes--it would be much better to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1590"></td>
        <td id="LC1590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wait till Jane was well, and by that time most likely Captain Carter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1591"></td>
        <td id="LC1591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be at Meryton again. And when you have given _your_ ball,&quot; she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1592"></td>
        <td id="LC1592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">added, &quot;I shall insist on their giving one also. I shall tell Colonel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1593"></td>
        <td id="LC1593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Forster it will be quite a shame if he does not.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1594"></td>
        <td id="LC1594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1595"></td>
        <td id="LC1595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Bennet and her daughters then departed, and Elizabeth returned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1596"></td>
        <td id="LC1596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instantly to Jane, leaving her own and her relations&#39; behaviour to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1597"></td>
        <td id="LC1597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remarks of the two ladies and Mr. Darcy; the latter of whom, however,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1598"></td>
        <td id="LC1598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not be prevailed on to join in their censure of _her_, in spite of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1599"></td>
        <td id="LC1599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all Miss Bingley&#39;s witticisms on _fine eyes_.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1600"></td>
        <td id="LC1600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1601"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1602"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1603"></td>
        <td id="LC1603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chapter 10</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1604"></td>
        <td id="LC1604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1605"></td>
        <td id="LC1605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1606"></td>
        <td id="LC1606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The day passed much as the day before had done. Mrs. Hurst and Miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1607"></td>
        <td id="LC1607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bingley had spent some hours of the morning with the invalid, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1608"></td>
        <td id="LC1608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continued, though slowly, to mend; and in the evening Elizabeth joined</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1609"></td>
        <td id="LC1609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their party in the drawing-room. The loo-table, however, did not appear.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1610"></td>
        <td id="LC1610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Darcy was writing, and Miss Bingley, seated near him, was watching</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1611"></td>
        <td id="LC1611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the progress of his letter and repeatedly calling off his attention by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1612"></td>
        <td id="LC1612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">messages to his sister. Mr. Hurst and Mr. Bingley were at piquet, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1613"></td>
        <td id="LC1613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Hurst was observing their game.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1614"></td>
        <td id="LC1614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1615"></td>
        <td id="LC1615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth took up some needlework, and was sufficiently amused in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1616"></td>
        <td id="LC1616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attending to what passed between Darcy and his companion. The perpetual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1617"></td>
        <td id="LC1617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">commendations of the lady, either on his handwriting, or on the evenness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1618"></td>
        <td id="LC1618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his lines, or on the length of his letter, with the perfect unconcern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1619"></td>
        <td id="LC1619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with which her praises were received, formed a curious dialogue, and was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1620"></td>
        <td id="LC1620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exactly in union with her opinion of each.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1621"></td>
        <td id="LC1621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1622"></td>
        <td id="LC1622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How delighted Miss Darcy will be to receive such a letter!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1623"></td>
        <td id="LC1623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1624"></td>
        <td id="LC1624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He made no answer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1625"></td>
        <td id="LC1625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1626"></td>
        <td id="LC1626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You write uncommonly fast.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1627"></td>
        <td id="LC1627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1628"></td>
        <td id="LC1628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You are mistaken. I write rather slowly.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1629"></td>
        <td id="LC1629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1630"></td>
        <td id="LC1630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How many letters you must have occasion to write in the course of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1631"></td>
        <td id="LC1631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">year! Letters of business, too! How odious I should think them!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1632"></td>
        <td id="LC1632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1633"></td>
        <td id="LC1633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It is fortunate, then, that they fall to my lot instead of yours.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1634"></td>
        <td id="LC1634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1635"></td>
        <td id="LC1635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Pray tell your sister that I long to see her.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1636"></td>
        <td id="LC1636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1637"></td>
        <td id="LC1637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have already told her so once, by your desire.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1638"></td>
        <td id="LC1638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1639"></td>
        <td id="LC1639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am afraid you do not like your pen. Let me mend it for you. I mend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1640"></td>

        <td id="LC1734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;To yield readily--easily--to the _persuasion_ of a friend is no merit</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1735"></td>
        <td id="LC1735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with you.&quot;</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1737"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1740"></td>
        <td id="LC1740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You appear to me, Mr. Darcy, to allow nothing for the influence of</td>

        <td id="LC1826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Bingley saw, or suspected enough to be jealous; and her great</td>

        <td id="L1827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1827"></td>
        <td id="LC1827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anxiety for the recovery of her dear friend Jane received some</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1922"></td>
        <td id="LC1922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">question, and read on. At length, quite exhausted by the attempt to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1923"></td>
        <td id="LC1923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amused with her own book, which she had only chosen because it was the</td>

        <td id="L1925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1925"></td>
        <td id="LC1925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is to spend an evening in this way! I declare after all there is no</td>

        <td id="L1926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1926"></td>
        <td id="LC1926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enjoyment like reading! How much sooner one tires of anything than of a</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2009"></td>
        <td id="LC2009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Miss Bingley,&quot; said he, &quot;has given me more credit than can be.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2010"></td>
        <td id="LC2010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wisest and the best of men--nay, the wisest and best of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2011"></td>
        <td id="LC2011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">actions--may be rendered ridiculous by a person whose first object in</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2012"></td>
        <td id="LC2012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life is a joke.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2013"></td>
        <td id="LC2013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2014"></td>
        <td id="LC2014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Certainly,&quot; replied Elizabeth--&quot;there are such people, but I hope I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2015"></td>
        <td id="LC2015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am not one of _them_. I hope I never ridicule what is wise and good.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2016"></td>
        <td id="LC2016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Follies and nonsense, whims and inconsistencies, _do_ divert me, I own,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2017"></td>
        <td id="LC2017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I laugh at them whenever I can. But these, I suppose, are precisely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2102"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On Sunday, after morning service, the separation, so agreeable to almost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2112"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2205"></td>
        <td id="LC2205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bennet.&#39;--My mind, however, is now made up on the subject, for having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2206"></td>
        <td id="LC2206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received ordination at Easter, I have been so fortunate as to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2207"></td>
        <td id="LC2207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distinguished by the patronage of the Right Honourable Lady Catherine de</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2208"></td>
        <td id="LC2208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bourgh, widow of Sir Lewis de Bourgh, whose bounty and beneficence has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2209"></td>
        <td id="LC2209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preferred me to the valuable rectory of this parish, where it shall be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2210"></td>
        <td id="LC2210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my earnest endeavour to demean myself with grateful respect towards her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2211"></td>
        <td id="LC2211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ladyship, and be ever ready to perform those rites and ceremonies which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2212"></td>
        <td id="LC2212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are instituted by the Church of England. As a clergyman, moreover, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2213"></td>
        <td id="LC2213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel it my duty to promote and establish the blessing of peace in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2214"></td>
        <td id="LC2214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all families within the reach of my influence; and on these grounds I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2215"></td>
        <td id="LC2215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flatter myself that my present overtures are highly commendable, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2216"></td>
        <td id="LC2216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the circumstance of my being next in the entail of Longbourn estate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2217"></td>
        <td id="LC2217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be kindly overlooked on your side, and not lead you to reject the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2218"></td>
        <td id="LC2218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offered olive-branch. I cannot be otherwise than concerned at being the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2219"></td>
        <td id="LC2219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">means of injuring your amiable daughters, and beg leave to apologise for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2220"></td>
        <td id="LC2220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, as well as to assure you of my readiness to make them every possible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2221"></td>
        <td id="LC2221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amends--but of this hereafter. If you should have no objection to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2222"></td>
        <td id="LC2222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">receive me into your house, I propose myself the satisfaction of waiting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2223"></td>
        <td id="LC2223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on you and your family, Monday, November 18th, by four o&#39;clock, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2224"></td>
        <td id="LC2224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall probably trespass on your hospitality till the Saturday se&#39;ennight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2225"></td>
        <td id="LC2225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">following, which I can do without any inconvenience, as Lady Catherine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2226"></td>
        <td id="LC2226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is far from objecting to my occasional absence on a Sunday, provided</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2227"></td>
        <td id="LC2227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that some other clergyman is engaged to do the duty of the day.--I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2228"></td>
        <td id="LC2228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remain, dear sir, with respectful compliments to your lady and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2229"></td>
        <td id="LC2229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daughters, your well-wisher and friend,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2230"></td>
        <td id="LC2230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2231"></td>
        <td id="LC2231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;WILLIAM COLLINS&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2232"></td>
        <td id="LC2232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2233"></td>
        <td id="LC2233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;At four o&#39;clock, therefore, we may expect this peace-making gentleman,&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2234"></td>
        <td id="LC2234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said Mr. Bennet, as he folded up the letter. &quot;He seems to be a most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2235"></td>
        <td id="LC2235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conscientious and polite young man, upon my word, and I doubt not will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2236"></td>
        <td id="LC2236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prove a valuable acquaintance, especially if Lady Catherine should be so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2237"></td>
        <td id="LC2237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indulgent as to let him come to us again.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2238"></td>
        <td id="LC2238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2239"></td>
        <td id="LC2239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There is some sense in what he says about the girls, however, and if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2240"></td>
        <td id="LC2240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is disposed to make them any amends, I shall not be the person to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2241"></td>
        <td id="LC2241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discourage him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2242"></td>
        <td id="LC2242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2243"></td>
        <td id="LC2243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Though it is difficult,&quot; said Jane, &quot;to guess in what way he can mean</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2244"></td>
        <td id="LC2244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to make us the atonement he thinks our due, the wish is certainly to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2245"></td>
        <td id="LC2245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">credit.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2246"></td>
        <td id="LC2246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2247"></td>
        <td id="LC2247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth was chiefly struck by his extraordinary deference for Lady</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2248"></td>
        <td id="LC2248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Catherine, and his kind intention of christening, marrying, and burying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2249"></td>
        <td id="LC2249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his parishioners whenever it were required.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2250"></td>
        <td id="LC2250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2251"></td>
        <td id="LC2251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;He must be an oddity, I think,&quot; said she. &quot;I cannot make him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2252"></td>
        <td id="LC2252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out.--There is something very pompous in his style.--And what can he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2253"></td>
        <td id="LC2253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mean by apologising for being next in the entail?--We cannot suppose he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2254"></td>
        <td id="LC2254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would help it if he could.--Could he be a sensible man, sir?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2255"></td>
        <td id="LC2255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2256"></td>
        <td id="LC2256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, my dear, I think not. I have great hopes of finding him quite the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2257"></td>
        <td id="LC2257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reverse. There is a mixture of servility and self-importance in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2258"></td>
        <td id="LC2258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter, which promises well. I am impatient to see him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2259"></td>
        <td id="LC2259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2260"></td>
        <td id="LC2260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;In point of composition,&quot; said Mary, &quot;the letter does not seem</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2261"></td>
        <td id="LC2261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">defective. The idea of the olive-branch perhaps is not wholly new, yet I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2262"></td>
        <td id="LC2262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think it is well expressed.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2263"></td>
        <td id="LC2263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2264"></td>
        <td id="LC2264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To Catherine and Lydia, neither the letter nor its writer were in any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2265"></td>
        <td id="LC2265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">degree interesting. It was next to impossible that their cousin should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2266"></td>
        <td id="LC2266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come in a scarlet coat, and it was now some weeks since they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2267"></td>
        <td id="LC2267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received pleasure from the society of a man in any other colour. As for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2268"></td>
        <td id="LC2268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their mother, Mr. Collins&#39;s letter had done away much of her ill-will,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2269"></td>
        <td id="LC2269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and she was preparing to see him with a degree of composure which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2270"></td>
        <td id="LC2270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">astonished her husband and daughters.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2271"></td>
        <td id="LC2271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2272"></td>
        <td id="LC2272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Collins was punctual to his time, and was received with great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2273"></td>
        <td id="LC2273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">politeness by the whole family. Mr. Bennet indeed said little; but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2274"></td>
        <td id="LC2274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ladies were ready enough to talk, and Mr. Collins seemed neither in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2275"></td>
        <td id="LC2275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">need of encouragement, nor inclined to be silent himself. He was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2276"></td>
        <td id="LC2276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tall, heavy-looking young man of five-and-twenty. His air was grave and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2277"></td>
        <td id="LC2277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stately, and his manners were very formal. He had not been long seated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2278"></td>
        <td id="LC2278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before he complimented Mrs. Bennet on having so fine a family of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2279"></td>
        <td id="LC2279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daughters; said he had heard much of their beauty, but that in this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2280"></td>
        <td id="LC2280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instance fame had fallen short of the truth; and added, that he did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2281"></td>
        <td id="LC2281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not doubt her seeing them all in due time disposed of in marriage. This</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2282"></td>
        <td id="LC2282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gallantry was not much to the taste of some of his hearers; but Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2283"></td>
        <td id="LC2283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bennet, who quarreled with no compliments, answered most readily.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2284"></td>
        <td id="LC2284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2285"></td>
        <td id="LC2285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You are very kind, I am sure; and I wish with all my heart it may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2286"></td>
        <td id="LC2286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prove so, for else they will be destitute enough. Things are settled so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2287"></td>
        <td id="LC2287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oddly.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2288"></td>
        <td id="LC2288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2289"></td>
        <td id="LC2289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You allude, perhaps, to the entail of this estate.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2290"></td>
        <td id="LC2290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2291"></td>
        <td id="LC2291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah! sir, I do indeed. It is a grievous affair to my poor girls, you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2292"></td>
        <td id="LC2292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must confess. Not that I mean to find fault with _you_, for such things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2293"></td>
        <td id="LC2293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I know are all chance in this world. There is no knowing how estates</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2294"></td>
        <td id="LC2294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will go when once they come to be entailed.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2295"></td>
        <td id="LC2295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2296"></td>
        <td id="LC2296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am very sensible, madam, of the hardship to my fair cousins, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2297"></td>
        <td id="LC2297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could say much on the subject, but that I am cautious of appearing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2298"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2299"></td>
        <td id="LC2299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prepared to admire them. At present I will not say more; but, perhaps,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2300"></td>
        <td id="LC2300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when we are better acquainted--&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2301"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2302"></td>
        <td id="LC2302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was interrupted by a summons to dinner; and the girls smiled on each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2303"></td>
        <td id="LC2303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other. They were not the only objects of Mr. Collins&#39;s admiration. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2304"></td>
        <td id="LC2304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hall, the dining-room, and all its furniture, were examined and praised;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2305"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2307"></td>
        <td id="LC2307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own future property. The dinner too in its turn was highly admired; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2308"></td>
        <td id="LC2308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he begged to know to which of his fair cousins the excellency of its</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2309"></td>
        <td id="LC2309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cooking was owing. But he was set right there by Mrs. Bennet, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2310"></td>
        <td id="LC2310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assured him with some asperity that they were very well able to keep a</td>

        <td id="LC2311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good cook, and that her daughters had nothing to do in the kitchen. He</td>

        <td id="L2313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2313"></td>
        <td id="LC2313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself not at all offended; but he continued to apologise for about a</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2321"></td>
        <td id="LC2321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">During dinner, Mr. Bennet scarcely spoke at all; but when the servants</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2322"></td>
        <td id="LC2322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were withdrawn, he thought it time to have some conversation with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2323"></td>
        <td id="LC2323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guest, and therefore started a subject in which he expected him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2324"></td>
        <td id="LC2324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shine, by observing that he seemed very fortunate in his patroness. Lady</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2325"></td>
        <td id="LC2325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Catherine de Bourgh&#39;s attention to his wishes, and consideration for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2326"></td>
        <td id="LC2326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his comfort, appeared very remarkable. Mr. Bennet could not have chosen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2327"></td>
        <td id="LC2327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better. Mr. Collins was eloquent in her praise. The subject elevated him</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to more than usual solemnity of manner, and with a most important aspect</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2329"></td>
        <td id="LC2329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he protested that &quot;he had never in his life witnessed such behaviour in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2330"></td>
        <td id="LC2330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a person of rank--such affability and condescension, as he had himself</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2332"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2334"></td>
        <td id="LC2334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and had sent for him only the Saturday before, to make up her pool of</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC2362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, in point of true beauty, Miss de Bourgh is far superior to the</td>

        <td id="L2387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2387"></td>
        <td id="LC2387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that you possess the talent of flattering with delicacy. May I ask</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2388"></td>
        <td id="LC2388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether these pleasing attentions proceed from the impulse of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2389"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2666"></td>
        <td id="LC2666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and exclaiming after prizes to have attention for anyone in particular.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2667"></td>
        <td id="LC2667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Allowing for the common demands of the game, Mr. Wickham was therefore</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2668"></td>
        <td id="LC2668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at leisure to talk to Elizabeth, and she was very willing to hear</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2669"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2670"></td>
        <td id="LC2670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told--the history of his acquaintance with Mr. Darcy. She dared not</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2672"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2673"></td>
        <td id="LC2673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Netherfield was from Meryton; and, after receiving her answer, asked in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2674"></td>
        <td id="LC2674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a hesitating manner how long Mr. Darcy had been staying there.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2675"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2677"></td>
        <td id="LC2677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drop, added, &quot;He is a man of very large property in Derbyshire, I</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2696"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L2729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2729"></td>

        <td id="L2736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2736"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2737"></td>
        <td id="LC2737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth found the interest of the subject increase, and listened with</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2739"></td>
