</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2740"></td>
        <td id="LC2740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Wickham began to speak on more general topics, Meryton, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2741"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2746"></td>

        <td id="L2747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2747"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2748"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2749"></td>
        <td id="LC2749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attentions and excellent acquaintances Meryton had procured them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2750"></td>
        <td id="LC2750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Society, I own, is necessary to me. I have been a disappointed man, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2751"></td>
        <td id="LC2751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my spirits will not bear solitude. I _must_ have employment and society.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2752"></td>
        <td id="LC2752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A military life is not what I was intended for, but circumstances have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2753"></td>
        <td id="LC2753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now made it eligible. The church _ought_ to have been my profession--I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2754"></td>
        <td id="LC2754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was brought up for the church, and I should at this time have been in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2755"></td>
        <td id="LC2755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possession of a most valuable living, had it pleased the gentleman we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2756"></td>
        <td id="LC2756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were speaking of just now.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2757"></td>
        <td id="LC2757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2758"></td>
        <td id="LC2758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Indeed!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2759"></td>
        <td id="LC2759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2760"></td>
        <td id="LC2760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes--the late Mr. Darcy bequeathed me the next presentation of the best</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2761"></td>
        <td id="LC2761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">living in his gift. He was my godfather, and excessively attached to me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2762"></td>
        <td id="LC2762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I cannot do justice to his kindness. He meant to provide for me amply,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2763"></td>
        <td id="LC2763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and thought he had done it; but when the living fell, it was given</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2764"></td>
        <td id="LC2764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">elsewhere.&quot;</td>

        <td id="L2765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2765"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2766"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2768"></td>
        <td id="LC2768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2769"></td>
        <td id="LC2769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There was just such an informality in the terms of the bequest as to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2770"></td>
        <td id="LC2770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give me no hope from law. A man of honour could not have doubted the</td>

        <td id="LC2771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intention, but Mr. Darcy chose to doubt it--or to treat it as a merely</td>

        <td id="LC2772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conditional recommendation, and to assert that I had forfeited all claim</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2773"></td>
        <td id="LC2773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to it by extravagance, imprudence--in short anything or nothing. Certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2774"></td>
        <td id="LC2774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is, that the living became vacant two years ago, exactly as I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2775"></td>
        <td id="LC2775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of an age to hold it, and that it was given to another man; and no</td>

        <td id="L2776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2776"></td>
        <td id="LC2776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">less certain is it, that I cannot accuse myself of having really done</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2778"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2793"></td>
        <td id="LC2793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;A thorough, determined dislike of me--a dislike which I cannot but</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2800"></td>
        <td id="LC2800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I had not thought Mr. Darcy so bad as this--though I have never liked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2801"></td>
        <td id="LC2801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. I had not thought so very ill of him. I had supposed him to be</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2802"></td>
        <td id="LC2802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">despising his fellow-creatures in general, but did not suspect him of</td>

        <td id="L2803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2803"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2805"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2806"></td>
        <td id="LC2806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a few minutes&#39; reflection, however, she continued, &quot;I _do_</td>

        <td id="LC2807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remember his boasting one day, at Netherfield, of the implacability of</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2814"></td>
        <td id="LC2814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth was again deep in thought, and after a time exclaimed, &quot;To</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2815"></td>
        <td id="LC2815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treat in such a manner the godson, the friend, the favourite of his</td>

        <td id="LC2816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father!&quot; She could have added, &quot;A young man, too, like _you_, whose very</td>

        <td id="LC2819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">connected together, as I think you said, in the closest manner!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2820"></td>
        <td id="LC2820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2821"></td>
        <td id="LC2821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We were born in the same parish, within the same park; the greatest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2822"></td>
        <td id="LC2822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part of our youth was passed together; inmates of the same house,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2823"></td>
        <td id="LC2823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sharing the same amusements, objects of the same parental care. _My_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2824"></td>
        <td id="LC2824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father began life in the profession which your uncle, Mr. Phillips,</td>

        <td id="L2825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2825"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2827"></td>
        <td id="LC2827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pemberley property. He was most highly esteemed by Mr. Darcy, a most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2828"></td>
        <td id="LC2828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intimate, confidential friend. Mr. Darcy often acknowledged himself to</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2829"></td>
        <td id="LC2829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be under the greatest obligations to my father&#39;s active superintendence,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2830"></td>

        <td id="L2831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2831"></td>

        <td id="LC2832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be as much a debt of gratitude to _him_, as of his affection to myself.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2833"></td>
        <td id="LC2833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2834"></td>
        <td id="LC2834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How strange!&quot; cried Elizabeth. &quot;How abominable! I wonder that the very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2835"></td>
        <td id="LC2835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pride of this Mr. Darcy has not made him just to you! If from no better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2836"></td>
        <td id="LC2836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">motive, that he should not have been too proud to be dishonest--for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2837"></td>
        <td id="LC2837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dishonesty I must call it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2838"></td>
        <td id="LC2838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2839"></td>
        <td id="LC2839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It _is_ wonderful,&quot; replied Wickham, &quot;for almost all his actions may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2840"></td>
        <td id="LC2840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be traced to pride; and pride had often been his best friend. It has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2841"></td>
        <td id="LC2841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">connected him nearer with virtue than with any other feeling. But we are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2842"></td>
        <td id="LC2842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">none of us consistent, and in his behaviour to me there were stronger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2843"></td>
        <td id="LC2843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impulses even than pride.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2844"></td>
        <td id="LC2844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2845"></td>
        <td id="LC2845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Can such abominable pride as his have ever done him good?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2846"></td>
        <td id="LC2846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2847"></td>
        <td id="LC2847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes. It has often led him to be liberal and generous, to give his money</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2848"></td>
        <td id="LC2848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freely, to display hospitality, to assist his tenants, and relieve the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2849"></td>
        <td id="LC2849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor. Family pride, and _filial_ pride--for he is very proud of what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2850"></td>
        <td id="LC2850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his father was--have done this. Not to appear to disgrace his family,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2944"></td>
        <td id="LC2944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put an end to cards, and gave the rest of the ladies their share of Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2945"></td>
        <td id="LC2945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wickham&#39;s attentions. There could be no conversation in the noise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2946"></td>
        <td id="LC2946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Mrs. Phillips&#39;s supper party, but his manners recommended him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2947"></td>
        <td id="LC2947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everybody. Whatever he said, was said well; and whatever he did, done</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2948"></td>
        <td id="LC2948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gracefully. Elizabeth went away with her head full of him. She could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2949"></td>
        <td id="LC2949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think of nothing but of Mr. Wickham, and of what he had told her, all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2950"></td>
        <td id="LC2950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the way home; but there was not time for her even to mention his name</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2951"></td>
        <td id="LC2951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as they went, for neither Lydia nor Mr. Collins were once silent. Lydia</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2952"></td>
        <td id="LC2952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talked incessantly of lottery tickets, of the fish she had lost and the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fish she had won; and Mr. Collins in describing the civility of Mr. and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2954"></td>
        <td id="LC2954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Phillips, protesting that he did not in the least regard his losses</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3035"></td>
        <td id="LC3035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had no disinclination for it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3036"></td>
        <td id="LC3036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3037"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC3128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not seen for a week, she was soon able to make a voluntary transition</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3129"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3407"></td>
        <td id="LC3407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear Miss Elizabeth, I have the highest opinion in the world in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3408"></td>
        <td id="LC3408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your excellent judgement in all matters within the scope of your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3409"></td>
        <td id="LC3409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understanding; but permit me to say, that there must be a wide</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3410"></td>
        <td id="LC3410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difference between the established forms of ceremony amongst the laity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3411"></td>
        <td id="LC3411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and those which regulate the clergy; for, give me leave to observe that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3412"></td>
        <td id="LC3412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I consider the clerical office as equal in point of dignity with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3413"></td>
        <td id="LC3413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the highest rank in the kingdom--provided that a proper humility of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3414"></td>
        <td id="LC3414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behaviour is at the same time maintained. You must therefore allow me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3415"></td>
        <td id="LC3415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follow the dictates of my conscience on this occasion, which leads me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3416"></td>
        <td id="LC3416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perform what I look on as a point of duty. Pardon me for neglecting to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3417"></td>
        <td id="LC3417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">profit by your advice, which on every other subject shall be my constant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3418"></td>
        <td id="LC3418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guide, though in the case before us I consider myself more fitted by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3419"></td>
        <td id="LC3419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">education and habitual study to decide on what is right than a young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3420"></td>
        <td id="LC3420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lady like yourself.&quot; And with a low bow he left her to attack Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3421"></td>
        <td id="LC3421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darcy, whose reception of his advances she eagerly watched, and whose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3422"></td>
        <td id="LC3422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">astonishment at being so addressed was very evident. Her cousin prefaced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3423"></td>
        <td id="LC3423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his speech with a solemn bow and though she could not hear a word of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3424"></td>
        <td id="LC3424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, she felt as if hearing it all, and saw in the motion of his lips the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3425"></td>
        <td id="LC3425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words &quot;apology,&quot; &quot;Hunsford,&quot; and &quot;Lady Catherine de Bourgh.&quot; It vexed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3426"></td>
        <td id="LC3426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her to see him expose himself to such a man. Mr. Darcy was eyeing him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3427"></td>
        <td id="LC3427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with unrestrained wonder, and when at last Mr. Collins allowed him time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3428"></td>
        <td id="LC3428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to speak, replied with an air of distant civility. Mr. Collins, however,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3429"></td>
        <td id="LC3429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was not discouraged from speaking again, and Mr. Darcy&#39;s contempt seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3430"></td>
        <td id="LC3430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">abundantly increasing with the length of his second speech, and at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3431"></td>
        <td id="LC3431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">end of it he only made him a slight bow, and moved another way. Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3432"></td>
        <td id="LC3432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Collins then returned to Elizabeth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3433"></td>
        <td id="LC3433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3434"></td>
        <td id="LC3434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have no reason, I assure you,&quot; said he, &quot;to be dissatisfied with my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3435"></td>
        <td id="LC3435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reception. Mr. Darcy seemed much pleased with the attention. He answered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3436"></td>
        <td id="LC3436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me with the utmost civility, and even paid me the compliment of saying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3437"></td>
        <td id="LC3437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he was so well convinced of Lady Catherine&#39;s discernment as to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3438"></td>
        <td id="LC3438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain she could never bestow a favour unworthily. It was really a very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3439"></td>
        <td id="LC3439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">handsome thought. Upon the whole, I am much pleased with him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3440"></td>
        <td id="LC3440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3441"></td>
        <td id="LC3441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As Elizabeth had no longer any interest of her own to pursue, she turned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3442"></td>
        <td id="LC3442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her attention almost entirely on her sister and Mr. Bingley; and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3443"></td>
        <td id="LC3443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">train of agreeable reflections which her observations gave birth to,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3444"></td>
        <td id="LC3444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made her perhaps almost as happy as Jane. She saw her in idea settled in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3445"></td>
        <td id="LC3445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that very house, in all the felicity which a marriage of true affection</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3446"></td>
        <td id="LC3446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could bestow; and she felt capable, under such circumstances, of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3447"></td>
        <td id="LC3447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endeavouring even to like Bingley&#39;s two sisters. Her mother&#39;s thoughts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3448"></td>
        <td id="LC3448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she plainly saw were bent the same way, and she determined not to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3449"></td>
        <td id="LC3449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">venture near her, lest she might hear too much. When they sat down to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3450"></td>
        <td id="LC3450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supper, therefore, she considered it a most unlucky perverseness which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3451"></td>
        <td id="LC3451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">placed them within one of each other; and deeply was she vexed to find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3452"></td>
        <td id="LC3452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that her mother was talking to that one person (Lady Lucas) freely,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3453"></td>
        <td id="LC3453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">openly, and of nothing else but her expectation that Jane would soon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3454"></td>
        <td id="LC3454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be married to Mr. Bingley. It was an animating subject, and Mrs. Bennet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3455"></td>
        <td id="LC3455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed incapable of fatigue while enumerating the advantages of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3456"></td>
        <td id="LC3456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">match. His being such a charming young man, and so rich, and living but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3457"></td>
        <td id="LC3457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three miles from them, were the first points of self-gratulation; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3458"></td>
        <td id="LC3458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then it was such a comfort to think how fond the two sisters were of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3459"></td>
        <td id="LC3459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jane, and to be certain that they must desire the connection as much as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3460"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3462"></td>
        <td id="LC3462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other rich men; and lastly, it was so pleasant at her time of life to be</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she might not be obliged to go into company more than she liked. It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3465"></td>
        <td id="LC3465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessary to make this circumstance a matter of pleasure, because on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3466"></td>
        <td id="LC3466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such occasions it is the etiquette; but no one was less likely than Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3467"></td>
        <td id="LC3467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bennet to find comfort in staying home at any period of her life. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3468"></td>
        <td id="LC3468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concluded with many good wishes that Lady Lucas might soon be equally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3469"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3471"></td>
        <td id="LC3471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3472"></td>
        <td id="LC3472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In vain did Elizabeth endeavour to check the rapidity of her mother&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3473"></td>
        <td id="LC3473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words, or persuade her to describe her felicity in a less audible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3474"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3475"></td>
        <td id="LC3475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chief of it was overheard by Mr. Darcy, who sat opposite to them. Her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3476"></td>
        <td id="LC3476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother only scolded her for being nonsensical.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3477"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3478"></td>
        <td id="LC3478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What is Mr. Darcy to me, pray, that I should be afraid of him? I am</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3482"></td>
        <td id="LC3482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;For heaven&#39;s sake, madam, speak lower. What advantage can it be for you</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to offend Mr. Darcy? You will never recommend yourself to his friend by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3484"></td>
        <td id="LC3484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so doing!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3485"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3486"></td>
        <td id="LC3486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing that she could say, however, had any influence. Her mother would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3487"></td>
        <td id="LC3487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talk of her views in the same intelligible tone. Elizabeth blushed and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3488"></td>
        <td id="LC3488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blushed again with shame and vexation. She could not help frequently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3489"></td>
        <td id="LC3489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glancing her eye at Mr. Darcy, though every glance convinced her of what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3490"></td>
        <td id="LC3490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she dreaded; for though he was not always looking at her mother, she was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3491"></td>
        <td id="LC3491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">convinced that his attention was invariably fixed by her. The expression</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3492"></td>
        <td id="LC3492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his face changed gradually from indignant contempt to a composed and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3493"></td>
        <td id="LC3493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steady gravity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3494"></td>
        <td id="LC3494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3495"></td>
        <td id="LC3495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At length, however, Mrs. Bennet had no more to say; and Lady Lucas, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3496"></td>
        <td id="LC3496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been long yawning at the repetition of delights which she saw no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3497"></td>
        <td id="LC3497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likelihood of sharing, was left to the comforts of cold ham and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3498"></td>

        <td id="L3500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3500"></td>

        <td id="L3532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3532"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3589"></td>
        <td id="LC3589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Bingley and Jane were standing together, a little detached from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3590"></td>
        <td id="LC3590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest, and talked only to each other. Elizabeth preserved as steady a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3591"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3592"></td>
        <td id="LC3592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much fatigued to utter more than the occasional exclamation of &quot;Lord,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3593"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3594"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3595"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3596"></td>
        <td id="LC3596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">civil in her hope of seeing the whole family soon at Longbourn, and</td>

        <td id="LC3598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would make them by eating a family dinner with them at any time, without</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ceremony of a formal invitation. Bingley was all grateful pleasure,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3600"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3604"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3637"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3642"></td>
        <td id="LC3642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, no, nonsense, Lizzy. I desire you to stay where you are.&quot; And upon</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3643"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3647"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3649"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3650"></td>
        <td id="LC3650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conceal, by incessant employment the feelings which were divided between</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3651"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3653"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3654"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3667"></td>
        <td id="LC3667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The idea of Mr. Collins, with all his solemn composure, being run away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3668"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3669"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3671"></td>
        <td id="LC3671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3672"></td>
        <td id="LC3672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My reasons for marrying are, first, that I think it a right thing for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3673"></td>
        <td id="LC3673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every clergyman in easy circumstances (like myself) to set the example</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3674"></td>
        <td id="LC3674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of matrimony in his parish; secondly, that I am convinced that it will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3675"></td>
        <td id="LC3675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">add very greatly to my happiness; and thirdly--which perhaps I ought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3676"></td>
        <td id="LC3676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have mentioned earlier, that it is the particular advice and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3677"></td>
        <td id="LC3677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recommendation of the very noble lady whom I have the honour of calling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3678"></td>
        <td id="LC3678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patroness. Twice has she condescended to give me her opinion (unasked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3679"></td>
        <td id="LC3679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too!) on this subject; and it was but the very Saturday night before I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3680"></td>
        <td id="LC3680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left Hunsford--between our pools at quadrille, while Mrs. Jenkinson was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3681"></td>
        <td id="LC3681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arranging Miss de Bourgh&#39;s footstool, that she said, &#39;Mr. Collins, you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3682"></td>
        <td id="LC3682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must marry. A clergyman like you must marry. Choose properly, choose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3683"></td>
        <td id="LC3683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a gentlewoman for _my_ sake; and for your _own_, let her be an active,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3684"></td>
        <td id="LC3684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">useful sort of person, not brought up high, but able to make a small</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3685"></td>
        <td id="LC3685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">income go a good way. This is my advice. Find such a woman as soon as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3686"></td>
        <td id="LC3686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you can, bring her to Hunsford, and I will visit her.&#39; Allow me, by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3687"></td>
        <td id="LC3687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way, to observe, my fair cousin, that I do not reckon the notice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3688"></td>
        <td id="LC3688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and kindness of Lady Catherine de Bourgh as among the least of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3689"></td>

        <td id="L3691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3691"></td>
        <td id="LC3691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acceptable to her, especially when tempered with the silence and</td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3767"></td>
        <td id="LC3767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You must give me leave to flatter myself, my dear cousin, that your</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3768"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3769"></td>
        <td id="LC3769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believing it are briefly these: It does not appear to me that my hand is</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unworthy your acceptance, or that the establishment I can offer would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3771"></td>
        <td id="LC3771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be any other than highly desirable. My situation in life, my connections</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3772"></td>
        <td id="LC3772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the family of de Bourgh, and my relationship to your own, are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3773"></td>
        <td id="LC3773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circumstances highly in my favour; and you should take it into further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3774"></td>
        <td id="LC3774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consideration, that in spite of your manifold attractions, it is by no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3775"></td>
        <td id="LC3775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">means certain that another offer of marriage may ever be made you. Your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3776"></td>
        <td id="LC3776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">portion is unhappily so small that it will in all likelihood undo</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3777"></td>
        <td id="LC3777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the effects of your loveliness and amiable qualifications. As I must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3778"></td>
        <td id="LC3778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">therefore conclude that you are not serious in your rejection of me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3779"></td>
        <td id="LC3779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall choose to attribute it to your wish of increasing my love by</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspense, according to the usual practice of elegant females.&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3781"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3782"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3820"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3843"></td>

        <td id="LC3846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lizzy marry Mr. Collins, for she vows she will not have him, and if you</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3859"></td>
        <td id="LC3859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And what am I to do on the occasion? It seems an hopeless business.&quot;</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3862"></td>

        <td id="L3863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3863"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3864"></td>
        <td id="LC3864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Let her be called down. She shall hear my opinion.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3865"></td>
        <td id="LC3865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3866"></td>
        <td id="LC3866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Bennet rang the bell, and Miss Elizabeth was summoned to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3867"></td>
        <td id="LC3867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">library.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3868"></td>
        <td id="LC3868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3869"></td>
        <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Come here, child,&quot; cried her father as she appeared. &quot;I have sent for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3870"></td>
        <td id="LC3870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you on an affair of importance. I understand that Mr. Collins has made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3871"></td>
        <td id="LC3871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you an offer of marriage. Is it true?&quot; Elizabeth replied that it was.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3872"></td>
        <td id="LC3872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Very well--and this offer of marriage you have refused?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3873"></td>
        <td id="LC3873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3874"></td>
        <td id="LC3874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have, sir.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3875"></td>
        <td id="LC3875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3876"></td>
        <td id="LC3876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Very well. We now come to the point. Your mother insists upon your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3877"></td>
        <td id="LC3877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accepting it. Is it not so, Mrs. Bennet?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3878"></td>
        <td id="LC3878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3879"></td>
        <td id="LC3879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, or I will never see her again.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3880"></td>
        <td id="LC3880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3881"></td>
        <td id="LC3881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;An unhappy alternative is before you, Elizabeth. From this day you must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3882"></td>
        <td id="LC3882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be a stranger to one of your parents. Your mother will never see you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3883"></td>
        <td id="LC3883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again if you do _not_ marry Mr. Collins, and I will never see you again</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3884"></td>
        <td id="LC3884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if you _do_.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3885"></td>
        <td id="LC3885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3886"></td>
        <td id="LC3886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth could not but smile at such a conclusion of such a beginning,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3887"></td>
        <td id="LC3887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but Mrs. Bennet, who had persuaded herself that her husband regarded the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3888"></td>
        <td id="LC3888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affair as she wished, was excessively disappointed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3889"></td>
        <td id="LC3889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3890"></td>
        <td id="LC3890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What do you mean, Mr. Bennet, in talking this way? You promised me to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3891"></td>
        <td id="LC3891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_insist_ upon her marrying him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3892"></td>
        <td id="LC3892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3893"></td>
        <td id="LC3893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear,&quot; replied her husband, &quot;I have two small favours to request.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3894"></td>
        <td id="LC3894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">First, that you will allow me the free use of my understanding on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3895"></td>
        <td id="LC3895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present occasion; and secondly, of my room. I shall be glad to have the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3896"></td>
        <td id="LC3896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">library to myself as soon as may be.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3897"></td>
        <td id="LC3897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3898"></td>
        <td id="LC3898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Not yet, however, in spite of her disappointment in her husband, did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3899"></td>
        <td id="LC3899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Bennet give up the point. She talked to Elizabeth again and again;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3900"></td>
        <td id="LC3900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coaxed and threatened her by turns. She endeavoured to secure Jane</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3901"></td>
        <td id="LC3901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in her interest; but Jane, with all possible mildness, declined</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3902"></td>
        <td id="LC3902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interfering; and Elizabeth, sometimes with real earnestness, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3903"></td>
        <td id="LC3903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sometimes with playful gaiety, replied to her attacks. Though her manner</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3904"></td>
        <td id="LC3904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">varied, however, her determination never did.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3905"></td>
        <td id="LC3905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3906"></td>
        <td id="LC3906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Collins, meanwhile, was meditating in solitude on what had passed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3907"></td>
        <td id="LC3907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He thought too well of himself to comprehend on what motives his cousin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3908"></td>
        <td id="LC3908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could refuse him; and though his pride was hurt, he suffered in no other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3909"></td>
        <td id="LC3909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way. His regard for her was quite imaginary; and the possibility of her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3910"></td>
        <td id="LC3910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deserving her mother&#39;s reproach prevented his feeling any regret.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3911"></td>
        <td id="LC3911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3912"></td>
        <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While the family were in this confusion, Charlotte Lucas came to spend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3913"></td>
        <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the day with them. She was met in the vestibule by Lydia, who, flying to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3914"></td>
        <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her, cried in a half whisper, &quot;I am glad you are come, for there is such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3915"></td>
        <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fun here! What do you think has happened this morning? Mr. Collins has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3916"></td>
        <td id="LC3916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made an offer to Lizzy, and she will not have him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3917"></td>
        <td id="LC3917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3918"></td>
        <td id="LC3918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Charlotte hardly had time to answer, before they were joined by Kitty,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3919"></td>
        <td id="LC3919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who came to tell the same news; and no sooner had they entered the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3920"></td>
        <td id="LC3920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breakfast-room, where Mrs. Bennet was alone, than she likewise began on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3921"></td>
        <td id="LC3921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the subject, calling on Miss Lucas for her compassion, and entreating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3922"></td>
        <td id="LC3922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her to persuade her friend Lizzy to comply with the wishes of all her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3923"></td>
        <td id="LC3923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">family. &quot;Pray do, my dear Miss Lucas,&quot; she added in a melancholy tone,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3924"></td>
        <td id="LC3924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;for nobody is on my side, nobody takes part with me. I am cruelly used,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3925"></td>
        <td id="LC3925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nobody feels for my poor nerves.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3926"></td>
        <td id="LC3926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3927"></td>
        <td id="LC3927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Charlotte&#39;s reply was spared by the entrance of Jane and Elizabeth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3928"></td>
        <td id="LC3928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3929"></td>
        <td id="LC3929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Aye, there she comes,&quot; continued Mrs. Bennet, &quot;looking as unconcerned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3930"></td>
        <td id="LC3930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as may be, and caring no more for us than if we were at York, provided</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3931"></td>
        <td id="LC3931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she can have her own way. But I tell you, Miss Lizzy--if you take it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3932"></td>
        <td id="LC3932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into your head to go on refusing every offer of marriage in this way,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3933"></td>
        <td id="LC3933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you will never get a husband at all--and I am sure I do not know who is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3934"></td>
        <td id="LC3934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to maintain you when your father is dead. I shall not be able to keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3935"></td>
        <td id="LC3935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you--and so I warn you. I have done with you from this very day. I told</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3936"></td>
        <td id="LC3936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you in the library, you know, that I should never speak to you again,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3937"></td>
        <td id="LC3937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and you will find me as good as my word. I have no pleasure in talking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3938"></td>
        <td id="LC3938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to undutiful children. Not that I have much pleasure, indeed, in talking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3939"></td>
        <td id="LC3939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to anybody. People who suffer as I do from nervous complaints can have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3940"></td>
        <td id="LC3940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no great inclination for talking. Nobody can tell what I suffer! But it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3941"></td>
        <td id="LC3941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is always so. Those who do not complain are never pitied.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3942"></td>
        <td id="LC3942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3943"></td>
        <td id="LC3943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her daughters listened in silence to this effusion, sensible that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3944"></td>
        <td id="LC3944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any attempt to reason with her or soothe her would only increase the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3945"></td>
        <td id="LC3945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">irritation. She talked on, therefore, without interruption from any of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3946"></td>
        <td id="LC3946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, till they were joined by Mr. Collins, who entered the room with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3947"></td>
        <td id="LC3947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an air more stately than usual, and on perceiving whom, she said to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3948"></td>
        <td id="LC3948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the girls, &quot;Now, I do insist upon it, that you, all of you, hold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3949"></td>
        <td id="LC3949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your tongues, and let me and Mr. Collins have a little conversation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3950"></td>
        <td id="LC3950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3951"></td>
        <td id="LC3951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3952"></td>
        <td id="LC3952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth passed quietly out of the room, Jane and Kitty followed, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3953"></td>
        <td id="LC3953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lydia stood her ground, determined to hear all she could; and Charlotte,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3954"></td>
        <td id="LC3954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">detained first by the civility of Mr. Collins, whose inquiries after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3955"></td>
        <td id="LC3955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself and all her family were very minute, and then by a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3956"></td>
        <td id="LC3956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curiosity, satisfied herself with walking to the window and pretending</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3957"></td>
        <td id="LC3957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not to hear. In a doleful voice Mrs. Bennet began the projected</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3958"></td>
        <td id="LC3958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation: &quot;Oh! Mr. Collins!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3959"></td>
        <td id="LC3959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3960"></td>
        <td id="LC3960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear madam,&quot; replied he, &quot;let us be for ever silent on this point.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3961"></td>
        <td id="LC3961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Far be it from me,&quot; he presently continued, in a voice that marked his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3962"></td>
        <td id="LC3962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">displeasure, &quot;to resent the behaviour of your daughter. Resignation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3963"></td>
        <td id="LC3963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to inevitable evils is the duty of us all; the peculiar duty of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3964"></td>
        <td id="LC3964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young man who has been so fortunate as I have been in early preferment;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3965"></td>
        <td id="LC3965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I trust I am resigned. Perhaps not the less so from feeling a doubt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3966"></td>
        <td id="LC3966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my positive happiness had my fair cousin honoured me with her hand;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3967"></td>
        <td id="LC3967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for I have often observed that resignation is never so perfect as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3968"></td>
        <td id="LC3968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when the blessing denied begins to lose somewhat of its value in our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3969"></td>
        <td id="LC3969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">estimation. You will not, I hope, consider me as showing any disrespect</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3970"></td>
        <td id="LC3970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to your family, my dear madam, by thus withdrawing my pretensions to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dismission from your daughter&#39;s lips instead of your own. But we are all</td>

</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L4048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4048"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4049"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4051"></td>
        <td id="LC4051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absence from Netherfield would prevent Mr. Bingley&#39;s being there; and as</td>
      </tr>
