        <td id="L4144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4144"></td>
        <td id="LC4144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That is right. You could not have started a more happy idea, since you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4145"></td>
        <td id="LC4145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will not take comfort in mine. Believe her to be deceived, by all means.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4146"></td>
        <td id="LC4146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You have now done your duty by her, and must fret no longer.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4147"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4148"></td>
        <td id="LC4148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But, my dear sister, can I be happy, even supposing the best, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4149"></td>
        <td id="LC4149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accepting a man whose sisters and friends are all wishing him to marry</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4152"></td>
        <td id="LC4152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You must decide for yourself,&quot; said Elizabeth; &quot;and if, upon mature</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4153"></td>
        <td id="LC4153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deliberation, you find that the misery of disobliging his two sisters is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4154"></td>
        <td id="LC4154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more than equivalent to the happiness of being his wife, I advise you by</td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC4162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your situation with much compassion.&quot;</td>

        <td id="L4163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4163"></td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC4181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but even this partial communication gave her a great deal of concern,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4182"></td>
        <td id="LC4182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and she bewailed it as exceedingly unlucky that the ladies should happen</td>

        <td id="L4197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4197"></td>

        <td id="L4199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4199"></td>

        <td id="L4200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4200"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4204"></td>
        <td id="LC4204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself. Such was Miss Lucas&#39;s scheme; and appearances were so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4209"></td>
        <td id="LC4209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning with admirable slyness, and hasten to Lucas Lodge to throw</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4210"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC4212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conjecture his design, and he was not willing to have the attempt known</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4213"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4214"></td>
        <td id="LC4214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secure, and with reason, for Charlotte had been tolerably encouraging,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4215"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4216"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4221"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4226"></td>
        <td id="LC4226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his happiness. The stupidity with which he was favoured by nature must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4227"></td>
        <td id="LC4227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guard his courtship from any charm that could make a woman wish for its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4228"></td>
        <td id="LC4228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continuance; and Miss Lucas, who accepted him solely from the pure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4229"></td>
        <td id="LC4229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and disinterested desire of an establishment, cared not how soon that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4230"></td>
        <td id="LC4230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">establishment were gained.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4231"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4232"></td>
        <td id="LC4232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sir William and Lady Lucas were speedily applied to for their consent;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4233"></td>
        <td id="LC4233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and it was bestowed with a most joyful alacrity. Mr. Collins&#39;s present</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4234"></td>
        <td id="LC4234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circumstances made it a most eligible match for their daughter, to whom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4235"></td>
        <td id="LC4235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they could give little fortune; and his prospects of future wealth were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4236"></td>
        <td id="LC4236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exceedingly fair. Lady Lucas began directly to calculate, with more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4237"></td>
        <td id="LC4237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest than the matter had ever excited before, how many years longer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4238"></td>
        <td id="LC4238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Bennet was likely to live; and Sir William gave it as his decided</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4239"></td>
        <td id="LC4239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opinion, that whenever Mr. Collins should be in possession of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4240"></td>
        <td id="LC4240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Longbourn estate, it would be highly expedient that both he and his wife</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4241"></td>
        <td id="LC4241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should make their appearance at St. James&#39;s. The whole family, in short,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4242"></td>
        <td id="LC4242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were properly overjoyed on the occasion. The younger girls formed hopes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4243"></td>
        <td id="LC4243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of _coming out_ a year or two sooner than they might otherwise have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4244"></td>
        <td id="LC4244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done; and the boys were relieved from their apprehension of Charlotte&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4245"></td>
        <td id="LC4245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dying an old maid. Charlotte herself was tolerably composed. She had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4246"></td>
        <td id="LC4246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gained her point, and had time to consider of it. Her reflections were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4247"></td>
        <td id="LC4247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in general satisfactory. Mr. Collins, to be sure, was neither sensible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4248"></td>
        <td id="LC4248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nor agreeable; his society was irksome, and his attachment to her must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4249"></td>
        <td id="LC4249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be imaginary. But still he would be her husband. Without thinking highly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4250"></td>
        <td id="LC4250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either of men or matrimony, marriage had always been her object; it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4251"></td>
        <td id="LC4251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the only provision for well-educated young women of small fortune,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4252"></td>
        <td id="LC4252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and however uncertain of giving happiness, must be their pleasantest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4253"></td>
        <td id="LC4253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preservative from want. This preservative she had now obtained; and at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4254"></td>
        <td id="LC4254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the age of twenty-seven, without having ever been handsome, she felt all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4255"></td>
        <td id="LC4255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the good luck of it. The least agreeable circumstance in the business</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4256"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4257"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4258"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4260"></td>
        <td id="LC4260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to give her the information herself, and therefore charged Mr. Collins,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4261"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC4298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from me a letter of thanks for this, and for every other mark of your</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4304"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4305"></td>
        <td id="LC4305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surprised that he meditated a quick return. Mrs. Bennet wished to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4306"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4308"></td>

        <td id="L4309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4309"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4316"></td>

        <td id="L4322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4322"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4323"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4324"></td>
        <td id="LC4324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4325"></td>
        <td id="LC4325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The steady countenance which Miss Lucas had commanded in telling her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4326"></td>
        <td id="LC4326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">story, gave way to a momentary confusion here on receiving so direct a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4327"></td>
        <td id="LC4327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reproach; though, as it was no more than she expected, she soon regained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4328"></td>
        <td id="LC4328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her composure, and calmly replied:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4329"></td>
        <td id="LC4329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4330"></td>
        <td id="LC4330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why should you be surprised, my dear Eliza? Do you think it incredible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4331"></td>
        <td id="LC4331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Mr. Collins should be able to procure any woman&#39;s good opinion,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4332"></td>
        <td id="LC4332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because he was not so happy as to succeed with you?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4333"></td>
        <td id="LC4333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4334"></td>
        <td id="LC4334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But Elizabeth had now recollected herself, and making a strong effort</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4335"></td>
        <td id="LC4335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for it, was able to assure with tolerable firmness that the prospect of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4336"></td>
        <td id="LC4336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their relationship was highly grateful to her, and that she wished her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4337"></td>
        <td id="LC4337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all imaginable happiness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4338"></td>
        <td id="LC4338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4339"></td>
        <td id="LC4339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I see what you are feeling,&quot; replied Charlotte. &quot;You must be surprised,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4340"></td>
        <td id="LC4340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very much surprised--so lately as Mr. Collins was wishing to marry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4341"></td>
        <td id="LC4341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you. But when you have had time to think it over, I hope you will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4342"></td>
        <td id="LC4342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfied with what I have done. I am not romantic, you know; I never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4343"></td>
        <td id="LC4343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was. I ask only a comfortable home; and considering Mr. Collins&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4344"></td>
        <td id="LC4344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">character, connection, and situation in life, I am convinced that my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4345"></td>
        <td id="LC4345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chance of happiness with him is as fair as most people can boast on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4346"></td>
        <td id="LC4346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entering the marriage state.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4347"></td>
        <td id="LC4347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4348"></td>
        <td id="LC4348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth quietly answered &quot;Undoubtedly;&quot; and after an awkward pause,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4349"></td>
        <td id="LC4349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they returned to the rest of the family. Charlotte did not stay much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4350"></td>
        <td id="LC4350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">longer, and Elizabeth was then left to reflect on what she had heard.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4351"></td>
        <td id="LC4351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a long time before she became at all reconciled to the idea of so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4352"></td>
        <td id="LC4352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unsuitable a match. The strangeness of Mr. Collins&#39;s making two offers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4353"></td>
        <td id="LC4353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of marriage within three days was nothing in comparison of his being now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4354"></td>
        <td id="LC4354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accepted. She had always felt that Charlotte&#39;s opinion of matrimony was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4355"></td>
        <td id="LC4355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not exactly like her own, but she had not supposed it to be possible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4356"></td>
        <td id="LC4356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, when called into action, she would have sacrificed every better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4357"></td>
        <td id="LC4357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feeling to worldly advantage. Charlotte the wife of Mr. Collins was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4358"></td>
        <td id="LC4358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most humiliating picture! And to the pang of a friend disgracing herself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4359"></td>
        <td id="LC4359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and sunk in her esteem, was added the distressing conviction that it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4360"></td>
        <td id="LC4360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was impossible for that friend to be tolerably happy in the lot she had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4361"></td>
        <td id="LC4361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chosen.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4362"></td>
        <td id="LC4362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4363"></td>
        <td id="LC4363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4364"></td>
        <td id="LC4364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4365"></td>
        <td id="LC4365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chapter 23</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4366"></td>
        <td id="LC4366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4367"></td>
        <td id="LC4367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4368"></td>
        <td id="LC4368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth was sitting with her mother and sisters, reflecting on what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4369"></td>
        <td id="LC4369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she had heard, and doubting whether she was authorised to mention</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4370"></td>
        <td id="LC4370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, when Sir William Lucas himself appeared, sent by his daughter, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4371"></td>
        <td id="LC4371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">announce her engagement to the family. With many compliments to them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4372"></td>
        <td id="LC4372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and much self-gratulation on the prospect of a connection between the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4373"></td>
        <td id="LC4373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">houses, he unfolded the matter--to an audience not merely wondering, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4374"></td>
        <td id="LC4374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incredulous; for Mrs. Bennet, with more perseverance than politeness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4375"></td>
        <td id="LC4375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">protested he must be entirely mistaken; and Lydia, always unguarded and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4376"></td>
        <td id="LC4376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">often uncivil, boisterously exclaimed:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4377"></td>
        <td id="LC4377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4378"></td>
        <td id="LC4378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good Lord! Sir William, how can you tell such a story? Do not you know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4379"></td>
        <td id="LC4379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Mr. Collins wants to marry Lizzy?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4380"></td>
        <td id="LC4380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4381"></td>
        <td id="LC4381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing less than the complaisance of a courtier could have borne</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4382"></td>
        <td id="LC4382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without anger such treatment; but Sir William&#39;s good breeding carried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4383"></td>
        <td id="LC4383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him through it all; and though he begged leave to be positive as to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4384"></td>
        <td id="LC4384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truth of his information, he listened to all their impertinence with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4385"></td>
        <td id="LC4385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most forbearing courtesy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4386"></td>
        <td id="LC4386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4387"></td>
        <td id="LC4387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth, feeling it incumbent on her to relieve him from so unpleasant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4388"></td>
        <td id="LC4388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a situation, now put herself forward to confirm his account, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4389"></td>
        <td id="LC4389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mentioning her prior knowledge of it from Charlotte herself; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4390"></td>
        <td id="LC4390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endeavoured to put a stop to the exclamations of her mother and sisters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4391"></td>
        <td id="LC4391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by the earnestness of her congratulations to Sir William, in which she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4392"></td>
        <td id="LC4392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was readily joined by Jane, and by making a variety of remarks on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4393"></td>
        <td id="LC4393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happiness that might be expected from the match, the excellent character</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4394"></td>
        <td id="LC4394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Mr. Collins, and the convenient distance of Hunsford from London.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4395"></td>
        <td id="LC4395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4396"></td>
        <td id="LC4396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Bennet was in fact too much overpowered to say a great deal while</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4397"></td>
        <td id="LC4397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sir William remained; but no sooner had he left them than her feelings</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4398"></td>
        <td id="LC4398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found a rapid vent. In the first place, she persisted in disbelieving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4399"></td>
        <td id="LC4399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the whole of the matter; secondly, she was very sure that Mr. Collins</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4400"></td>
        <td id="LC4400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been taken in; thirdly, she trusted that they would never be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4401"></td>
        <td id="LC4401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happy together; and fourthly, that the match might be broken off. Two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4402"></td>
        <td id="LC4402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inferences, however, were plainly deduced from the whole: one, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4403"></td>
        <td id="LC4403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth was the real cause of the mischief; and the other that she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4404"></td>
        <td id="LC4404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself had been barbarously misused by them all; and on these two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4405"></td>
        <td id="LC4405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">points she principally dwelt during the rest of the day. Nothing could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4406"></td>
        <td id="LC4406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">console and nothing could appease her. Nor did that day wear out her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4407"></td>
        <td id="LC4407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resentment. A week elapsed before she could see Elizabeth without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4408"></td>
        <td id="LC4408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scolding her, a month passed away before she could speak to Sir William</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4409"></td>
        <td id="LC4409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or Lady Lucas without being rude, and many months were gone before she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4410"></td>
        <td id="LC4410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could at all forgive their daughter.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4411"></td>
        <td id="LC4411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4412"></td>
        <td id="LC4412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Bennet&#39;s emotions were much more tranquil on the occasion, and such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4413"></td>
        <td id="LC4413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as he did experience he pronounced to be of a most agreeable sort; for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4414"></td>
        <td id="LC4414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it gratified him, he said, to discover that Charlotte Lucas, whom he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4415"></td>
        <td id="LC4415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been used to think tolerably sensible, was as foolish as his wife, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4416"></td>
        <td id="LC4416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more foolish than his daughter!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4417"></td>
        <td id="LC4417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4418"></td>
        <td id="LC4418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jane confessed herself a little surprised at the match; but she said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4419"></td>
        <td id="LC4419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">less of her astonishment than of her earnest desire for their happiness;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4420"></td>
        <td id="LC4420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nor could Elizabeth persuade her to consider it as improbable. Kitty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4421"></td>
        <td id="LC4421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Lydia were far from envying Miss Lucas, for Mr. Collins was only a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4422"></td>
        <td id="LC4422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clergyman; and it affected them in no other way than as a piece of news</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4423"></td>
        <td id="LC4423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to spread at Meryton.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4424"></td>
        <td id="LC4424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4425"></td>
        <td id="LC4425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lady Lucas could not be insensible of triumph on being able to retort</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4426"></td>
        <td id="LC4426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on Mrs. Bennet the comfort of having a daughter well married; and she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4427"></td>
        <td id="LC4427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called at Longbourn rather oftener than usual to say how happy she was,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4428"></td>
        <td id="LC4428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though Mrs. Bennet&#39;s sour looks and ill-natured remarks might have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4429"></td>
        <td id="LC4429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough to drive happiness away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4430"></td>
        <td id="LC4430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4431"></td>
        <td id="LC4431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Between Elizabeth and Charlotte there was a restraint which kept them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4432"></td>
        <td id="LC4432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mutually silent on the subject; and Elizabeth felt persuaded that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4433"></td>
        <td id="LC4433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no real confidence could ever subsist between them again. Her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4434"></td>
        <td id="LC4434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disappointment in Charlotte made her turn with fonder regard to her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4435"></td>
        <td id="LC4435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sister, of whose rectitude and delicacy she was sure her opinion could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4436"></td>
        <td id="LC4436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never be shaken, and for whose happiness she grew daily more anxious,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4437"></td>
        <td id="LC4437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as Bingley had now been gone a week and nothing more was heard of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4438"></td>
        <td id="LC4438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">return.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4439"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4440"></td>
        <td id="LC4440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jane had sent Caroline an early answer to her letter, and was counting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4441"></td>
        <td id="LC4441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the days till she might reasonably hope to hear again. The promised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4442"></td>
        <td id="LC4442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter of thanks from Mr. Collins arrived on Tuesday, addressed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4443"></td>
        <td id="LC4443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their father, and written with all the solemnity of gratitude which a</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4444"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4445"></td>
        <td id="LC4445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his conscience on that head, he proceeded to inform them, with many</td>

        <td id="L4446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4446"></td>

        <td id="L4447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4447"></td>

        <td id="L4448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4448"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4449"></td>
        <td id="LC4449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to close with their kind wish of seeing him again at Longbourn, whither</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC4450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he hoped to be able to return on Monday fortnight; for Lady Catherine,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4451"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4453"></td>
        <td id="LC4453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">argument with his amiable Charlotte to name an early day for making him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4454"></td>
        <td id="LC4454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the happiest of men.</td>

        <td id="L4455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4455"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4456"></td>
        <td id="LC4456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Collins&#39;s return into Hertfordshire was no longer a matter of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4457"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4459"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4463"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4464"></td>
        <td id="LC4464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absence.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4465"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4466"></td>
        <td id="LC4466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither Jane nor Elizabeth were comfortable on this subject. Day after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4467"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4471"></td>
        <td id="LC4471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">falsehood.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4472"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4473"></td>
        <td id="LC4473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Even Elizabeth began to fear--not that Bingley was indifferent--but that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4474"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4476"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4478"></td>

        <td id="L4479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4479"></td>
        <td id="LC4479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darcy and the amusements of London might be too much, she feared, for</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4480"></td>
        <td id="LC4480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the strength of his attachment.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4481"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4482"></td>
        <td id="LC4482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As for Jane, _her_ anxiety under this suspense was, of course, more</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4483"></td>

        <td id="L4485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4485"></td>

        <td id="L4487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4487"></td>

        <td id="L4488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4488"></td>
        <td id="LC4488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did not come back she would think herself very ill used. It needed</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4489"></td>

        <td id="L4490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4490"></td>
        <td id="LC4490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tranquillity.</td>

        <td id="L4491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4491"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4492"></td>
        <td id="LC4492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Collins returned most punctually on Monday fortnight, but his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4493"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4495"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4498"></td>
        <td id="LC4498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to make an apology for his absence before the family went to bed.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4499"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4500"></td>
        <td id="LC4500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Bennet was really in a most pitiable state. The very mention of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4501"></td>
        <td id="LC4501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything concerning the match threw her into an agony of ill-humour,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4502"></td>
        <td id="LC4502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and wherever she went she was sure of hearing it talked of. The sight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4503"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4504"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4505"></td>
        <td id="LC4505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, she concluded her to be anticipating the hour of possession; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4506"></td>
        <td id="LC4506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whenever she spoke in a low voice to Mr. Collins, was convinced that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4507"></td>
        <td id="LC4507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were talking of the Longbourn estate, and resolving to turn herself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4508"></td>
        <td id="LC4508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and her daughters out of the house, as soon as Mr. Bennet were dead. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4509"></td>
        <td id="LC4509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complained bitterly of all this to her husband.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4510"></td>
        <td id="LC4510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4511"></td>
        <td id="LC4511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Indeed, Mr. Bennet,&quot; said she, &quot;it is very hard to think that Charlotte</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4512"></td>
        <td id="LC4512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucas should ever be mistress of this house, that I should be forced to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4513"></td>
        <td id="LC4513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make way for _her_, and live to see her take her place in it!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4514"></td>
        <td id="LC4514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4515"></td>
        <td id="LC4515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear, do not give way to such gloomy thoughts. Let us hope for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4516"></td>
        <td id="LC4516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better things. Let us flatter ourselves that I may be the survivor.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4517"></td>
        <td id="LC4517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4518"></td>
        <td id="LC4518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This was not very consoling to Mrs. Bennet, and therefore, instead of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4519"></td>
        <td id="LC4519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">making any answer, she went on as before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4520"></td>
        <td id="LC4520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4521"></td>
        <td id="LC4521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I cannot bear to think that they should have all this estate. If it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4522"></td>
        <td id="LC4522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not for the entail, I should not mind it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4523"></td>
        <td id="LC4523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4524"></td>
        <td id="LC4524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What should not you mind?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4525"></td>
        <td id="LC4525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4526"></td>
        <td id="LC4526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I should not mind anything at all.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4527"></td>
        <td id="LC4527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4528"></td>
        <td id="LC4528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Let us be thankful that you are preserved from a state of such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4529"></td>
        <td id="LC4529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">insensibility.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4530"></td>
        <td id="LC4530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4531"></td>
        <td id="LC4531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I never can be thankful, Mr. Bennet, for anything about the entail. How</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4532"></td>
        <td id="LC4532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anyone could have the conscience to entail away an estate from one&#39;s own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4533"></td>
        <td id="LC4533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daughters, I cannot understand; and all for the sake of Mr. Collins too!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4534"></td>
        <td id="LC4534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Why should _he_ have it more than anybody else?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4535"></td>
        <td id="LC4535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4536"></td>
        <td id="LC4536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I leave it to yourself to determine,&quot; said Mr. Bennet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4537"></td>
        <td id="LC4537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4538"></td>
        <td id="LC4538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4539"></td>
        <td id="LC4539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4540"></td>
        <td id="LC4540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chapter 24</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4541"></td>
        <td id="LC4541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4542"></td>
        <td id="LC4542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4543"></td>
        <td id="LC4543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Bingley&#39;s letter arrived, and put an end to doubt. The very first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4544"></td>
        <td id="LC4544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sentence conveyed the assurance of their being all settled in London for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4545"></td>
        <td id="LC4545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the winter, and concluded with her brother&#39;s regret at not having had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4546"></td>
        <td id="LC4546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time to pay his respects to his friends in Hertfordshire before he left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4547"></td>
        <td id="LC4547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the country.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4548"></td>
        <td id="LC4548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4549"></td>
        <td id="LC4549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hope was over, entirely over; and when Jane could attend to the rest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4550"></td>
        <td id="LC4550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the letter, she found little, except the professed affection of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4551"></td>
        <td id="LC4551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">writer, that could give her any comfort. Miss Darcy&#39;s praise occupied</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4552"></td>
        <td id="LC4552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the chief of it. Her many attractions were again dwelt on, and Caroline</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4553"></td>
        <td id="LC4553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boasted joyfully of their increasing intimacy, and ventured to predict</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4554"></td>
        <td id="LC4554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the accomplishment of the wishes which had been unfolded in her former</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4555"></td>
        <td id="LC4555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter. She wrote also with great pleasure of her brother&#39;s being an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4556"></td>
        <td id="LC4556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inmate of Mr. Darcy&#39;s house, and mentioned with raptures some plans of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4557"></td>
        <td id="LC4557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the latter with regard to new furniture.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4558"></td>
        <td id="LC4558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4559"></td>
        <td id="LC4559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth, to whom Jane very soon communicated the chief of all this,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4560"></td>
        <td id="LC4560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard it in silent indignation. Her heart was divided between concern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4561"></td>
        <td id="LC4561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for her sister, and resentment against all others. To Caroline&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4562"></td>
        <td id="LC4562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assertion of her brother&#39;s being partial to Miss Darcy she paid no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4563"></td>
        <td id="LC4563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">credit. That he was really fond of Jane, she doubted no more than she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4564"></td>
        <td id="LC4564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had ever done; and much as she had always been disposed to like him, she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4565"></td>
        <td id="LC4565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not think without anger, hardly without contempt, on that easiness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4566"></td>
        <td id="LC4566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of temper, that want of proper resolution, which now made him the slave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4567"></td>
        <td id="LC4567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his designing friends, and led him to sacrifice of his own happiness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4568"></td>
        <td id="LC4568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the caprice of their inclination. Had his own happiness, however,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4569"></td>
        <td id="LC4569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been the only sacrifice, he might have been allowed to sport with it in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4570"></td>
        <td id="LC4570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whatever manner he thought best, but her sister&#39;s was involved in it, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4571"></td>
        <td id="LC4571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she thought he must be sensible himself. It was a subject, in short,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4572"></td>
        <td id="LC4572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on which reflection would be long indulged, and must be unavailing. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4573"></td>
        <td id="LC4573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could think of nothing else; and yet whether Bingley&#39;s regard had really</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4574"></td>
        <td id="LC4574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">died away, or were suppressed by his friends&#39; interference; whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4575"></td>
        <td id="LC4575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he had been aware of Jane&#39;s attachment, or whether it had escaped his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4576"></td>
        <td id="LC4576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observation; whatever were the case, though her opinion of him must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4577"></td>
        <td id="LC4577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">materially affected by the difference, her sister&#39;s situation remained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4578"></td>
        <td id="LC4578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same, her peace equally wounded.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4579"></td>
        <td id="LC4579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4580"></td>
        <td id="LC4580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A day or two passed before Jane had courage to speak of her feelings to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4581"></td>
        <td id="LC4581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth; but at last, on Mrs. Bennet&#39;s leaving them together, after a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4582"></td>
        <td id="LC4582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">longer irritation than usual about Netherfield and its master, she could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4583"></td>
        <td id="LC4583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not help saying:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4584"></td>
        <td id="LC4584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4585"></td>
        <td id="LC4585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, that my dear mother had more command over herself! She can have no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4586"></td>
        <td id="LC4586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">idea of the pain she gives me by her continual reflections on him. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4587"></td>
        <td id="LC4587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will not repine. It cannot last long. He will be forgot, and we shall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4588"></td>
        <td id="LC4588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all be as we were before.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4589"></td>
        <td id="LC4589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4590"></td>
        <td id="LC4590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth looked at her sister with incredulous solicitude, but said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4591"></td>
        <td id="LC4591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4592"></td>
        <td id="LC4592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4593"></td>
        <td id="LC4593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You doubt me,&quot; cried Jane, slightly colouring; &quot;indeed, you have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4594"></td>
        <td id="LC4594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no reason. He may live in my memory as the most amiable man of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4595"></td>
        <td id="LC4595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquaintance, but that is all. I have nothing either to hope or fear,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4596"></td>
        <td id="LC4596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and nothing to reproach him with. Thank God! I have not _that_ pain. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4597"></td>
        <td id="LC4597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little time, therefore--I shall certainly try to get the better.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4598"></td>
        <td id="LC4598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4599"></td>
        <td id="LC4599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With a stronger voice she soon added, &quot;I have this comfort immediately,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4600"></td>
        <td id="LC4600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that it has not been more than an error of fancy on my side, and that it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4601"></td>
        <td id="LC4601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has done no harm to anyone but myself.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4602"></td>
        <td id="LC4602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4603"></td>
        <td id="LC4603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear Jane!&quot; exclaimed Elizabeth, &quot;you are too good. Your sweetness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4604"></td>
        <td id="LC4604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and disinterestedness are really angelic; I do not know what to say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4605"></td>
        <td id="LC4605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to you. I feel as if I had never done you justice, or loved you as you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4606"></td>
        <td id="LC4606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deserve.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4607"></td>
        <td id="LC4607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4608"></td>
        <td id="LC4608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Bennet eagerly disclaimed all extraordinary merit, and threw back</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4609"></td>
        <td id="LC4609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the praise on her sister&#39;s warm affection.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4610"></td>
        <td id="LC4610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4611"></td>
        <td id="LC4611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Nay,&quot; said Elizabeth, &quot;this is not fair. _You_ wish to think all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4612"></td>
        <td id="LC4612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world respectable, and are hurt if I speak ill of anybody. I only want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4613"></td>
        <td id="LC4613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to think _you_ perfect, and you set yourself against it. Do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4614"></td>
        <td id="LC4614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be afraid of my running into any excess, of my encroaching on your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4615"></td>
        <td id="LC4615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">privilege of universal good-will. You need not. There are few people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4616"></td>
        <td id="LC4616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom I really love, and still fewer of whom I think well. The more I see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4617"></td>
        <td id="LC4617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the world, the more am I dissatisfied with it; and every day confirms</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4618"></td>
        <td id="LC4618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my belief of the inconsistency of all human characters, and of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4619"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4701"></td>
        <td id="LC4701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Bennet still continued to wonder and repine at his returning no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4702"></td>
        <td id="LC4702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more, and though a day seldom passed in which Elizabeth did not account</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4703"></td>
        <td id="LC4703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for it clearly, there was little chance of her ever considering it with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4704"></td>
        <td id="LC4704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">less perplexity. Her daughter endeavoured to convince her of what she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4705"></td>
        <td id="LC4705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did not believe herself, that his attentions to Jane had been merely the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4706"></td>
        <td id="LC4706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effect of a common and transient liking, which ceased when he saw her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4707"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4708"></td>
        <td id="LC4708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the time, she had the same story to repeat every day. Mrs. Bennet&#39;s best</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4709"></td>
        <td id="LC4709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comfort was that Mr. Bingley must be down again in the summer.</td>

        <td id="L4710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4710"></td>

        <td id="L4711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4711"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4712"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4713"></td>
        <td id="LC4713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being married, a girl likes to be crossed a little in love now and then.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4714"></td>
        <td id="LC4714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is something to think of, and it gives her a sort of distinction</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4717"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4718"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4728"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L4736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4736"></td>

</td>
