      <tr>
        <td id="L4747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4747"></td>
        <td id="LC4747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a week spent in professions of love and schemes of felicity,</td>

        <td id="L4748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4748"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4757"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4759"></td>

        <td id="L4760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4760"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4761"></td>
        <td id="LC4761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ladies would have had difficulty in believing that a man who lived</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4762"></td>

        <td id="L4763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4763"></td>
        <td id="LC4763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well-bred and agreeable. Mrs. Gardiner, who was several years younger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4764"></td>
        <td id="LC4764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than Mrs. Bennet and Mrs. Phillips, was an amiable, intelligent, elegant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4765"></td>
        <td id="LC4765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woman, and a great favourite with all her Longbourn nieces. Between the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4766"></td>
        <td id="LC4766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two eldest and herself especially, there subsisted a particular regard.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4767"></td>
        <td id="LC4767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They had frequently been staying with her in town.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4768"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4769"></td>
        <td id="LC4769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The first part of Mrs. Gardiner&#39;s business on her arrival was to</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4771"></td>
        <td id="LC4771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done she had a less active part to play. It became her turn to listen.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4772"></td>
        <td id="LC4772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Bennet had many grievances to relate, and much to complain of. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4773"></td>
        <td id="LC4773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had all been very ill-used since she last saw her sister. Two of her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4774"></td>
        <td id="LC4774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girls had been upon the point of marriage, and after all there was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4775"></td>
        <td id="LC4775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing in it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4776"></td>
        <td id="LC4776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4777"></td>
        <td id="LC4777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I do not blame Jane,&quot; she continued, &quot;for Jane would have got Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4778"></td>
        <td id="LC4778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bingley if she could. But Lizzy! Oh, sister! It is very hard to think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4779"></td>
        <td id="LC4779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that she might have been Mr. Collins&#39;s wife by this time, had it not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4780"></td>
        <td id="LC4780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been for her own perverseness. He made her an offer in this very room,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4781"></td>
        <td id="LC4781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and she refused him. The consequence of it is, that Lady Lucas will have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4782"></td>
        <td id="LC4782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a daughter married before I have, and that the Longbourn estate is just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4783"></td>
        <td id="LC4783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as much entailed as ever. The Lucases are very artful people indeed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4784"></td>
        <td id="LC4784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sister. They are all for what they can get. I am sorry to say it of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4785"></td>
        <td id="LC4785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, but so it is. It makes me very nervous and poorly, to be thwarted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4786"></td>
        <td id="LC4786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so in my own family, and to have neighbours who think of themselves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4787"></td>
        <td id="LC4787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before anybody else. However, your coming just at this time is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4788"></td>
        <td id="LC4788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greatest of comforts, and I am very glad to hear what you tell us, of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4789"></td>
        <td id="LC4789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long sleeves.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4790"></td>
        <td id="LC4790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4791"></td>
        <td id="LC4791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Gardiner, to whom the chief of this news had been given before,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4792"></td>
        <td id="LC4792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the course of Jane and Elizabeth&#39;s correspondence with her, made her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4793"></td>
        <td id="LC4793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sister a slight answer, and, in compassion to her nieces, turned the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4794"></td>
        <td id="LC4794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation.</td>

        <td id="L4887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4887"></td>
        <td id="LC4887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intelligence of her former friends than she had been in the way of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4888"></td>
        <td id="LC4888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">procuring.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4889"></td>
        <td id="LC4889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4890"></td>
        <td id="LC4890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Gardiner had seen Pemberley, and known the late Mr. Darcy by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4891"></td>
        <td id="LC4891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">character perfectly well. Here consequently was an inexhaustible subject</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4892"></td>
        <td id="LC4892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of discourse. In comparing her recollection of Pemberley with the minute</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4893"></td>
        <td id="LC4893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">description which Wickham could give, and in bestowing her tribute of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4894"></td>
        <td id="LC4894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">praise on the character of its late possessor, she was delighting both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4895"></td>
        <td id="LC4895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him and herself. On being made acquainted with the present Mr. Darcy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4896"></td>
        <td id="LC4896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treatment of him, she tried to remember some of that gentleman&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4897"></td>
        <td id="LC4897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reputed disposition when quite a lad which might agree with it, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4898"></td>
        <td id="LC4898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was confident at last that she recollected having heard Mr. Fitzwilliam</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4899"></td>
        <td id="LC4899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darcy formerly spoken of as a very proud, ill-natured boy.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4900"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L4903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4903"></td>
        <td id="LC4903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chapter 26</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4904"></td>
        <td id="LC4904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4905"></td>
        <td id="LC4905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4906"></td>
        <td id="LC4906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Gardiner&#39;s caution to Elizabeth was punctually and kindly given</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4907"></td>
        <td id="LC4907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the first favourable opportunity of speaking to her alone; after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4908"></td>
        <td id="LC4908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honestly telling her what she thought, she thus went on:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4909"></td>
        <td id="LC4909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4910"></td>
        <td id="LC4910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You are too sensible a girl, Lizzy, to fall in love merely because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4911"></td>
        <td id="LC4911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you are warned against it; and, therefore, I am not afraid of speaking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4912"></td>
        <td id="LC4912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">openly. Seriously, I would have you be on your guard. Do not involve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4913"></td>
        <td id="LC4913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yourself or endeavour to involve him in an affection which the want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4914"></td>
        <td id="LC4914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of fortune would make so very imprudent. I have nothing to say against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4915"></td>
        <td id="LC4915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_him_; he is a most interesting young man; and if he had the fortune he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4916"></td>
        <td id="LC4916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ought to have, I should think you could not do better. But as it is, you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4917"></td>
        <td id="LC4917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must not let your fancy run away with you. You have sense, and we all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4918"></td>
        <td id="LC4918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expect you to use it. Your father would depend on _your_ resolution and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4919"></td>
        <td id="LC4919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good conduct, I am sure. You must not disappoint your father.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4920"></td>
        <td id="LC4920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4921"></td>
        <td id="LC4921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear aunt, this is being serious indeed.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4922"></td>
        <td id="LC4922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4923"></td>
        <td id="LC4923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, and I hope to engage you to be serious likewise.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4924"></td>
        <td id="LC4924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4925"></td>
        <td id="LC4925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, then, you need not be under any alarm. I will take care of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4926"></td>
        <td id="LC4926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself, and of Mr. Wickham too. He shall not be in love with me, if I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4927"></td>
        <td id="LC4927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can prevent it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4928"></td>
        <td id="LC4928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4929"></td>
        <td id="LC4929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Elizabeth, you are not serious now.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4930"></td>
        <td id="LC4930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4931"></td>
        <td id="LC4931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I beg your pardon, I will try again. At present I am not in love with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4932"></td>
        <td id="LC4932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Wickham; no, I certainly am not. But he is, beyond all comparison,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4933"></td>
        <td id="LC4933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the most agreeable man I ever saw--and if he becomes really attached to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4934"></td>
        <td id="LC4934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me--I believe it will be better that he should not. I see the imprudence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4935"></td>
        <td id="LC4935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it. Oh! _that_ abominable Mr. Darcy! My father&#39;s opinion of me does</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4936"></td>
        <td id="LC4936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me the greatest honour, and I should be miserable to forfeit it. My</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4937"></td>
        <td id="LC4937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father, however, is partial to Mr. Wickham. In short, my dear aunt, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4938"></td>
        <td id="LC4938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should be very sorry to be the means of making any of you unhappy; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4939"></td>
        <td id="LC4939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since we see every day that where there is affection, young people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4940"></td>
        <td id="LC4940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are seldom withheld by immediate want of fortune from entering into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4941"></td>
        <td id="LC4941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engagements with each other, how can I promise to be wiser than so many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4942"></td>
        <td id="LC4942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my fellow-creatures if I am tempted, or how am I even to know that it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4943"></td>
        <td id="LC4943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be wisdom to resist? All that I can promise you, therefore, is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4944"></td>
        <td id="LC4944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be in a hurry. I will not be in a hurry to believe myself his first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4945"></td>
        <td id="LC4945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">object. When I am in company with him, I will not be wishing. In short,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4946"></td>
        <td id="LC4946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will do my best.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4947"></td>
        <td id="LC4947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4948"></td>
        <td id="LC4948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Perhaps it will be as well if you discourage his coming here so very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4949"></td>
        <td id="LC4949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">often. At least, you should not _remind_ your mother of inviting him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4950"></td>
        <td id="LC4950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4951"></td>
        <td id="LC4951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;As I did the other day,&quot; said Elizabeth with a conscious smile: &quot;very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4952"></td>
        <td id="LC4952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">true, it will be wise in me to refrain from _that_. But do not imagine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4953"></td>
        <td id="LC4953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he is always here so often. It is on your account that he has been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4954"></td>
        <td id="LC4954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so frequently invited this week. You know my mother&#39;s ideas as to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4955"></td>
        <td id="LC4955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessity of constant company for her friends. But really, and upon my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4956"></td>
        <td id="LC4956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour, I will try to do what I think to be the wisest; and now I hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4957"></td>
        <td id="LC4957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you are satisfied.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4958"></td>
        <td id="LC4958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4959"></td>
        <td id="LC4959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her aunt assured her that she was, and Elizabeth having thanked her for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4960"></td>
        <td id="LC4960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the kindness of her hints, they parted; a wonderful instance of advice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4961"></td>
        <td id="LC4961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being given on such a point, without being resented.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4962"></td>
        <td id="LC4962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4963"></td>
        <td id="LC4963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Collins returned into Hertfordshire soon after it had been quitted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4964"></td>
        <td id="LC4964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by the Gardiners and Jane; but as he took up his abode with the Lucases,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4965"></td>
        <td id="LC4965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his arrival was no great inconvenience to Mrs. Bennet. His marriage was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4966"></td>
        <td id="LC4966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now fast approaching, and she was at length so far resigned as to think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4967"></td>
        <td id="LC4967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it inevitable, and even repeatedly to say, in an ill-natured tone, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4968"></td>
        <td id="LC4968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she &quot;_wished_ they might be happy.&quot; Thursday was to be the wedding day,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4969"></td>
        <td id="LC4969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and on Wednesday Miss Lucas paid her farewell visit; and when she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4970"></td>
        <td id="LC4970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rose to take leave, Elizabeth, ashamed of her mother&#39;s ungracious and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4971"></td>
        <td id="LC4971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reluctant good wishes, and sincerely affected herself, accompanied her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4972"></td>
        <td id="LC4972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of the room. As they went downstairs together, Charlotte said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4973"></td>
        <td id="LC4973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4974"></td>
        <td id="LC4974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I shall depend on hearing from you very often, Eliza.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4975"></td>
        <td id="LC4975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4976"></td>
        <td id="LC4976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_That_ you certainly shall.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4977"></td>
        <td id="LC4977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4978"></td>
        <td id="LC4978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And I have another favour to ask you. Will you come and see me?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4979"></td>
        <td id="LC4979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4980"></td>
        <td id="LC4980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We shall often meet, I hope, in Hertfordshire.&quot;</td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4985"></td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5012"></td>

        <td id="L5015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5015"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5016"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5024"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5025"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5026"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5027"></td>
        <td id="LC5027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glad to see me, and reproached me for giving her no notice of my coming</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5030"></td>

        <td id="L5031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5031"></td>

        <td id="L5032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5032"></td>

        <td id="L5034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5034"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5035"></td>
        <td id="LC5035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth shook her head over this letter. It convinced her that</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC5036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accident only could discover to Mr. Bingley her sister&#39;s being in town.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5038"></td>
        <td id="LC5038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Four weeks passed away, and Jane saw nothing of him. She endeavoured to</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5043"></td>
        <td id="LC5043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the alteration of her manner would allow Jane to deceive herself no</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5045"></td>
        <td id="LC5045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prove what she felt.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5046"></td>
        <td id="LC5046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5047"></td>
        <td id="LC5047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dearest Lizzy will, I am sure, be incapable of triumphing in her</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC5048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better judgement, at my expense, when I confess myself to have been</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5049"></td>

        <td id="LC5051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still assert that, considering what her behaviour was, my confidence was</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5052"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5053"></td>
        <td id="LC5053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wishing to be intimate with me; but if the same circumstances were to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC5054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happen again, I am sure I should be deceived again. Caroline did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5055"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC5056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">receive in the meantime. When she did come, it was very evident that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5057"></td>
        <td id="LC5057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she had no pleasure in it; she made a slight, formal apology, for not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5058"></td>
        <td id="LC5058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">calling before, said not a word of wishing to see me again, and was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5059"></td>
        <td id="LC5059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in every respect so altered a creature, that when she went away I was</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5060"></td>
        <td id="LC5060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfectly resolved to continue the acquaintance no longer. I pity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5061"></td>
        <td id="LC5061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though I cannot help blaming her. She was very wrong in singling me out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5062"></td>
        <td id="LC5062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as she did; I can safely say that every advance to intimacy began on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5063"></td>
        <td id="LC5063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her side. But I pity her, because she must feel that she has been acting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5064"></td>
        <td id="LC5064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrong, and because I am very sure that anxiety for her brother is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5065"></td>
        <td id="LC5065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cause of it. I need not explain myself farther; and though _we_ know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5066"></td>
        <td id="LC5066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this anxiety to be quite needless, yet if she feels it, it will easily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5067"></td>
        <td id="LC5067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">account for her behaviour to me; and so deservedly dear as he is to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5068"></td>
        <td id="LC5068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his sister, whatever anxiety she must feel on his behalf is natural and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5069"></td>
        <td id="LC5069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amiable. I cannot but wonder, however, at her having any such fears now,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5070"></td>
        <td id="LC5070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because, if he had at all cared about me, we must have met, long ago.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5071"></td>
        <td id="LC5071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He knows of my being in town, I am certain, from something she said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L5163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5163"></td>
        <td id="LC5163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether married or single, he must always be her model of the amiable</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5257"></td>
        <td id="LC5257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear aunt,&quot; she rapturously cried, &quot;what delight! what felicity! You</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5258"></td>
        <td id="LC5258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give me fresh life and vigour. Adieu to disappointment and spleen. What</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5259"></td>
        <td id="LC5259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are young men to rocks and mountains? Oh! what hours of transport</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5260"></td>
        <td id="LC5260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we shall spend! And when we _do_ return, it shall not be like other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5261"></td>
        <td id="LC5261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">travellers, without being able to give one accurate idea of anything. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5262"></td>
        <td id="LC5262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_will_ know where we have gone--we _will_ recollect what we have seen.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5263"></td>
        <td id="LC5263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lakes, mountains, and rivers shall not be jumbled together in our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5264"></td>
        <td id="LC5264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imaginations; nor when we attempt to describe any particular scene,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5265"></td>
        <td id="LC5265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will we begin quarreling about its relative situation. Let _our_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5266"></td>
        <td id="LC5266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first effusions be less insupportable than those of the generality of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC5267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">travellers.&quot;</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5274"></td>
        <td id="LC5274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every object in the next day&#39;s journey was new and interesting to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5275"></td>
        <td id="LC5275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth; and her spirits were in a state of enjoyment; for she had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5276"></td>
        <td id="LC5276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen her sister looking so well as to banish all fear for her health,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5277"></td>

        <td id="L5278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5278"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5279"></td>
        <td id="LC5279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When they left the high road for the lane to Hunsford, every eye was in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5280"></td>
        <td id="LC5280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">search of the Parsonage, and every turning expected to bring it in view.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5281"></td>
        <td id="LC5281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The palings of Rosings Park was their boundary on one side. Elizabeth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5282"></td>
        <td id="LC5282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smiled at the recollection of all that she had heard of its inhabitants.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5283"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5284"></td>
        <td id="LC5284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At length the Parsonage was discernible. The garden sloping to the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC5285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">road, the house standing in it, the green pales, and the laurel hedge,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5286"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5287"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5288"></td>

        <td id="L5290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5290"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5297"></td>

        <td id="L5301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5301"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5302"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5342"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5343"></td>

        <td id="L5344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5344"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5345"></td>
        <td id="LC5345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in, observed:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5346"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5347"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5348"></td>
        <td id="LC5348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">de Bourgh on the ensuing Sunday at church, and I need not say you will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5349"></td>
        <td id="LC5349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be delighted with her. She is all affability and condescension, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L5442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5442"></td>
        <td id="LC5442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;from that knowledge of what the manners of the great really are, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5443"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5536"></td>
        <td id="LC5536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between Charlotte and Miss de Bourgh--the former of whom was engaged in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5537"></td>
        <td id="LC5537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">listening to Lady Catherine, and the latter said not a word to her all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5538"></td>
        <td id="LC5538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dinner-time. Mrs. Jenkinson was chiefly employed in watching how little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5539"></td>
        <td id="LC5539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss de Bourgh ate, pressing her to try some other dish, and fearing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5540"></td>
        <td id="LC5540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she was indisposed. Maria thought speaking out of the question, and the</td>

        <td id="LC5541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentlemen did nothing but eat and admire.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5543"></td>
        <td id="LC5543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the ladies returned to the drawing-room, there was little to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5544"></td>

        <td id="L5549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5549"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5630"></td>
        <td id="LC5630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">younger ones out before the elder ones are married! Your younger sisters</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5634"></td>

        <td id="L5718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5718"></td>

        <td id="L5719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5719"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5721"></td>
        <td id="LC5721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and nothing escaped her observation that was passing in the room during</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5722"></td>
        <td id="LC5722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these visits. She examined into their employments, looked at their work,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5723"></td>
        <td id="LC5723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and advised them to do it differently; found fault with the arrangement</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5724"></td>

        <td id="LC5725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accepted any refreshment, seemed to do it only for the sake of finding</td>

        <td id="LC5726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out that Mrs. Collins&#39;s joints of meat were too large for her family.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5728"></td>
        <td id="LC5728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth soon perceived, that though this great lady was not in</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5812"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5813"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5814"></td>
        <td id="LC5814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of their engagements at Rosings. It was some days, however, before they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5815"></td>
        <td id="LC5815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received any invitation thither--for while there were visitors in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5816"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5908"></td>

        <td id="L5982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5982"></td>
        <td id="LC5982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth was sitting by herself the next morning, and writing to Jane</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L5996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5996"></td>

        <td id="L5997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5997"></td>

        <td id="L5999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5999"></td>

        <td id="L6000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6000"></td>
        <td id="LC6000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">departure, she observed:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6001"></td>
        <td id="LC6001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC6188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, I should have turned in a moment.&quot;</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6376"></td>
        <td id="LC6376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shameful boast of what misery he had been able to inflict, gave her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6377"></td>
        <td id="LC6377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a keener sense of her sister&#39;s sufferings. It was some consolation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6378"></td>
        <td id="LC6378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to think that his visit to Rosings was to end on the day after the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6379"></td>
        <td id="LC6379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">next--and, a still greater, that in less than a fortnight she should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6380"></td>
        <td id="LC6380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself be with Jane again, and enabled to contribute to the recovery of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6381"></td>
        <td id="LC6381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her spirits, by all that affection could do.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6382"></td>
        <td id="LC6382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6383"></td>
        <td id="LC6383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She could not think of Darcy&#39;s leaving Kent without remembering that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6384"></td>
        <td id="LC6384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his cousin was to go with him; but Colonel Fitzwilliam had made it clear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6385"></td>
        <td id="LC6385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he had no intentions at all, and agreeable as he was, she did not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6386"></td>
        <td id="LC6386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mean to be unhappy about him.</td>

        <td id="L6387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6387"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6388"></td>
        <td id="LC6388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While settling this point, she was suddenly roused by the sound of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6389"></td>
        <td id="LC6389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door-bell, and her spirits were a little fluttered by the idea of its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6390"></td>
        <td id="LC6390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being Colonel Fitzwilliam himself, who had once before called late in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6391"></td>
        <td id="LC6391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the evening, and might now come to inquire particularly after her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6392"></td>
        <td id="LC6392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But this idea was soon banished, and her spirits were very differently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6393"></td>
        <td id="LC6393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affected, when, to her utter amazement, she saw Mr. Darcy walk into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6394"></td>
        <td id="LC6394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room. In an hurried manner he immediately began an inquiry after her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6395"></td>
        <td id="LC6395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">health, imputing his visit to a wish of hearing that she were better.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6396"></td>
        <td id="LC6396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She answered him with cold civility. He sat down for a few moments, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6397"></td>
        <td id="LC6397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then getting up, walked about the room. Elizabeth was surprised, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6398"></td>
        <td id="LC6398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said not a word. After a silence of several minutes, he came towards her</td>

        <td id="L6399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6399"></td>

        <td id="L6400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6400"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6401"></td>
        <td id="LC6401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;In vain I have struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6404"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6405"></td>
        <td id="LC6405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth&#39;s astonishment was beyond expression. She stared, coloured,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6406"></td>
        <td id="LC6406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubted, and was silent. This he considered sufficient encouragement;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6407"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6409"></td>
        <td id="LC6409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those of the heart to be detailed; and he was not more eloquent on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6410"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6411"></td>
        <td id="LC6411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its being a degradation--of the family obstacles which had always</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6413"></td>
        <td id="LC6413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the consequence he was wounding, but was very unlikely to recommend his</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6414"></td>

        <td id="L6415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6415"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6416"></td>
        <td id="LC6416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In spite of her deeply-rooted dislike, she could not be insensible to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6417"></td>
        <td id="LC6417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the compliment of such a man&#39;s affection, and though her intentions did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6418"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC6421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer him with patience, when he should have done. He concluded with</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6422"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6423"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6424"></td>
        <td id="LC6424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expressing his hope that it would now be rewarded by her acceptance of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6427"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6429"></td>
        <td id="LC6429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cheeks, and she said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6430"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6431"></td>
        <td id="LC6431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;In such cases as this, it is, I believe, the established mode to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6432"></td>
        <td id="LC6432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">express a sense of obligation for the sentiments avowed, however</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6433"></td>

        <td id="L6435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6435"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6439"></td>
        <td id="LC6439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the acknowledgment of your regard, can have little difficulty in</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6440"></td>
        <td id="LC6440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overcoming it after this explanation.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6441"></td>
        <td id="LC6441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6442"></td>
        <td id="LC6442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Darcy, who was leaning against the mantelpiece with his eyes fixed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6443"></td>
        <td id="LC6443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on her face, seemed to catch her words with no less resentment than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6444"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6445"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6448"></td>
        <td id="LC6448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreadful. At length, with a voice of forced calmness, he said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6449"></td>
        <td id="LC6449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6450"></td>
        <td id="LC6450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And this is all the reply which I am to have the honour of expecting!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6451"></td>
        <td id="LC6451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I might, perhaps, wish to be informed why, with so little _endeavour_ at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6452"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6453"></td>
        <td id="LC6453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6454"></td>
        <td id="LC6454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I might as well inquire,&quot; replied she, &quot;why with so evident a desire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6455"></td>
        <td id="LC6455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of offending and insulting me, you chose to tell me that you liked me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6456"></td>
        <td id="LC6456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against your will, against your reason, and even against your character?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6457"></td>
        <td id="LC6457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Was not this some excuse for incivility, if I _was_ uncivil? But I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6458"></td>
        <td id="LC6458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other provocations. You know I have. Had not my feelings decided against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6459"></td>
        <td id="LC6459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you--had they been indifferent, or had they even been favourable, do you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6460"></td>
        <td id="LC6460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think that any consideration would tempt me to accept the man who has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6461"></td>
        <td id="LC6461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been the means of ruining, perhaps for ever, the happiness of a most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6462"></td>
        <td id="LC6462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beloved sister?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6463"></td>
        <td id="LC6463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6464"></td>
        <td id="LC6464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As she pronounced these words, Mr. Darcy changed colour; but the emotion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6465"></td>
        <td id="LC6465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was short, and he listened without attempting to interrupt her while she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6466"></td>
        <td id="LC6466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continued:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6467"></td>
        <td id="LC6467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6468"></td>
        <td id="LC6468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have every reason in the world to think ill of you. No motive can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6469"></td>
        <td id="LC6469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excuse the unjust and ungenerous part you acted _there_. You dare not,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6470"></td>
        <td id="LC6470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you cannot deny, that you have been the principal, if not the only means</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6471"></td>
        <td id="LC6471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of dividing them from each other--of exposing one to the censure of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6472"></td>
        <td id="LC6472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world for caprice and instability, and the other to its derision for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6473"></td>
        <td id="LC6473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disappointed hopes, and involving them both in misery of the acutest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6474"></td>
        <td id="LC6474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6475"></td>
        <td id="LC6475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6476"></td>
        <td id="LC6476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She paused, and saw with no slight indignation that he was listening</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6477"></td>
        <td id="LC6477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with an air which proved him wholly unmoved by any feeling of remorse.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6478"></td>
        <td id="LC6478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He even looked at her with a smile of affected incredulity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6479"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6482"></td>

        <td id="L6483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6483"></td>
        <td id="LC6483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I did everything in my power to separate my friend from your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6484"></td>
        <td id="LC6484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sister, or that I rejoice in my success. Towards _him_ I have been</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6491"></td>
        <td id="LC6491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is founded. Long before it had taken place my opinion of you was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6492"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6506"></td>

        <td id="LC6507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him to his present state of poverty--comparative poverty. You have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6508"></td>
        <td id="LC6508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">withheld the advantages which you must know to have been designed for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6509"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC6510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was no less his due than his desert. You have done all this!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6511"></td>
        <td id="LC6511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and yet you can treat the mention of his misfortune with contempt and</td>

        <td id="L6513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6513"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6514"></td>

        <td id="L6515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6515"></td>

        <td id="L6516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6516"></td>
        <td id="LC6516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I thank you for explaining it so fully. My faults, according to this</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC6519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overlooked, had not your pride been hurt by my honest confession of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6520"></td>
        <td id="LC6520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scruples that had long prevented my forming any serious design. These</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6521"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6525"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6546"></td>

        <td id="LC6549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the feelings of others, were such as to form the groundwork of</td>

        <td id="LC6550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disapprobation on which succeeding events have built so immovable a</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6551"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6552"></td>
        <td id="LC6552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last man in the world whom I could ever be prevailed on to marry.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6553"></td>
        <td id="LC6553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6554"></td>
        <td id="LC6554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You have said quite enough, madam. I perfectly comprehend your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
