        <td id="LC6555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feelings, and have now only to be ashamed of what my own have been.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6556"></td>
        <td id="LC6556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Forgive me for having taken up so much of your time, and accept my best</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6557"></td>
        <td id="LC6557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wishes for your health and happiness.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6558"></td>
        <td id="LC6558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6559"></td>
        <td id="LC6559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And with these words he hastily left the room, and Elizabeth heard him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6560"></td>
        <td id="LC6560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the next moment open the front door and quit the house.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6561"></td>
        <td id="LC6561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6562"></td>
        <td id="LC6562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The tumult of her mind, was now painfully great. She knew not how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6563"></td>
        <td id="LC6563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to support herself, and from actual weakness sat down and cried for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6564"></td>
        <td id="LC6564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half-an-hour. Her astonishment, as she reflected on what had passed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6565"></td>
        <td id="LC6565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was increased by every review of it. That she should receive an offer of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6566"></td>
        <td id="LC6566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marriage from Mr. Darcy! That he should have been in love with her for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6567"></td>
        <td id="LC6567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so many months! So much in love as to wish to marry her in spite of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6568"></td>
        <td id="LC6568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the objections which had made him prevent his friend&#39;s marrying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6569"></td>
        <td id="LC6569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her sister, and which must appear at least with equal force in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6570"></td>
        <td id="LC6570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own case--was almost incredible! It was gratifying to have inspired</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6571"></td>
        <td id="LC6571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unconsciously so strong an affection. But his pride, his abominable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6572"></td>
        <td id="LC6572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pride--his shameless avowal of what he had done with respect to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6573"></td>
        <td id="LC6573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jane--his unpardonable assurance in acknowledging, though he could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6574"></td>
        <td id="LC6574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not justify it, and the unfeeling manner in which he had mentioned Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6575"></td>
        <td id="LC6575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wickham, his cruelty towards whom he had not attempted to deny, soon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6576"></td>
        <td id="LC6576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overcame the pity which the consideration of his attachment had for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6577"></td>
        <td id="LC6577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a moment excited. She continued in very agitated reflections till the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6578"></td>
        <td id="LC6578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sound of Lady Catherine&#39;s carriage made her feel how unequal she was to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6579"></td>
        <td id="LC6579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">encounter Charlotte&#39;s observation, and hurried her away to her room.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6580"></td>
        <td id="LC6580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6581"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6582"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6583"></td>
        <td id="LC6583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chapter 35</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6584"></td>
        <td id="LC6584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6585"></td>
        <td id="LC6585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6586"></td>
        <td id="LC6586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth awoke the next morning to the same thoughts and meditations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6587"></td>
        <td id="LC6587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which had at length closed her eyes. She could not yet recover from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6588"></td>
        <td id="LC6588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surprise of what had happened; it was impossible to think of anything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6589"></td>
        <td id="LC6589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">else; and, totally indisposed for employment, she resolved, soon after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6590"></td>
        <td id="LC6590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breakfast, to indulge herself in air and exercise. She was proceeding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6591"></td>
        <td id="LC6591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">directly to her favourite walk, when the recollection of Mr. Darcy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6592"></td>
        <td id="LC6592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sometimes coming there stopped her, and instead of entering the park,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6593"></td>
        <td id="LC6593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she turned up the lane, which led farther from the turnpike-road. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6594"></td>
        <td id="LC6594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">park paling was still the boundary on one side, and she soon passed one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6595"></td>
        <td id="LC6595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the gates into the ground.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6596"></td>
        <td id="LC6596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6597"></td>
        <td id="LC6597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After walking two or three times along that part of the lane, she was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6598"></td>
        <td id="LC6598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tempted, by the pleasantness of the morning, to stop at the gates and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6599"></td>
        <td id="LC6599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">look into the park. The five weeks which she had now passed in Kent had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6600"></td>
        <td id="LC6600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made a great difference in the country, and every day was adding to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6601"></td>
        <td id="LC6601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">verdure of the early trees. She was on the point of continuing her walk,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6602"></td>
        <td id="LC6602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when she caught a glimpse of a gentleman within the sort of grove which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6603"></td>
        <td id="LC6603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">edged the park; he was moving that way; and, fearful of its being Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6604"></td>
        <td id="LC6604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darcy, she was directly retreating. But the person who advanced was now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6605"></td>
        <td id="LC6605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">near enough to see her, and stepping forward with eagerness, pronounced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6606"></td>
        <td id="LC6606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her name. She had turned away; but on hearing herself called, though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6607"></td>
        <td id="LC6607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a voice which proved it to be Mr. Darcy, she moved again towards the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6608"></td>
        <td id="LC6608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gate. He had by that time reached it also, and, holding out a letter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6609"></td>
        <td id="LC6609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which she instinctively took, said, with a look of haughty composure,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6610"></td>
        <td id="LC6610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have been walking in the grove some time in the hope of meeting you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6611"></td>
        <td id="LC6611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Will you do me the honour of reading that letter?&quot; And then, with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6612"></td>
        <td id="LC6612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slight bow, turned again into the plantation, and was soon out of sight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6613"></td>
        <td id="LC6613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6614"></td>
        <td id="LC6614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With no expectation of pleasure, but with the strongest curiosity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6615"></td>
        <td id="LC6615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth opened the letter, and, to her still increasing wonder,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6616"></td>
        <td id="LC6616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perceived an envelope containing two sheets of letter-paper, written</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6617"></td>
        <td id="LC6617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite through, in a very close hand. The envelope itself was likewise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6618"></td>
        <td id="LC6618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">full. Pursuing her way along the lane, she then began it. It was dated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6619"></td>
        <td id="LC6619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from Rosings, at eight o&#39;clock in the morning, and was as follows:--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6620"></td>
        <td id="LC6620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6621"></td>
        <td id="LC6621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Be not alarmed, madam, on receiving this letter, by the apprehension</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6622"></td>
        <td id="LC6622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of its containing any repetition of those sentiments or renewal of those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6623"></td>
        <td id="LC6623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offers which were last night so disgusting to you. I write without any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6624"></td>
        <td id="LC6624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intention of paining you, or humbling myself, by dwelling on wishes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6625"></td>
        <td id="LC6625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which, for the happiness of both, cannot be too soon forgotten; and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6626"></td>
        <td id="LC6626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effort which the formation and the perusal of this letter must occasion,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6627"></td>
        <td id="LC6627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should have been spared, had not my character required it to be written</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6628"></td>
        <td id="LC6628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and read. You must, therefore, pardon the freedom with which I demand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6629"></td>
        <td id="LC6629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your attention; your feelings, I know, will bestow it unwillingly, but I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6630"></td>
        <td id="LC6630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">demand it of your justice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6631"></td>
        <td id="LC6631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6632"></td>
        <td id="LC6632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Two offenses of a very different nature, and by no means of equal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6633"></td>
        <td id="LC6633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">magnitude, you last night laid to my charge. The first mentioned was,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6634"></td>
        <td id="LC6634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, regardless of the sentiments of either, I had detached Mr. Bingley</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6635"></td>
        <td id="LC6635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from your sister, and the other, that I had, in defiance of various</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6636"></td>
        <td id="LC6636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">claims, in defiance of honour and humanity, ruined the immediate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6637"></td>
        <td id="LC6637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prosperity and blasted the prospects of Mr. Wickham. Wilfully and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6638"></td>
        <td id="LC6638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wantonly to have thrown off the companion of my youth, the acknowledged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6639"></td>
        <td id="LC6639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">favourite of my father, a young man who had scarcely any other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6640"></td>
        <td id="LC6640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dependence than on our patronage, and who had been brought up to expect</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6641"></td>
        <td id="LC6641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its exertion, would be a depravity, to which the separation of two young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6642"></td>
        <td id="LC6642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persons, whose affection could be the growth of only a few weeks, could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6643"></td>
        <td id="LC6643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bear no comparison. But from the severity of that blame which was last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6644"></td>
        <td id="LC6644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night so liberally bestowed, respecting each circumstance, I shall hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6645"></td>
        <td id="LC6645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be in the future secured, when the following account of my actions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6646"></td>
        <td id="LC6646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and their motives has been read. If, in the explanation of them, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6647"></td>
        <td id="LC6647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is due to myself, I am under the necessity of relating feelings which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6648"></td>
        <td id="LC6648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be offensive to yours, I can only say that I am sorry. The necessity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6649"></td>
        <td id="LC6649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must be obeyed, and further apology would be absurd.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6650"></td>
        <td id="LC6650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6651"></td>
        <td id="LC6651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I had not been long in Hertfordshire, before I saw, in common with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6652"></td>
        <td id="LC6652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others, that Bingley preferred your elder sister to any other young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6653"></td>
        <td id="LC6653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woman in the country. But it was not till the evening of the dance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6654"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6745"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC6834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was not then master enough of myself to know what could or ought to</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6836"></td>
        <td id="LC6836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particularly to the testimony of Colonel Fitzwilliam, who, from our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6837"></td>
        <td id="LC6837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">near relationship and constant intimacy, and, still more, as one of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6838"></td>
        <td id="LC6838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the executors of my father&#39;s will, has been unavoidably acquainted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6839"></td>
        <td id="LC6839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with every particular of these transactions. If your abhorrence of _me_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6840"></td>
        <td id="LC6840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should make _my_ assertions valueless, you cannot be prevented by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6841"></td>
        <td id="LC6841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same cause from confiding in my cousin; and that there may be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6842"></td>
        <td id="LC6842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the possibility of consulting him, I shall endeavour to find some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6843"></td>
        <td id="LC6843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opportunity of putting this letter in your hands in the course of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6844"></td>
        <td id="LC6844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning. I will only add, God bless you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6845"></td>
        <td id="LC6845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6846"></td>
        <td id="LC6846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;FITZWILLIAM DARCY&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6847"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6848"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6849"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6850"></td>
        <td id="LC6850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chapter 36</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6851"></td>
        <td id="LC6851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6852"></td>
        <td id="LC6852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6853"></td>
        <td id="LC6853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If Elizabeth, when Mr. Darcy gave her the letter, did not expect it to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6854"></td>
        <td id="LC6854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contain a renewal of his offers, she had formed no expectation at all of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6855"></td>
        <td id="LC6855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its contents. But such as they were, it may well be supposed how eagerly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6856"></td>
        <td id="LC6856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she went through them, and what a contrariety of emotion they excited.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6857"></td>
        <td id="LC6857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her feelings as she read were scarcely to be defined. With amazement did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6858"></td>
        <td id="LC6858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she first understand that he believed any apology to be in his power;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6859"></td>
        <td id="LC6859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and steadfastly was she persuaded, that he could have no explanation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6860"></td>
        <td id="LC6860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to give, which a just sense of shame would not conceal. With a strong</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6861"></td>
        <td id="LC6861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prejudice against everything he might say, she began his account of what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6862"></td>
        <td id="LC6862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had happened at Netherfield. She read with an eagerness which hardly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6863"></td>
        <td id="LC6863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left her power of comprehension, and from impatience of knowing what the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6864"></td>
        <td id="LC6864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">next sentence might bring, was incapable of attending to the sense of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6865"></td>
        <td id="LC6865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the one before her eyes. His belief of her sister&#39;s insensibility she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6866"></td>
        <td id="LC6866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instantly resolved to be false; and his account of the real, the worst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6867"></td>
        <td id="LC6867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">objections to the match, made her too angry to have any wish of doing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6868"></td>
        <td id="LC6868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him justice. He expressed no regret for what he had done which satisfied</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6869"></td>
        <td id="LC6869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her; his style was not penitent, but haughty. It was all pride and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6870"></td>
        <td id="LC6870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">insolence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6871"></td>
        <td id="LC6871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6872"></td>
        <td id="LC6872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But when this subject was succeeded by his account of Mr. Wickham--when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6873"></td>
        <td id="LC6873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she read with somewhat clearer attention a relation of events which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6874"></td>
        <td id="LC6874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if true, must overthrow every cherished opinion of his worth, and which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6875"></td>
        <td id="LC6875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bore so alarming an affinity to his own history of himself--her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6876"></td>
        <td id="LC6876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feelings were yet more acutely painful and more difficult of definition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6877"></td>
        <td id="LC6877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Astonishment, apprehension, and even horror, oppressed her. She wished</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6878"></td>
        <td id="LC6878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to discredit it entirely, repeatedly exclaiming, &quot;This must be false!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6879"></td>
        <td id="LC6879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This cannot be! This must be the grossest falsehood!&quot;--and when she had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6880"></td>
        <td id="LC6880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gone through the whole letter, though scarcely knowing anything of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6881"></td>
        <td id="LC6881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last page or two, put it hastily away, protesting that she would not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6882"></td>
        <td id="LC6882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regard it, that she would never look in it again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6883"></td>
        <td id="LC6883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6884"></td>
        <td id="LC6884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In this perturbed state of mind, with thoughts that could rest on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6885"></td>
        <td id="LC6885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing, she walked on; but it would not do; in half a minute the letter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6886"></td>
        <td id="LC6886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was unfolded again, and collecting herself as well as she could, she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6887"></td>
        <td id="LC6887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again began the mortifying perusal of all that related to Wickham, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6888"></td>
        <td id="LC6888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">commanded herself so far as to examine the meaning of every sentence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6889"></td>
        <td id="LC6889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The account of his connection with the Pemberley family was exactly what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6890"></td>
        <td id="LC6890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he had related himself; and the kindness of the late Mr. Darcy, though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6891"></td>
        <td id="LC6891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she had not before known its extent, agreed equally well with his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6892"></td>
        <td id="LC6892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words. So far each recital confirmed the other; but when she came to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6893"></td>
        <td id="LC6893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will, the difference was great. What Wickham had said of the living</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6894"></td>
        <td id="LC6894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was fresh in her memory, and as she recalled his very words, it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6895"></td>
        <td id="LC6895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impossible not to feel that there was gross duplicity on one side or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6896"></td>
        <td id="LC6896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other; and, for a few moments, she flattered herself that her wishes did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6897"></td>
        <td id="LC6897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not err. But when she read and re-read with the closest attention, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6898"></td>
        <td id="LC6898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particulars immediately following of Wickham&#39;s resigning all pretensions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6899"></td>
        <td id="LC6899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the living, of his receiving in lieu so considerable a sum as three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6900"></td>
        <td id="LC6900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thousand pounds, again was she forced to hesitate. She put down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6901"></td>
        <td id="LC6901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the letter, weighed every circumstance with what she meant to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6902"></td>
        <td id="LC6902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impartiality--deliberated on the probability of each statement--but with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6903"></td>
        <td id="LC6903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little success. On both sides it was only assertion. Again she read</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6904"></td>
        <td id="LC6904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on; but every line proved more clearly that the affair, which she had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6905"></td>
        <td id="LC6905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believed it impossible that any contrivance could so represent as to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6906"></td>
        <td id="LC6906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">render Mr. Darcy&#39;s conduct in it less than infamous, was capable of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6907"></td>
        <td id="LC6907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn which must make him entirely blameless throughout the whole.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6908"></td>
        <td id="LC6908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6909"></td>
        <td id="LC6909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The extravagance and general profligacy which he scrupled not to lay at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6910"></td>
        <td id="LC6910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Wickham&#39;s charge, exceedingly shocked her; the more so, as she could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6911"></td>
        <td id="LC6911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bring no proof of its injustice. She had never heard of him before his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6912"></td>
        <td id="LC6912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entrance into the ----shire Militia, in which he had engaged at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6913"></td>
        <td id="LC6913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persuasion of the young man who, on meeting him accidentally in town,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6914"></td>
        <td id="LC6914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had there renewed a slight acquaintance. Of his former way of life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6915"></td>
        <td id="LC6915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing had been known in Hertfordshire but what he told himself. As</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6916"></td>
        <td id="LC6916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to his real character, had information been in her power, she had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6917"></td>
        <td id="LC6917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never felt a wish of inquiring. His countenance, voice, and manner had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6918"></td>
        <td id="LC6918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">established him at once in the possession of every virtue. She tried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6919"></td>
        <td id="LC6919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to recollect some instance of goodness, some distinguished trait of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6920"></td>
        <td id="LC6920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">integrity or benevolence, that might rescue him from the attacks of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6921"></td>
        <td id="LC6921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Darcy; or at least, by the predominance of virtue, atone for those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6922"></td>
        <td id="LC6922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">casual errors under which she would endeavour to class what Mr. Darcy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6923"></td>
        <td id="LC6923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had described as the idleness and vice of many years&#39; continuance. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6924"></td>
        <td id="LC6924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no such recollection befriended her. She could see him instantly before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6925"></td>
        <td id="LC6925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her, in every charm of air and address; but she could remember no more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6926"></td>
        <td id="LC6926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">substantial good than the general approbation of the neighbourhood, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6927"></td>
        <td id="LC6927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the regard which his social powers had gained him in the mess. After</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6928"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7020"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7113"></td>

        <td id="L7114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7114"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L7190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7190"></td>
        <td id="LC7190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On Saturday morning Elizabeth and Mr. Collins met for breakfast a few</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L7194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7194"></td>
        <td id="LC7194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I know not, Miss Elizabeth,&quot; said he, &quot;whether Mrs. Collins has yet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7195"></td>
        <td id="LC7195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expressed her sense of your kindness in coming to us; but I am very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7196"></td>
        <td id="LC7196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain you will not leave the house without receiving her thanks for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7197"></td>
        <td id="LC7197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. The favour of your company has been much felt, I assure you. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7198"></td>
        <td id="LC7198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know how little there is to tempt anyone to our humble abode. Our plain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7199"></td>
        <td id="LC7199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner of living, our small rooms and few domestics, and the little we</td>

        <td id="L7200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7200"></td>
        <td id="LC7200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see of the world, must make Hunsford extremely dull to a young lady like</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7202"></td>
        <td id="LC7202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that we have done everything in our power to prevent your spending</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7203"></td>
        <td id="LC7203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your time unpleasantly.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7204"></td>
        <td id="LC7204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7205"></td>
        <td id="LC7205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth was eager with her thanks and assurances of happiness. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7206"></td>
        <td id="LC7206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had spent six weeks with great enjoyment; and the pleasure of being with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7207"></td>
        <td id="LC7207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Charlotte, and the kind attentions she had received, must make _her_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7208"></td>
        <td id="LC7208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel the obliged. Mr. Collins was gratified, and with a more smiling</td>

        <td id="L7209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7209"></td>
        <td id="LC7209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">solemnity replied:</td>

        <td id="L7210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7210"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7211"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7213"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L7288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7288"></td>
        <td id="LC7288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was not without an effort, meanwhile, that she could wait even for</td>

        <td id="L7290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7290"></td>

        <td id="L7291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7291"></td>

        <td id="L7293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7293"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7299"></td>
        <td id="LC7299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7392"></td>
        <td id="LC7392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of fun the other day at Colonel Forster&#39;s. Kitty and me were to spend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7393"></td>
        <td id="LC7393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the day there, and Mrs. Forster promised to have a little dance in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7394"></td>
        <td id="LC7394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evening; (by the bye, Mrs. Forster and me are _such_ friends!) and so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7395"></td>
        <td id="LC7395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she asked the two Harringtons to come, but Harriet was ill, and so Pen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7396"></td>
        <td id="LC7396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was forced to come by herself; and then, what do you think we did? We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7397"></td>
        <td id="LC7397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dressed up Chamberlayne in woman&#39;s clothes on purpose to pass for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7398"></td>
        <td id="LC7398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lady, only think what fun! Not a soul knew of it, but Colonel and Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7399"></td>
        <td id="LC7399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Forster, and Kitty and me, except my aunt, for we were forced to borrow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7400"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7401"></td>
        <td id="LC7401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Wickham, and Pratt, and two or three more of the men came in, they</td>

        <td id="L7402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7402"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7403"></td>
        <td id="LC7403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Forster. I thought I should have died. And _that_ made the men suspect</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7406"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7474"></td>
        <td id="LC7474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Bennet&#39;s astonishment was soon lessened by the strong sisterly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7475"></td>
        <td id="LC7475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">partiality which made any admiration of Elizabeth appear perfectly</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7476"></td>

        <td id="L7477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7477"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC7479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unhappiness which her sister&#39;s refusal must have given him.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7480"></td>
        <td id="LC7480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7481"></td>
        <td id="LC7481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;His being so sure of succeeding was wrong,&quot; said she, &quot;and certainly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7482"></td>
        <td id="LC7482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ought not to have appeared; but consider how much it must increase his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7483"></td>
        <td id="LC7483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disappointment!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7484"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7578"></td>
        <td id="LC7578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You are quite right. To have his errors made public might ruin him for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7579"></td>
        <td id="LC7579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever. He is now, perhaps, sorry for what he has done, and anxious to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7580"></td>
        <td id="LC7580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">re-establish a character. We must not make him desperate.&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7581"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7582"></td>
        <td id="LC7582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The tumult of Elizabeth&#39;s mind was allayed by this conversation. She had</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7583"></td>
        <td id="LC7583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got rid of two of the secrets which had weighed on her for a fortnight,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7584"></td>

        <td id="L7659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7659"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7665"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7666"></td>
        <td id="LC7666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their affectionate mother shared all their grief; she remembered what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7667"></td>
        <td id="LC7667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she had herself endured on a similar occasion, five-and-twenty years</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7668"></td>
        <td id="LC7668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ago.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7669"></td>
        <td id="LC7669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7670"></td>
        <td id="LC7670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am sure,&quot; said she, &quot;I cried for two days together when Colonel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7671"></td>
        <td id="LC7671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miller&#39;s regiment went away. I thought I should have broken my heart.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7672"></td>
        <td id="LC7672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7673"></td>
        <td id="LC7673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am sure I shall break _mine_,&quot; said Lydia.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7674"></td>
        <td id="LC7674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7675"></td>
        <td id="LC7675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;If one could but go to Brighton!&quot; observed Mrs. Bennet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7676"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7678"></td>
        <td id="LC7678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disagreeable.&quot;</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7680"></td>

      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7683"></td>
        <td id="LC7683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">added Kitty.</td>

        <td id="L7684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7684"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7685"></td>
        <td id="LC7685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such were the kind of lamentations resounding perpetually through</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7686"></td>
        <td id="LC7686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Longbourn House. Elizabeth tried to be diverted by them; but all sense</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7687"></td>
        <td id="LC7687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of pleasure was lost in shame. She felt anew the justice of Mr. Darcy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7688"></td>
        <td id="LC7688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">objections; and never had she been so much disposed to pardon his</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7689"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7691"></td>
        <td id="LC7691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the gloom of Lydia&#39;s prospect was shortly cleared away; for she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7692"></td>
        <td id="LC7692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received an invitation from Mrs. Forster, the wife of the colonel of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7693"></td>
        <td id="LC7693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the regiment, to accompany her to Brighton. This invaluable friend was a</td>

        <td id="L7694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7694"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7697"></td>
        <td id="LC7697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7698"></td>
        <td id="LC7698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The rapture of Lydia on this occasion, her adoration of Mrs. Forster,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7699"></td>
        <td id="LC7699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the delight of Mrs. Bennet, and the mortification of Kitty, are scarcely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7700"></td>
        <td id="LC7700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be described. Wholly inattentive to her sister&#39;s feelings, Lydia</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7701"></td>
        <td id="LC7701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flew about the house in restless ecstasy, calling for everyone&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7702"></td>
        <td id="LC7702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">congratulations, and laughing and talking with more violence than ever;</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7704"></td>
        <td id="LC7704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in terms as unreasonable as her accent was peevish.</td>

        <td id="L7705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7705"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L7706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7706"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7710"></td>
        <td id="LC7710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In vain did Elizabeth attempt to make her reasonable, and Jane to make</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7711"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7713"></td>
        <td id="LC7713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considered it as the death warrant of all possibility of common sense</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7714"></td>

        <td id="L7715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7715"></td>
        <td id="LC7715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">known, she could not help secretly advising her father not to let her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7716"></td>
        <td id="LC7716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go. She represented to him all the improprieties of Lydia&#39;s general</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7717"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7718"></td>

        <td id="L7721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7721"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7722"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L7727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7727"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7731"></td>
        <td id="LC7731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7732"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7733"></td>
        <td id="LC7733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some of your lovers? Poor little Lizzy! But do not be cast down. Such</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC7734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">squeamish youths as cannot bear to be connected with a little absurdity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7735"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7737"></td>
        <td id="LC7737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7738"></td>
        <td id="LC7738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Indeed you are mistaken. I have no such injuries to resent. It is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC7739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of particular, but of general evils, which I am now complaining. Our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7740"></td>
        <td id="LC7740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">importance, our respectability in the world must be affected by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7741"></td>
        <td id="LC7741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wild volatility, the assurance and disdain of all restraint which mark</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7742"></td>
        <td id="LC7742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lydia&#39;s character. Excuse me, for I must speak plainly. If you, my dear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7743"></td>
        <td id="LC7743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father, will not take the trouble of checking her exuberant spirits, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7744"></td>
        <td id="LC7744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of teaching her that her present pursuits are not to be the business of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7745"></td>
        <td id="LC7745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her life, she will soon be beyond the reach of amendment. Her character</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7746"></td>
        <td id="LC7746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be fixed, and she will, at sixteen, be the most determined flirt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7747"></td>
        <td id="LC7747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that ever made herself or her family ridiculous; a flirt, too, in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7748"></td>
        <td id="LC7748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worst and meanest degree of flirtation; without any attraction beyond</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7749"></td>
        <td id="LC7749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">youth and a tolerable person; and, from the ignorance and emptiness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7750"></td>
        <td id="LC7750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of her mind, wholly unable to ward off any portion of that universal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7751"></td>
        <td id="LC7751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contempt which her rage for admiration will excite. In this danger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7752"></td>
        <td id="LC7752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Kitty also is comprehended. She will follow wherever Lydia leads. Vain,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7753"></td>
        <td id="LC7753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ignorant, idle, and absolutely uncontrolled! Oh! my dear father, can you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7754"></td>
        <td id="LC7754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suppose it possible that they will not be censured and despised wherever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7755"></td>
        <td id="LC7755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they are known, and that their sisters will not be often involved in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7756"></td>
        <td id="LC7756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disgrace?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7757"></td>
        <td id="LC7757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7758"></td>
        <td id="LC7758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Bennet saw that her whole heart was in the subject, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7759"></td>
        <td id="LC7759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affectionately taking her hand said in reply:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7760"></td>
        <td id="LC7760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7761"></td>
        <td id="LC7761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do not make yourself uneasy, my love. Wherever you and Jane are known</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7762"></td>
        <td id="LC7762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you must be respected and valued; and you will not appear to less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7763"></td>
        <td id="LC7763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantage for having a couple of--or I may say, three--very silly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7764"></td>
        <td id="LC7764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sisters. We shall have no peace at Longbourn if Lydia does not go to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7765"></td>
        <td id="LC7765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Brighton. Let her go, then. Colonel Forster is a sensible man, and will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7766"></td>
        <td id="LC7766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keep her out of any real mischief; and she is luckily too poor to be an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7767"></td>
        <td id="LC7767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">object of prey to anybody. At Brighton she will be of less importance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7768"></td>
        <td id="LC7768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even as a common flirt than she has been here. The officers will find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7769"></td>
        <td id="LC7769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">women better worth their notice. Let us hope, therefore, that her being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7770"></td>
        <td id="LC7770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there may teach her her own insignificance. At any rate, she cannot grow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7771"></td>
        <td id="LC7771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many degrees worse, without authorising us to lock her up for the rest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7772"></td>
        <td id="LC7772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of her life.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7773"></td>
        <td id="LC7773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7774"></td>
        <td id="LC7774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With this answer Elizabeth was forced to be content; but her own opinion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7775"></td>
        <td id="LC7775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">continued the same, and she left him disappointed and sorry. It was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7776"></td>
        <td id="LC7776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in her nature, however, to increase her vexations by dwelling on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7777"></td>
        <td id="LC7777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them. She was confident of having performed her duty, and to fret</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7778"></td>
        <td id="LC7778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over unavoidable evils, or augment them by anxiety, was no part of her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7779"></td>
        <td id="LC7779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disposition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7780"></td>
        <td id="LC7780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7781"></td>
        <td id="LC7781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Had Lydia and her mother known the substance of her conference with her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7782"></td>
        <td id="LC7782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father, their indignation would hardly have found expression in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7783"></td>
        <td id="LC7783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">united volubility. In Lydia&#39;s imagination, a visit to Brighton comprised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7784"></td>
        <td id="LC7784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every possibility of earthly happiness. She saw, with the creative eye</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7786"></td>
        <td id="LC7786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She saw herself the object of attention, to tens and to scores of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7787"></td>
        <td id="LC7787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at present unknown. She saw all the glories of the camp--its tents</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7788"></td>
        <td id="LC7788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stretched forth in beauteous uniformity of lines, crowded with the young</td>
      </tr>
