        <td id="LC7789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the gay, and dazzling with scarlet; and, to complete the view, she</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7792"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7793"></td>
        <td id="LC7793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Had she known her sister sought to tear her from such prospects and such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L7796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7796"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L7803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7803"></td>
        <td id="LC7803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth was now to see Mr. Wickham for the last time. Having been</td>

        <td id="L7804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7804"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7806"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC7807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her, an affectation and a sameness to disgust and weary. In his present</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7808"></td>

        <td id="LC7809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the inclination he soon testified of renewing those intentions which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7810"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7812"></td>
        <td id="LC7812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finding herself thus selected as the object of such idle and frivolous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7813"></td>
        <td id="LC7813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gallantry; and while she steadily repressed it, could not but feel the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7814"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7818"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7819"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7822"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7823"></td>
        <td id="LC7823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weeks at Rosings, and asked him, if he was acquainted with the former.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7824"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7825"></td>
        <td id="LC7825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He looked surprised, displeased, alarmed; but with a moment&#39;s</td>

        <td id="L7829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7829"></td>

        <td id="L7830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7830"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L7831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7831"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L7835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7835"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L7839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7839"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7840"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7841"></td>
        <td id="LC7841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, very different. But I think Mr. Darcy improves upon acquaintance.&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7842"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7843"></td>
        <td id="LC7843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Indeed!&quot; cried Mr. Wickham with a look which did not escape her. &quot;And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7844"></td>
        <td id="LC7844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pray, may I ask?--&quot; But checking himself, he added, in a gayer tone, &quot;Is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7845"></td>
        <td id="LC7845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it in address that he improves? Has he deigned to add aught of civility</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7846"></td>
        <td id="LC7846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to his ordinary style?--for I dare not hope,&quot; he continued in a lower</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7847"></td>
        <td id="LC7847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and more serious tone, &quot;that he is improved in essentials.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7848"></td>
        <td id="LC7848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7849"></td>
        <td id="LC7849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, no!&quot; said Elizabeth. &quot;In essentials, I believe, he is very much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7850"></td>
        <td id="LC7850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what he ever was.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7851"></td>
        <td id="LC7851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7852"></td>
        <td id="LC7852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While she spoke, Wickham looked as if scarcely knowing whether to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7853"></td>
        <td id="LC7853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rejoice over her words, or to distrust their meaning. There was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7854"></td>
        <td id="LC7854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something in her countenance which made him listen with an apprehensive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7855"></td>
        <td id="LC7855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and anxious attention, while she added:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8041"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L8129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8129"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8134"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L8224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8224"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8227"></td>
        <td id="LC8227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, sir, I know I am. If I were to go through the world, I could</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8413"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8504"></td>
        <td id="LC8504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reached the carriage, Mr. and Mrs. Gardiner were half a quarter of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8505"></td>
        <td id="LC8505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mile behind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8506"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8507"></td>
        <td id="LC8507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He then asked her to walk into the house--but she declared herself not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8508"></td>
        <td id="LC8508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tired, and they stood together on the lawn. At such a time much might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8509"></td>
        <td id="LC8509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been said, and silence was very awkward. She wanted to talk, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8510"></td>
        <td id="LC8510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there seemed to be an embargo on every subject. At last she recollected</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8511"></td>
        <td id="LC8511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that she had been travelling, and they talked of Matlock and Dove Dale</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8512"></td>
        <td id="LC8512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with great perseverance. Yet time and her aunt moved slowly--and her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8513"></td>
        <td id="LC8513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patience and her ideas were nearly worn out before the tete-a-tete was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8514"></td>
        <td id="LC8514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over. On Mr. and Mrs. Gardiner&#39;s coming up they were all pressed to go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8515"></td>
        <td id="LC8515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the house and take some refreshment; but this was declined, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8516"></td>
        <td id="LC8516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they parted on each side with utmost politeness. Mr. Darcy handed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8517"></td>
        <td id="LC8517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ladies into the carriage; and when it drove off, Elizabeth saw him</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8520"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L8571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8571"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L8587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8587"></td>
        <td id="LC8587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chapter 44</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8589"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8590"></td>
        <td id="LC8590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth had settled it that Mr. Darcy would bring his sister to visit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8591"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8592"></td>
        <td id="LC8592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolved not to be out of sight of the inn the whole of that morning.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8593"></td>
        <td id="LC8593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But her conclusion was false; for on the very morning after their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8594"></td>
        <td id="LC8594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrival at Lambton, these visitors came. They had been walking about the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8595"></td>
        <td id="LC8595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place with some of their new friends, and were just returning to the inn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8596"></td>
        <td id="LC8596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to dress themselves for dining with the same family, when the sound of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8597"></td>

        <td id="LC8780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on making her known to his sister. Such a change in a man of so much</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8781"></td>
        <td id="LC8781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pride exciting not only astonishment but gratitude--for to love, ardent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8782"></td>
        <td id="LC8782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">love, it must be attributed; and as such its impression on her was of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8783"></td>
        <td id="LC8783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sort to be encouraged, as by no means unpleasing, though it could not be</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8873"></td>
        <td id="LC8873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw that the suspicions of the whole party were awakened against them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8874"></td>
        <td id="LC8874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that there was scarcely an eye which did not watch his behaviour</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8875"></td>
        <td id="LC8875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he first came into the room. In no countenance was attentive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8876"></td>
        <td id="LC8876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curiosity so strongly marked as in Miss Bingley&#39;s, in spite of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8877"></td>
        <td id="LC8877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smiles which overspread her face whenever she spoke to one of its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8878"></td>
        <td id="LC8878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">objects; for jealousy had not yet made her desperate, and her attentions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8879"></td>
        <td id="LC8879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Mr. Darcy were by no means over. Miss Darcy, on her brother&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8880"></td>
        <td id="LC8880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entrance, exerted herself much more to talk, and Elizabeth saw that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8881"></td>
        <td id="LC8881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was anxious for his sister and herself to get acquainted, and forwarded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8882"></td>
        <td id="LC8882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as much as possible, every attempt at conversation on either side. Miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8883"></td>
        <td id="LC8883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bingley saw all this likewise; and, in the imprudence of anger, took the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8884"></td>
        <td id="LC8884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first opportunity of saying, with sneering civility:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8885"></td>
        <td id="LC8885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8886"></td>
        <td id="LC8886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Pray, Miss Eliza, are not the ----shire Militia removed from Meryton?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8887"></td>
        <td id="LC8887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They must be a great loss to _your_ family.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8888"></td>
        <td id="LC8888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8889"></td>
        <td id="LC8889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In Darcy&#39;s presence she dared not mention Wickham&#39;s name; but Elizabeth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8890"></td>
        <td id="LC8890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instantly comprehended that he was uppermost in her thoughts; and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8891"></td>
        <td id="LC8891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">various recollections connected with him gave her a moment&#39;s distress;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8892"></td>
        <td id="LC8892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but exerting herself vigorously to repel the ill-natured attack, she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8893"></td>
        <td id="LC8893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presently answered the question in a tolerably detached tone. While</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8894"></td>
        <td id="LC8894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she spoke, an involuntary glance showed her Darcy, with a heightened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8895"></td>
        <td id="LC8895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complexion, earnestly looking at her, and his sister overcome with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8896"></td>
        <td id="LC8896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confusion, and unable to lift up her eyes. Had Miss Bingley known what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8897"></td>
        <td id="LC8897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pain she was then giving her beloved friend, she undoubtedly would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8898"></td>
        <td id="LC8898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have refrained from the hint; but she had merely intended to discompose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8899"></td>
        <td id="LC8899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth by bringing forward the idea of a man to whom she believed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8900"></td>
        <td id="LC8900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her partial, to make her betray a sensibility which might injure her in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8901"></td>
        <td id="LC8901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darcy&#39;s opinion, and, perhaps, to remind the latter of all the follies</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8902"></td>
        <td id="LC8902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and absurdities by which some part of her family were connected</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8903"></td>
        <td id="LC8903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with that corps. Not a syllable had ever reached her of Miss Darcy&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8904"></td>
        <td id="LC8904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meditated elopement. To no creature had it been revealed, where secrecy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8905"></td>
        <td id="LC8905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was possible, except to Elizabeth; and from all Bingley&#39;s connections</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8906"></td>
        <td id="LC8906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her brother was particularly anxious to conceal it, from the very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8907"></td>
        <td id="LC8907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wish which Elizabeth had long ago attributed to him, of their becoming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8908"></td>
        <td id="LC8908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hereafter her own. He had certainly formed such a plan, and without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8909"></td>
        <td id="LC8909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meaning that it should effect his endeavour to separate him from Miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8910"></td>
        <td id="LC8910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bennet, it is probable that it might add something to his lively concern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8911"></td>
        <td id="LC8911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the welfare of his friend.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8912"></td>
        <td id="LC8912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8913"></td>
        <td id="LC8913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth&#39;s collected behaviour, however, soon quieted his emotion; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8914"></td>
        <td id="LC8914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as Miss Bingley, vexed and disappointed, dared not approach nearer to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8915"></td>
        <td id="LC8915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wickham, Georgiana also recovered in time, though not enough to be able</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8916"></td>
        <td id="LC8916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to speak any more. Her brother, whose eye she feared to meet, scarcely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8917"></td>
        <td id="LC8917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recollected her interest in the affair, and the very circumstance which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8918"></td>
        <td id="LC8918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been designed to turn his thoughts from Elizabeth seemed to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8919"></td>
        <td id="LC8919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fixed them on her more and more cheerfully.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8920"></td>
        <td id="LC8920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8921"></td>
        <td id="LC8921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their visit did not continue long after the question and answer above</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8922"></td>
        <td id="LC8922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mentioned; and while Mr. Darcy was attending them to their carriage Miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8923"></td>
        <td id="LC8923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bingley was venting her feelings in criticisms on Elizabeth&#39;s person,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8924"></td>
        <td id="LC8924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behaviour, and dress. But Georgiana would not join her. Her brother&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8925"></td>
        <td id="LC8925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recommendation was enough to ensure her favour; his judgement could not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8926"></td>
        <td id="LC8926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">err. And he had spoken in such terms of Elizabeth as to leave Georgiana</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8927"></td>
        <td id="LC8927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without the power of finding her otherwise than lovely and amiable. When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8928"></td>
        <td id="LC8928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darcy returned to the saloon, Miss Bingley could not help repeating to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8929"></td>
        <td id="LC8929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him some part of what she had been saying to his sister.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8930"></td>
        <td id="LC8930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8931"></td>
        <td id="LC8931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How very ill Miss Eliza Bennet looks this morning, Mr. Darcy,&quot; she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8932"></td>
        <td id="LC8932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cried; &quot;I never in my life saw anyone so much altered as she is since</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8933"></td>
        <td id="LC8933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the winter. She is grown so brown and coarse! Louisa and I were agreeing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8934"></td>
        <td id="LC8934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that we should not have known her again.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8935"></td>
        <td id="LC8935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8936"></td>
        <td id="LC8936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">However little Mr. Darcy might have liked such an address, he contented</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8937"></td>
        <td id="LC8937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself with coolly replying that he perceived no other alteration than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8938"></td>
        <td id="LC8938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her being rather tanned, no miraculous consequence of travelling in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8939"></td>
        <td id="LC8939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">summer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8940"></td>
        <td id="LC8940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8941"></td>
        <td id="LC8941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;For my own part,&quot; she rejoined, &quot;I must confess that I never could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8942"></td>
        <td id="LC8942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see any beauty in her. Her face is too thin; her complexion has no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8943"></td>
        <td id="LC8943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brilliancy; and her features are not at all handsome. Her nose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8944"></td>
        <td id="LC8944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wants character--there is nothing marked in its lines. Her teeth are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8945"></td>
        <td id="LC8945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tolerable, but not out of the common way; and as for her eyes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8946"></td>
        <td id="LC8946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which have sometimes been called so fine, I could never see anything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8947"></td>
        <td id="LC8947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extraordinary in them. They have a sharp, shrewish look, which I do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8948"></td>
        <td id="LC8948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not like at all; and in her air altogether there is a self-sufficiency</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8949"></td>
        <td id="LC8949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without fashion, which is intolerable.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8950"></td>
        <td id="LC8950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8951"></td>
        <td id="LC8951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Persuaded as Miss Bingley was that Darcy admired Elizabeth, this was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8952"></td>
        <td id="LC8952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the best method of recommending herself; but angry people are not always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8953"></td>
        <td id="LC8953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wise; and in seeing him at last look somewhat nettled, she had all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8954"></td>
        <td id="LC8954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">success she expected. He was resolutely silent, however, and, from a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8955"></td>
        <td id="LC8955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determination of making him speak, she continued:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8956"></td>
        <td id="LC8956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8957"></td>
        <td id="LC8957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I remember, when we first knew her in Hertfordshire, how amazed we all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8958"></td>
        <td id="LC8958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were to find that she was a reputed beauty; and I particularly recollect</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8959"></td>
        <td id="LC8959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your saying one night, after they had been dining at Netherfield, &#39;_She_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8960"></td>
        <td id="LC8960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a beauty!--I should as soon call her mother a wit.&#39; But afterwards she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8961"></td>
        <td id="LC8961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed to improve on you, and I believe you thought her rather pretty at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8962"></td>
        <td id="LC8962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one time.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8963"></td>
        <td id="LC8963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8964"></td>
        <td id="LC8964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes,&quot; replied Darcy, who could contain himself no longer, &quot;but _that_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8965"></td>

        <td id="L9051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9051"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9057"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9148"></td>
        <td id="LC9148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9149"></td>
        <td id="LC9149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darcy made no answer. He seemed scarcely to hear her, and was walking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9150"></td>
        <td id="LC9150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up and down the room in earnest meditation, his brow contracted, his air</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9151"></td>
        <td id="LC9151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloomy. Elizabeth soon observed, and instantly understood it. Her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9152"></td>
        <td id="LC9152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">power was sinking; everything _must_ sink under such a proof of family</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9153"></td>
        <td id="LC9153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weakness, such an assurance of the deepest disgrace. She could neither</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9154"></td>
        <td id="LC9154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonder nor condemn, but the belief of his self-conquest brought nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9155"></td>
        <td id="LC9155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consolatory to her bosom, afforded no palliation of her distress. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9156"></td>
        <td id="LC9156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was, on the contrary, exactly calculated to make her understand her own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9157"></td>
        <td id="LC9157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wishes; and never had she so honestly felt that she could have loved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9158"></td>
        <td id="LC9158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, as now, when all love must be vain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9159"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9160"></td>
        <td id="LC9160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But self, though it would intrude, could not engross her. Lydia--the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9161"></td>
        <td id="LC9161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">humiliation, the misery she was bringing on them all, soon swallowed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9162"></td>
        <td id="LC9162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up every private care; and covering her face with her handkerchief,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9163"></td>
        <td id="LC9163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth was soon lost to everything else; and, after a pause of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9164"></td>
        <td id="LC9164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several minutes, was only recalled to a sense of her situation by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9165"></td>
        <td id="LC9165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the voice of her companion, who, in a manner which, though it spoke</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9166"></td>
        <td id="LC9166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compassion, spoke likewise restraint, said, &quot;I am afraid you have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9167"></td>
        <td id="LC9167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long desiring my absence, nor have I anything to plead in excuse of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9168"></td>
        <td id="LC9168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stay, but real, though unavailing concern. Would to Heaven that anything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9169"></td>
        <td id="LC9169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could be either said or done on my part that might offer consolation to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC9170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such distress! But I will not torment you with vain wishes, which may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9171"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9172"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9173"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9175"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9179"></td>
        <td id="LC9179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He readily assured her of his secrecy; again expressed his sorrow for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9184"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9190"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9191"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9192"></td>
        <td id="LC9192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If gratitude and esteem are good foundations of affection, Elizabeth&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9193"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9195"></td>

        <td id="L9196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9196"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9197"></td>

        <td id="L9198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9198"></td>
        <td id="LC9198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">somewhat of a trial to the latter method in her partiality for Wickham,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9199"></td>
        <td id="LC9199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that its ill success might, perhaps, authorise her to seek the other</td>

        <td id="L9200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9200"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9201"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9202"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9203"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9205"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9207"></td>
        <td id="LC9207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter remained in her mind, she was all surprise--all astonishment that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9208"></td>
        <td id="LC9208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wickham should marry a girl whom it was impossible he could marry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9209"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9210"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9213"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9215"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9216"></td>
        <td id="LC9216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She had never perceived, while the regiment was in Hertfordshire, that</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9217"></td>
        <td id="LC9217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lydia had any partiality for him; but she was convinced that Lydia</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9218"></td>

        <td id="L9224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9224"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L9225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9225"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9231"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9233"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9235"></td>
        <td id="LC9235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the last with trembling energy, though Lydia had never been a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9236"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9237"></td>
        <td id="LC9237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afflicted. Not Lydia only, but all were concerned in it; and after the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9238"></td>
        <td id="LC9238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first exclamations of surprise and horror, Mr. Gardiner promised every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9239"></td>
        <td id="LC9239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assistance in his power. Elizabeth, though expecting no less, thanked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9240"></td>
        <td id="LC9240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him with tears of gratitude; and all three being actuated by one spirit,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9241"></td>
        <td id="LC9241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything relating to their journey was speedily settled. They were to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9242"></td>
        <td id="LC9242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be off as soon as possible. &quot;But what is to be done about Pemberley?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9243"></td>
        <td id="LC9243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cried Mrs. Gardiner. &quot;John told us Mr. Darcy was here when you sent for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9244"></td>
        <td id="LC9244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us; was it so?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9245"></td>
        <td id="LC9245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9246"></td>
        <td id="LC9246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes; and I told him we should not be able to keep our engagement.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9247"></td>
        <td id="LC9247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_That_ is all settled.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9248"></td>
        <td id="LC9248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9249"></td>
        <td id="LC9249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What is all settled?&quot; repeated the other, as she ran into her room to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9250"></td>
        <td id="LC9250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prepare. &quot;And are they upon such terms as for her to disclose the real</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9251"></td>
        <td id="LC9251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truth? Oh, that I knew how it was!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9252"></td>
        <td id="LC9252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9253"></td>
        <td id="LC9253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But wishes were vain, or at least could only serve to amuse her in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9254"></td>
        <td id="LC9254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hurry and confusion of the following hour. Had Elizabeth been at leisure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9255"></td>
        <td id="LC9255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be idle, she would have remained certain that all employment was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9256"></td>
        <td id="LC9256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impossible to one so wretched as herself; but she had her share of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9257"></td>
        <td id="LC9257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">business as well as her aunt, and amongst the rest there were notes to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9258"></td>
        <td id="LC9258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be written to all their friends at Lambton, with false excuses for their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9259"></td>
        <td id="LC9259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sudden departure. An hour, however, saw the whole completed; and Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9260"></td>
        <td id="LC9260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gardiner meanwhile having settled his account at the inn, nothing</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9262"></td>
        <td id="LC9262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the morning, found herself, in a shorter space of time than she could</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9263"></td>
        <td id="LC9263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have supposed, seated in the carriage, and on the road to Longbourn.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9264"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L9267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9267"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9268"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9270"></td>
        <td id="LC9270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I have been thinking it over again, Elizabeth,&quot; said her uncle, as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9271"></td>
        <td id="LC9271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drove from the town; &quot;and really, upon serious consideration, I am much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9272"></td>
        <td id="LC9272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more inclined than I was to judge as your eldest sister does on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9273"></td>
        <td id="LC9273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">matter. It appears to me so very unlikely that any young man should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9274"></td>
        <td id="LC9274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">form such a design against a girl who is by no means unprotected or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9275"></td>
        <td id="LC9275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friendless, and who was actually staying in his colonel&#39;s family, that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9276"></td>
        <td id="LC9276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am strongly inclined to hope the best. Could he expect that her friends</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9277"></td>
        <td id="LC9277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would not step forward? Could he expect to be noticed again by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9278"></td>
        <td id="LC9278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regiment, after such an affront to Colonel Forster? His temptation is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9279"></td>
        <td id="LC9279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not adequate to the risk!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9280"></td>
        <td id="LC9280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9281"></td>
        <td id="LC9281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do you really think so?&quot; cried Elizabeth, brightening up for a moment.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9282"></td>
        <td id="LC9282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9283"></td>
        <td id="LC9283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Upon my word,&quot; said Mrs. Gardiner, &quot;I begin to be of your uncle&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9284"></td>
        <td id="LC9284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opinion. It is really too great a violation of decency, honour, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9285"></td>
        <td id="LC9285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest, for him to be guilty of. I cannot think so very ill of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9286"></td>
        <td id="LC9286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wickham. Can you yourself, Lizzy, so wholly give him up, as to believe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9287"></td>
        <td id="LC9287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him capable of it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9288"></td>
        <td id="LC9288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9289"></td>
        <td id="LC9289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Not, perhaps, of neglecting his own interest; but of every other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9290"></td>
        <td id="LC9290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neglect I can believe him capable. If, indeed, it should be so! But I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9291"></td>
        <td id="LC9291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dare not hope it. Why should they not go on to Scotland if that had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9292"></td>
        <td id="LC9292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the case?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9293"></td>
        <td id="LC9293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9294"></td>
        <td id="LC9294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;In the first place,&quot; replied Mr. Gardiner, &quot;there is no absolute proof</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC9295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they are not gone to Scotland.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9296"></td>
        <td id="LC9296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9297"></td>
        <td id="LC9297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh! but their removing from the chaise into a hackney coach is such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9298"></td>
        <td id="LC9298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a presumption! And, besides, no traces of them were to be found on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9299"></td>
        <td id="LC9299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Barnet road.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9300"></td>
        <td id="LC9300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9301"></td>
        <td id="LC9301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, then--supposing them to be in London. They may be there, though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9302"></td>
        <td id="LC9302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the purpose of concealment, for no more exceptional purpose. It is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9303"></td>
        <td id="LC9303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not likely that money should be very abundant on either side; and it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9304"></td>
        <td id="LC9304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might strike them that they could be more economically, though less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9305"></td>
        <td id="LC9305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expeditiously, married in London than in Scotland.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9306"></td>
        <td id="LC9306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9307"></td>
        <td id="LC9307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But why all this secrecy? Why any fear of detection? Why must their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9308"></td>
        <td id="LC9308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marriage be private? Oh, no, no--this is not likely. His most particular</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9309"></td>
        <td id="LC9309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friend, you see by Jane&#39;s account, was persuaded of his never intending</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9310"></td>
        <td id="LC9310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to marry her. Wickham will never marry a woman without some money. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9311"></td>
        <td id="LC9311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot afford it. And what claims has Lydia--what attraction has she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9312"></td>
        <td id="LC9312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beyond youth, health, and good humour that could make him, for her sake,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9313"></td>
        <td id="LC9313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forego every chance of benefiting himself by marrying well? As to what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9314"></td>
        <td id="LC9314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">restraint the apprehensions of disgrace in the corps might throw on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9315"></td>
        <td id="LC9315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dishonourable elopement with her, I am not able to judge; for I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9316"></td>
        <td id="LC9316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing of the effects that such a step might produce. But as to your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9317"></td>
        <td id="LC9317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other objection, I am afraid it will hardly hold good. Lydia has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9318"></td>
        <td id="LC9318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no brothers to step forward; and he might imagine, from my father&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9319"></td>
        <td id="LC9319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behaviour, from his indolence and the little attention he has ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9320"></td>
        <td id="LC9320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed to give to what was going forward in his family, that _he_ would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9321"></td>
        <td id="LC9321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do as little, and think as little about it, as any father could do, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9322"></td>
        <td id="LC9322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a matter.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9323"></td>
        <td id="LC9323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9324"></td>
        <td id="LC9324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But can you think that Lydia is so lost to everything but love of him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9325"></td>
        <td id="LC9325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as to consent to live with him on any terms other than marriage?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9326"></td>
        <td id="LC9326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9327"></td>
        <td id="LC9327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It does seem, and it is most shocking indeed,&quot; replied Elizabeth, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9328"></td>
        <td id="LC9328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tears in her eyes, &quot;that a sister&#39;s sense of decency and virtue in such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9329"></td>
        <td id="LC9329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a point should admit of doubt. But, really, I know not what to say.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9330"></td>
        <td id="LC9330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Perhaps I am not doing her justice. But she is very young; she has never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9331"></td>
        <td id="LC9331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been taught to think on serious subjects; and for the last half-year,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9332"></td>

        <td id="L9424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9424"></td>
        <td id="LC9424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Not yet,&quot; replied Jane. &quot;But now that my dear uncle is come, I hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9425"></td>
        <td id="LC9425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything will be well.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9426"></td>
        <td id="LC9426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9427"></td>
        <td id="LC9427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Is my father in town?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9428"></td>
        <td id="LC9428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9429"></td>
        <td id="LC9429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, he went on Tuesday, as I wrote you word.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9430"></td>
        <td id="LC9430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9431"></td>
        <td id="LC9431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And have you heard from him often?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9432"></td>
        <td id="LC9432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9433"></td>
        <td id="LC9433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We have heard only twice. He wrote me a few lines on Wednesday to say</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9434"></td>
        <td id="LC9434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he had arrived in safety, and to give me his directions, which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9435"></td>
        <td id="LC9435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particularly begged him to do. He merely added that he should not write</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9436"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9437"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9438"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9440"></td>
        <td id="LC9440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My mother is tolerably well, I trust; though her spirits are greatly</td>

        <td id="L9441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9441"></td>
        <td id="LC9441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shaken. She is up stairs and will have great satisfaction in seeing you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC9442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all. She does not yet leave her dressing-room. Mary and Kitty, thank</td>

        <td id="L9443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9443"></td>
        <td id="LC9443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heaven, are quite well.&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9444"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9446"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9447"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9448"></td>
        <td id="LC9448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her sister, however, assured her of her being perfectly well; and their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9449"></td>
        <td id="LC9449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation, which had been passing while Mr. and Mrs. Gardiner were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9450"></td>
        <td id="LC9450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engaged with their children, was now put an end to by the approach</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9451"></td>
        <td id="LC9451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the whole party. Jane ran to her uncle and aunt, and welcomed and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9452"></td>
        <td id="LC9452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thanked them both, with alternate smiles and tears.</td>

        <td id="L9453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9453"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9454"></td>
        <td id="LC9454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When they were all in the drawing-room, the questions which Elizabeth</td>

        <td id="LC9455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had already asked were of course repeated by the others, and they soon</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9456"></td>
        <td id="LC9456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found that Jane had no intelligence to give. The sanguine hope of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC9457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good, however, which the benevolence of her heart suggested had not yet</td>

        <td id="LC9458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deserted her; she still expected that it would all end well, and that</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9459"></td>
        <td id="LC9459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every morning would bring some letter, either from Lydia or her father,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9460"></td>
        <td id="LC9460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to explain their proceedings, and, perhaps, announce their marriage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9461"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9462"></td>
        <td id="LC9462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Bennet, to whose apartment they all repaired, after a few minutes&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9463"></td>
        <td id="LC9463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation together, received them exactly as might be expected; with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9464"></td>
        <td id="LC9464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tears and lamentations of regret, invectives against the villainous</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9465"></td>
        <td id="LC9465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conduct of Wickham, and complaints of her own sufferings and ill-usage;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9466"></td>
        <td id="LC9466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blaming everybody but the person to whose ill-judging indulgence the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9467"></td>
        <td id="LC9467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">errors of her daughter must principally be owing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9468"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9469"></td>
        <td id="LC9469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;If I had been able,&quot; said she, &quot;to carry my point in going to Brighton,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9470"></td>
        <td id="LC9470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with all my family, _this_ would not have happened; but poor dear Lydia</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9471"></td>
        <td id="LC9471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had nobody to take care of her. Why did the Forsters ever let her go out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9472"></td>
        <td id="LC9472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of their sight? I am sure there was some great neglect or other on their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9473"></td>
        <td id="LC9473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side, for she is not the kind of girl to do such a thing if she had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9474"></td>
        <td id="LC9474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well looked after. I always thought they were very unfit to have the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
