        <td id="LC9475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charge of her; but I was overruled, as I always am. Poor dear child!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9476"></td>
        <td id="LC9476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now here&#39;s Mr. Bennet gone away, and I know he will fight Wickham,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9477"></td>
        <td id="LC9477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wherever he meets him and then he will be killed, and what is to become</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9478"></td>
        <td id="LC9478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of us all? The Collinses will turn us out before he is cold in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9479"></td>
        <td id="LC9479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grave, and if you are not kind to us, brother, I do not know what we</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9480"></td>
        <td id="LC9480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall do.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9481"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9482"></td>
        <td id="LC9482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They all exclaimed against such terrific ideas; and Mr. Gardiner, after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9483"></td>
        <td id="LC9483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">general assurances of his affection for her and all her family, told her</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9484"></td>
        <td id="LC9484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he meant to be in London the very next day, and would assist Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9485"></td>
        <td id="LC9485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bennet in every endeavour for recovering Lydia.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9486"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9487"></td>
        <td id="LC9487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do not give way to useless alarm,&quot; added he; &quot;though it is right to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9488"></td>
        <td id="LC9488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prepared for the worst, there is no occasion to look on it as certain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9489"></td>
        <td id="LC9489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is not quite a week since they left Brighton. In a few days more we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9490"></td>
        <td id="LC9490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may gain some news of them; and till we know that they are not married,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9491"></td>
        <td id="LC9491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and have no design of marrying, do not let us give the matter over as</td>

        <td id="L9492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9492"></td>

        <td id="L9493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9493"></td>
        <td id="LC9493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him come home with me to Gracechurch Street; and then we may consult</td>

        <td id="L9495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9495"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9496"></td>
        <td id="LC9496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh! my dear brother,&quot; replied Mrs. Bennet, &quot;that is exactly what I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9497"></td>
        <td id="LC9497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could most wish for. And now do, when you get to town, find them out,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9498"></td>
        <td id="LC9498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wherever they may be; and if they are not married already, _make_ them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9499"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9500"></td>
        <td id="LC9500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tell Lydia she shall have as much money as she chooses to buy them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9501"></td>
        <td id="LC9501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after they are married. And, above all, keep Mr. Bennet from fighting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9502"></td>
        <td id="LC9502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tell him what a dreadful state I am in, that I am frighted out of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9503"></td>
        <td id="LC9503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wits--and have such tremblings, such flutterings, all over me--such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9504"></td>
        <td id="LC9504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spasms in my side and pains in my head, and such beatings at heart, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9505"></td>
        <td id="LC9505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I can get no rest by night nor by day. And tell my dear Lydia not to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9506"></td>
        <td id="LC9506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give any directions about her clothes till she has seen me, for she does</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9507"></td>
        <td id="LC9507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not know which are the best warehouses. Oh, brother, how kind you are! I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9508"></td>
        <td id="LC9508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know you will contrive it all.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9509"></td>
        <td id="LC9509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9510"></td>
        <td id="LC9510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But Mr. Gardiner, though he assured her again of his earnest endeavours</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9511"></td>
        <td id="LC9511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the cause, could not avoid recommending moderation to her, as well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9512"></td>
        <td id="LC9512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in her hopes as her fear; and after talking with her in this manner till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9513"></td>
        <td id="LC9513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dinner was on the table, they all left her to vent all her feelings on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9514"></td>
        <td id="LC9514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the housekeeper, who attended in the absence of her daughters.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9515"></td>
        <td id="LC9515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9516"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9702"></td>
        <td id="LC9702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">send; but even of _that_ they would have been glad to be certain. Mr.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9703"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9704"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9781"></td>
        <td id="LC9781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;MY DEAR SIR,</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L9783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9783"></td>
        <td id="LC9783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I feel myself called upon, by our relationship, and my situation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9784"></td>
        <td id="LC9784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in life, to condole with you on the grievous affliction you are now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9785"></td>
        <td id="LC9785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suffering under, of which we were yesterday informed by a letter from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9786"></td>
        <td id="LC9786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hertfordshire. Be assured, my dear sir, that Mrs. Collins and myself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9787"></td>
        <td id="LC9787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sincerely sympathise with you and all your respectable family, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9788"></td>
        <td id="LC9788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your present distress, which must be of the bitterest kind, because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9789"></td>
        <td id="LC9789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceeding from a cause which no time can remove. No arguments shall be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9790"></td>
        <td id="LC9790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanting on my part that can alleviate so severe a misfortune--or that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9791"></td>
        <td id="LC9791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may comfort you, under a circumstance that must be of all others the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9792"></td>
        <td id="LC9792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most afflicting to a parent&#39;s mind. The death of your daughter would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9793"></td>
        <td id="LC9793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been a blessing in comparison of this. And it is the more to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9794"></td>
        <td id="LC9794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be lamented, because there is reason to suppose as my dear Charlotte</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9795"></td>
        <td id="LC9795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">informs me, that this licentiousness of behaviour in your daughter has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9796"></td>
        <td id="LC9796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceeded from a faulty degree of indulgence; though, at the same time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9797"></td>
        <td id="LC9797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the consolation of yourself and Mrs. Bennet, I am inclined to think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9798"></td>
        <td id="LC9798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that her own disposition must be naturally bad, or she could not be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9799"></td>
        <td id="LC9799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guilty of such an enormity, at so early an age. Howsoever that may be,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9800"></td>
        <td id="LC9800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you are grievously to be pitied; in which opinion I am not only joined</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9801"></td>
        <td id="LC9801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by Mrs. Collins, but likewise by Lady Catherine and her daughter, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9802"></td>
        <td id="LC9802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whom I have related the affair. They agree with me in apprehending that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9803"></td>
        <td id="LC9803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this false step in one daughter will be injurious to the fortunes of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9804"></td>
        <td id="LC9804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the others; for who, as Lady Catherine herself condescendingly says,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9805"></td>
        <td id="LC9805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will connect themselves with such a family? And this consideration leads</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9806"></td>
        <td id="LC9806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me moreover to reflect, with augmented satisfaction, on a certain event</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9807"></td>
        <td id="LC9807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of last November; for had it been otherwise, I must have been involved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9808"></td>
        <td id="LC9808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in all your sorrow and disgrace. Let me then advise you, dear sir, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9809"></td>
        <td id="LC9809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">console yourself as much as possible, to throw off your unworthy child</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9810"></td>
        <td id="LC9810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from your affection for ever, and leave her to reap the fruits of her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9811"></td>
        <td id="LC9811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own heinous offense.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9812"></td>
        <td id="LC9812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9813"></td>
        <td id="LC9813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am, dear sir, etc., etc.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9814"></td>
        <td id="LC9814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9815"></td>
        <td id="LC9815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Gardiner did not write again till he had received an answer from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9816"></td>
        <td id="LC9816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Colonel Forster; and then he had nothing of a pleasant nature to send.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9817"></td>
        <td id="LC9817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was not known that Wickham had a single relationship with whom he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9818"></td>
        <td id="LC9818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kept up any connection, and it was certain that he had no near one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9819"></td>
        <td id="LC9819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">living. His former acquaintances had been numerous; but since he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9820"></td>
        <td id="LC9820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been in the militia, it did not appear that he was on terms of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9821"></td>
        <td id="LC9821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular friendship with any of them. There was no one, therefore,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9822"></td>
        <td id="LC9822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who could be pointed out as likely to give any news of him. And in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9823"></td>
        <td id="LC9823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wretched state of his own finances, there was a very powerful motive for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9824"></td>
        <td id="LC9824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secrecy, in addition to his fear of discovery by Lydia&#39;s relations, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9825"></td>
        <td id="LC9825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it had just transpired that he had left gaming debts behind him to a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9826"></td>
        <td id="LC9826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very considerable amount. Colonel Forster believed that more than a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9827"></td>
        <td id="LC9827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thousand pounds would be necessary to clear his expenses at Brighton.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9828"></td>
        <td id="LC9828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He owed a good deal in town, but his debts of honour were still more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9829"></td>
        <td id="LC9829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">formidable. Mr. Gardiner did not attempt to conceal these particulars</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9830"></td>
        <td id="LC9830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the Longbourn family. Jane heard them with horror. &quot;A gamester!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9831"></td>
        <td id="LC9831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she cried. &quot;This is wholly unexpected. I had not an idea of it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9832"></td>
        <td id="LC9832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9833"></td>
        <td id="LC9833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Gardiner added in his letter, that they might expect to see their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9834"></td>
        <td id="LC9834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father at home on the following day, which was Saturday. Rendered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9835"></td>
        <td id="LC9835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spiritless by the ill-success of all their endeavours, he had yielded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9836"></td>
        <td id="LC9836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to his brother-in-law&#39;s entreaty that he would return to his family, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9837"></td>
        <td id="LC9837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leave it to him to do whatever occasion might suggest to be advisable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9838"></td>
        <td id="LC9838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for continuing their pursuit. When Mrs. Bennet was told of this, she did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9839"></td>
        <td id="LC9839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not express so much satisfaction as her children expected, considering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9840"></td>
        <td id="LC9840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what her anxiety for his life had been before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9841"></td>
        <td id="LC9841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9842"></td>
        <td id="LC9842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What, is he coming home, and without poor Lydia?&quot; she cried. &quot;Sure he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9843"></td>
        <td id="LC9843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will not leave London before he has found them. Who is to fight Wickham,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9844"></td>
        <td id="LC9844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and make him marry her, if he comes away?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9845"></td>
        <td id="LC9845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9846"></td>
        <td id="LC9846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As Mrs. Gardiner began to wish to be at home, it was settled that she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9847"></td>
        <td id="LC9847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the children should go to London, at the same time that Mr. Bennet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9848"></td>
        <td id="LC9848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came from it. The coach, therefore, took them the first stage of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9849"></td>
        <td id="LC9849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">journey, and brought its master back to Longbourn.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9850"></td>
        <td id="LC9850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9851"></td>
        <td id="LC9851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Gardiner went away in all the perplexity about Elizabeth and her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9852"></td>
        <td id="LC9852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Derbyshire friend that had attended her from that part of the world. His</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9853"></td>
        <td id="LC9853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">name had never been voluntarily mentioned before them by her niece; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9854"></td>
        <td id="LC9854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the kind of half-expectation which Mrs. Gardiner had formed, of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9855"></td>
        <td id="LC9855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being followed by a letter from him, had ended in nothing. Elizabeth had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9856"></td>
        <td id="LC9856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received none since her return that could come from Pemberley.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9857"></td>
        <td id="LC9857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9858"></td>
        <td id="LC9858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The present unhappy state of the family rendered any other excuse for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9859"></td>
        <td id="LC9859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lowness of her spirits unnecessary; nothing, therefore, could be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9860"></td>
        <td id="LC9860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fairly conjectured from _that_, though Elizabeth, who was by this time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9861"></td>
        <td id="LC9861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tolerably well acquainted with her own feelings, was perfectly aware</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9862"></td>
        <td id="LC9862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, had she known nothing of Darcy, she could have borne the dread of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9863"></td>
        <td id="LC9863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lydia&#39;s infamy somewhat better. It would have spared her, she thought,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9864"></td>
        <td id="LC9864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one sleepless night out of two.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9865"></td>
        <td id="LC9865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9866"></td>
        <td id="LC9866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When Mr. Bennet arrived, he had all the appearance of his usual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9867"></td>
        <td id="LC9867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosophic composure. He said as little as he had ever been in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9868"></td>
        <td id="LC9868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">habit of saying; made no mention of the business that had taken him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9869"></td>
        <td id="LC9869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away, and it was some time before his daughters had courage to speak of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9870"></td>
        <td id="LC9870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9871"></td>
        <td id="LC9871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9872"></td>
        <td id="LC9872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was not till the afternoon, when he had joined them at tea, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9873"></td>
        <td id="LC9873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth ventured to introduce the subject; and then, on her briefly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9874"></td>
        <td id="LC9874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expressing her sorrow for what he must have endured, he replied, &quot;Say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9875"></td>
        <td id="LC9875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing of that. Who should suffer but myself? It has been my own doing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9876"></td>
        <td id="LC9876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I ought to feel it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9877"></td>
        <td id="LC9877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9878"></td>
        <td id="LC9878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You must not be too severe upon yourself,&quot; replied Elizabeth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9879"></td>
        <td id="LC9879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9880"></td>
        <td id="LC9880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You may well warn me against such an evil. Human nature is so prone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9881"></td>
        <td id="LC9881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to fall into it! No, Lizzy, let me once in my life feel how much I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9882"></td>
        <td id="LC9882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been to blame. I am not afraid of being overpowered by the impression.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9883"></td>
        <td id="LC9883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It will pass away soon enough.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9884"></td>
        <td id="LC9884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9885"></td>
        <td id="LC9885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do you suppose them to be in London?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9886"></td>
        <td id="LC9886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">

        <td id="L9978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9978"></td>
        <td id="LC9978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;At last I am able to send you some tidings of my niece, and such as,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9979"></td>
        <td id="LC9979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the whole, I hope it will give you satisfaction. Soon after you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9980"></td>
        <td id="LC9980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left me on Saturday, I was fortunate enough to find out in what part of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9981"></td>

        <td id="L10074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10074"></td>
        <td id="LC10074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were by themselves. &quot;How strange this is! And for _this_ we are to be</td>

        <td id="LC10075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thankful. That they should marry, small as is their chance of happiness,</td>

</td>

        <td id="L10078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10078"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10164"></td>
        <td id="LC10164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I will go to Meryton,&quot; said she, &quot;as soon as I am dressed, and tell the</td>

        <td id="L10165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10165"></td>
        <td id="LC10165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good, good news to my sister Philips. And as I come back, I can call</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10166"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10167"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L10176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10176"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L10185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10185"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10186"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10188"></td>
        <td id="LC10188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Bennet had very often wished before this period of his life that,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10189"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10190"></td>
        <td id="LC10190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the better provision of his children, and of his wife, if she survived</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10191"></td>
        <td id="LC10191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. He now wished it more than ever. Had he done his duty in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10192"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10193"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10194"></td>
        <td id="LC10194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prevailing on one of the most worthless young men in Great Britain to be</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10195"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10197"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10202"></td>
        <td id="LC10202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When first Mr. Bennet had married, economy was held to be perfectly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10203"></td>

        <td id="L10207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10207"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10208"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC10210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husband&#39;s love of independence had alone prevented their exceeding their</td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10213"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10251"></td>

        <td id="L10252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10252"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10256"></td>
        <td id="LC10256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accomplishment, and her thoughts and her words ran wholly on those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10257"></td>
        <td id="LC10257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attendants of elegant nuptials, fine muslins, new carriages, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10258"></td>
        <td id="LC10258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">servants. She was busily searching through the neighbourhood for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10259"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10352"></td>
        <td id="LC10352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his account and my niece&#39;s. It is Mr. Wickham&#39;s intention to go into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10353"></td>
        <td id="LC10353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the regulars; and among his former friends, there are still some who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10354"></td>
        <td id="LC10354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are able and willing to assist him in the army. He has the promise of an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10355"></td>
        <td id="LC10355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ensigncy in General ----&#39;s regiment, now quartered in the North. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10356"></td>
        <td id="LC10356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is an advantage to have it so far from this part of the kingdom. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10357"></td>
        <td id="LC10357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">promises fairly; and I hope among different people, where they may each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10358"></td>
        <td id="LC10358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have a character to preserve, they will both be more prudent. I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10359"></td>
        <td id="LC10359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">written to Colonel Forster, to inform him of our present arrangements,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10360"></td>
        <td id="LC10360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to request that he will satisfy the various creditors of Mr. Wickham</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10361"></td>
        <td id="LC10361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in and near Brighton, with assurances of speedy payment, for which I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10362"></td>
        <td id="LC10362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have pledged myself. And will you give yourself the trouble of carrying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10363"></td>
        <td id="LC10363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">similar assurances to his creditors in Meryton, of whom I shall subjoin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10364"></td>
        <td id="LC10364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a list according to his information? He has given in all his debts; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10365"></td>
        <td id="LC10365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hope at least he has not deceived us. Haggerston has our directions,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10366"></td>
        <td id="LC10366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and all will be completed in a week. They will then join his regiment,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10367"></td>
        <td id="LC10367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unless they are first invited to Longbourn; and I understand from Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10368"></td>
        <td id="LC10368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gardiner, that my niece is very desirous of seeing you all before she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10369"></td>
        <td id="LC10369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leaves the South. She is well, and begs to be dutifully remembered to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10370"></td>
        <td id="LC10370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you and your mother.--Yours, etc.,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10371"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10372"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10373"></td>
        <td id="LC10373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10374"></td>
        <td id="LC10374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Bennet and his daughters saw all the advantages of Wickham&#39;s removal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10375"></td>
        <td id="LC10375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the ----shire as clearly as Mr. Gardiner could do. But Mrs. Bennet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10376"></td>
        <td id="LC10376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was not so well pleased with it. Lydia&#39;s being settled in the North,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10377"></td>
        <td id="LC10377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just when she had expected most pleasure and pride in her company,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10378"></td>
        <td id="LC10378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for she had by no means given up her plan of their residing in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10379"></td>
        <td id="LC10379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hertfordshire, was a severe disappointment; and, besides, it was such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10380"></td>
        <td id="LC10380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pity that Lydia should be taken from a regiment where she was acquainted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10381"></td>
        <td id="LC10381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with everybody, and had so many favourites.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10382"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10383"></td>
        <td id="LC10383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;She is so fond of Mrs. Forster,&quot; said she, &quot;it will be quite shocking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10384"></td>
        <td id="LC10384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to send her away! And there are several of the young men, too, that she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10385"></td>
        <td id="LC10385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likes very much. The officers may not be so pleasant in General ----&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10386"></td>
        <td id="LC10386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regiment.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10387"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10388"></td>
        <td id="LC10388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His daughter&#39;s request, for such it might be considered, of being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10389"></td>
        <td id="LC10389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">admitted into her family again before she set off for the North,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10390"></td>
        <td id="LC10390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received at first an absolute negative. But Jane and Elizabeth,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10391"></td>
        <td id="LC10391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who agreed in wishing, for the sake of their sister&#39;s feelings and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10392"></td>
        <td id="LC10392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consequence, that she should be noticed on her marriage by her parents,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10393"></td>
        <td id="LC10393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">urged him so earnestly yet so rationally and so mildly, to receive her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10394"></td>
        <td id="LC10394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and her husband at Longbourn, as soon as they were married, that he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10395"></td>
        <td id="LC10395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prevailed on to think as they thought, and act as they wished. And their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10396"></td>
        <td id="LC10396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother had the satisfaction of knowing that she would be able to show</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10397"></td>
        <td id="LC10397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her married daughter in the neighbourhood before she was banished to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10398"></td>
        <td id="LC10398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">North. When Mr. Bennet wrote again to his brother, therefore, he sent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10399"></td>
        <td id="LC10399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his permission for them to come; and it was settled, that as soon as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10400"></td>
        <td id="LC10400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ceremony was over, they should proceed to Longbourn. Elizabeth was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10401"></td>
        <td id="LC10401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surprised, however, that Wickham should consent to such a scheme, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10402"></td>
        <td id="LC10402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had she consulted only her own inclination, any meeting with him would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10403"></td>
        <td id="LC10403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been the last object of her wishes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10404"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10405"></td>
        <td id="LC10405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10406"></td>
        <td id="LC10406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10407"></td>
        <td id="LC10407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chapter 51</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10408"></td>
        <td id="LC10408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10409"></td>
        <td id="LC10409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10410"></td>
        <td id="LC10410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their sister&#39;s wedding day arrived; and Jane and Elizabeth felt for her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10411"></td>
        <td id="LC10411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">probably more than she felt for herself. The carriage was sent to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10412"></td>
        <td id="LC10412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meet them at ----, and they were to return in it by dinner-time. Their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10413"></td>
        <td id="LC10413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrival was dreaded by the elder Miss Bennets, and Jane more especially,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10414"></td>
        <td id="LC10414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who gave Lydia the feelings which would have attended herself, had she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10415"></td>
        <td id="LC10415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been the culprit, and was wretched in the thought of what her sister</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10416"></td>
        <td id="LC10416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must endure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10417"></td>
        <td id="LC10417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10418"></td>
        <td id="LC10418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They came. The family were assembled in the breakfast room to receive</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10419"></td>
        <td id="LC10419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them. Smiles decked the face of Mrs. Bennet as the carriage drove up to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10420"></td>
        <td id="LC10420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the door; her husband looked impenetrably grave; her daughters, alarmed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10421"></td>
        <td id="LC10421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anxious, uneasy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10422"></td>
        <td id="LC10422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10423"></td>
        <td id="LC10423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lydia&#39;s voice was heard in the vestibule; the door was thrown open, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10424"></td>
        <td id="LC10424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she ran into the room. Her mother stepped forwards, embraced her, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10425"></td>
        <td id="LC10425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">welcomed her with rapture; gave her hand, with an affectionate smile,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10426"></td>
        <td id="LC10426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Wickham, who followed his lady; and wished them both joy with an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10427"></td>
        <td id="LC10427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alacrity which shewed no doubt of their happiness.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10428"></td>
        <td id="LC10428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10429"></td>
        <td id="LC10429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their reception from Mr. Bennet, to whom they then turned, was not quite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10430"></td>
        <td id="LC10430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so cordial. His countenance rather gained in austerity; and he scarcely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10431"></td>
        <td id="LC10431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opened his lips. The easy assurance of the young couple, indeed, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10432"></td>
        <td id="LC10432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough to provoke him. Elizabeth was disgusted, and even Miss Bennet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10433"></td>
        <td id="LC10433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was shocked. Lydia was Lydia still; untamed, unabashed, wild, noisy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10434"></td>
        <td id="LC10434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and fearless. She turned from sister to sister, demanding their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10435"></td>
        <td id="LC10435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">congratulations; and when at length they all sat down, looked eagerly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10436"></td>
        <td id="LC10436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round the room, took notice of some little alteration in it, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10437"></td>
        <td id="LC10437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observed, with a laugh, that it was a great while since she had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10438"></td>
        <td id="LC10438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10439"></td>
        <td id="LC10439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10440"></td>
        <td id="LC10440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wickham was not at all more distressed than herself, but his manners</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10441"></td>
        <td id="LC10441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were always so pleasing, that had his character and his marriage been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10442"></td>
        <td id="LC10442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exactly what they ought, his smiles and his easy address, while he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10443"></td>
        <td id="LC10443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">claimed their relationship, would have delighted them all. Elizabeth had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10444"></td>
        <td id="LC10444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not before believed him quite equal to such assurance; but she sat down,</td>

</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC10625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth had the satisfaction of receiving an answer to her letter as</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10628"></td>
        <td id="LC10628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be interrupted, she sat down on one of the benches and prepared to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10629"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10634"></td>

        <td id="L10635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10635"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10636"></td>

        <td id="L10637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10637"></td>
        <td id="LC10637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to answering it, as I foresee that a _little_ writing will not comprise</td>

        <td id="L10641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10641"></td>

        <td id="LC10643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as I am--and nothing but the belief of your being a party concerned</td>

        <td id="L10644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10644"></td>

        <td id="LC10645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">innocent and ignorant, I must be more explicit.</td>

        <td id="L10646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10646"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10647"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10648"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L10651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10651"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10657"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L10699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10699"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L10711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10711"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10719"></td>
        <td id="LC10719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">day it was only known that a gentleman had called on business.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10720"></td>
        <td id="LC10720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10812"></td>
        <td id="LC10812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">avoid, and whose very name it was punishment to him to pronounce. He had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10813"></td>
        <td id="LC10813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done all this for a girl whom he could neither regard nor esteem. Her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10814"></td>
        <td id="LC10814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart did whisper that he had done it for her. But it was a hope shortly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10815"></td>
        <td id="LC10815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">checked by other considerations, and she soon felt that even her vanity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10816"></td>
        <td id="LC10816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was insufficient, when required to depend on his affection for her--for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10817"></td>
        <td id="LC10817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a woman who had already refused him--as able to overcome a sentiment so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10818"></td>
        <td id="LC10818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">natural as abhorrence against relationship with Wickham. Brother-in-law</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10819"></td>
        <td id="LC10819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Wickham! Every kind of pride must revolt from the connection. He had,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10820"></td>
        <td id="LC10820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be sure, done much. She was ashamed to think how much. But he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10821"></td>
        <td id="LC10821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">given a reason for his interference, which asked no extraordinary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10822"></td>
        <td id="LC10822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stretch of belief. It was reasonable that he should feel he had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10823"></td>
        <td id="LC10823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrong; he had liberality, and he had the means of exercising it; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10824"></td>
        <td id="LC10824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though she would not place herself as his principal inducement, she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10825"></td>

        <td id="LC10828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under obligations to a person who could never receive a return. They</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10907"></td>
        <td id="LC10907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How should you have liked making sermons?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10908"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10909"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10910"></td>
        <td id="LC10910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the exertion would soon have been nothing. One ought not to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10911"></td>
        <td id="LC10911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repine;--but, to be sure, it would have been such a thing for me! The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10912"></td>
        <td id="LC10912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quiet, the retirement of such a life would have answered all my ideas</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11000"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11001"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11182"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11183"></td>
        <td id="LC11183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you meant to quit the place entirely at Michaelmas; but, however, I hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11184"></td>
        <td id="LC11184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is not true. A great many changes have happened in the neighbourhood,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11185"></td>
        <td id="LC11185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since you went away. Miss Lucas is married and settled. And one of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11186"></td>
        <td id="LC11186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own daughters. I suppose you have heard of it; indeed, you must have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11187"></td>
        <td id="LC11187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen it in the papers. It was in The Times and The Courier, I know;</td>

</td>

        <td id="L11275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11275"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC11276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he no longer cares for me, why silent? Teasing, teasing, man! I will</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11279"></td>
        <td id="LC11279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her resolution was for a short time involuntarily kept by the approach</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11280"></td>
        <td id="LC11280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of her sister, who joined her with a cheerful look, which showed her</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="LC11359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darcy had walked away to another part of the room. She followed him with</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11369"></td>

        <td id="LC11370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself; and she seized the opportunity of saying:</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11371"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11372"></td>
        <td id="LC11372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Is your sister at Pemberley still?&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11373"></td>
        <td id="LC11373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11374"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11468"></td>
        <td id="LC11468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He came, and in such very good time that the ladies were none of them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11469"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11472"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L11515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11515"></td>
        <td id="LC11515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Bennet&#39;s schemes for this day were ineffectual. Bingley was every</td>

        <td id="L11516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11516"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11522"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11524"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11526"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L11533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11533"></td>

        <td id="L11542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11542"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11545"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11547"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11548"></td>
        <td id="LC11548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sister and Bingley standing together over the hearth, as if engaged in</td>

        <td id="L11551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11551"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11552"></td>
        <td id="LC11552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought was still worse. Not a syllable was uttered by either; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11553"></td>
        <td id="LC11553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth was on the point of going away again, when Bingley, who as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11554"></td>
        <td id="LC11554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well as the other had sat down, suddenly rose, and whispering a few</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11555"></td>
        <td id="LC11555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">words to her sister, ran out of the room.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11556"></td>
        <td id="LC11556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11557"></td>
        <td id="LC11557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jane could have no reserves from Elizabeth, where confidence would give</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11558"></td>
        <td id="LC11558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasure; and instantly embracing her, acknowledged, with the liveliest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11559"></td>
        <td id="LC11559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emotion, that she was the happiest creature in the world.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11560"></td>
        <td id="LC11560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11747"></td>
        <td id="LC11747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for a moment in silence, she said very stiffly to Elizabeth,</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L11817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11817"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11820"></td>
        <td id="LC11820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Miss Bennet,&quot; replied her ladyship, in an angry tone, &quot;you ought to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11821"></td>
        <td id="LC11821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know, that I am not to be trifled with. But however insincere _you_ may</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11823"></td>
        <td id="LC11823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">celebrated for its sincerity and frankness, and in a cause of such</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11825"></td>
        <td id="LC11825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alarming nature reached me two days ago. I was told that not only your</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11826"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11835"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11837"></td>
