</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11838"></td>
        <td id="LC11838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;At once to insist upon having such a report universally contradicted.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11839"></td>
        <td id="LC11839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11840"></td>
        <td id="LC11840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Your coming to Longbourn, to see me and my family,&quot; said Elizabeth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11841"></td>
        <td id="LC11841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coolly, &quot;will be rather a confirmation of it; if, indeed, such a report</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11842"></td>
        <td id="LC11842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is in existence.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11843"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11844"></td>
        <td id="LC11844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;If! Do you then pretend to be ignorant of it? Has it not been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11845"></td>
        <td id="LC11845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">industriously circulated by yourselves? Do you not know that such a</td>

        <td id="L11846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11846"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L11865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11865"></td>
        <td id="LC11865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;If I have, I shall be the last person to confess it.&quot;</td>

        <td id="L11866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11866"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11874"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11875"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC11876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engaged to my daughter. Now what have you to say?&quot;</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L11881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11881"></td>
        <td id="LC11881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lady Catherine hesitated for a moment, and then replied:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11882"></td>
        <td id="LC11882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11883"></td>
        <td id="LC11883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The engagement between them is of a peculiar kind. From their infancy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11884"></td>
        <td id="LC11884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they have been intended for each other. It was the favourite wish of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11885"></td>
        <td id="LC11885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_his_ mother, as well as of hers. While in their cradles, we planned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11886"></td>
        <td id="LC11886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the union: and now, at the moment when the wishes of both sisters would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11887"></td>
        <td id="LC11887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be accomplished in their marriage, to be prevented by a young woman of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11888"></td>
        <td id="LC11888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inferior birth, of no importance in the world, and wholly unallied to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11889"></td>
        <td id="LC11889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the family! Do you pay no regard to the wishes of his friends? To his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11890"></td>
        <td id="LC11890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tacit engagement with Miss de Bourgh? Are you lost to every feeling of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11891"></td>
        <td id="LC11891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">propriety and delicacy? Have you not heard me say that from his earliest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11892"></td>
        <td id="LC11892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hours he was destined for his cousin?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11893"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11894"></td>
        <td id="LC11894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, and I had heard it before. But what is that to me? If there is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11895"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11896"></td>
        <td id="LC11896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be kept from it by knowing that his mother and aunt wished him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11897"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11898"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11899"></td>
        <td id="LC11899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by honour nor inclination confined to his cousin, why is not he to make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC11900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another choice? And if I am that choice, why may not I accept him?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11901"></td>
        <td id="LC11901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11902"></td>
        <td id="LC11902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Because honour, decorum, prudence, nay, interest, forbid it. Yes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11903"></td>
        <td id="LC11903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Bennet, interest; for do not expect to be noticed by his family or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11904"></td>
        <td id="LC11904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends, if you wilfully act against the inclinations of all. You will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11905"></td>
        <td id="LC11905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be censured, slighted, and despised, by everyone connected with him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11906"></td>
        <td id="LC11906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Your alliance will be a disgrace; your name will never even be mentioned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11907"></td>
        <td id="LC11907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by any of us.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11908"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11909"></td>
        <td id="LC11909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;These are heavy misfortunes,&quot; replied Elizabeth. &quot;But the wife of Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11910"></td>
        <td id="LC11910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darcy must have such extraordinary sources of happiness necessarily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11911"></td>
        <td id="LC11911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attached to her situation, that she could, upon the whole, have no cause</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11912"></td>
        <td id="LC11912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to repine.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11913"></td>
        <td id="LC11913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11914"></td>
        <td id="LC11914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Obstinate, headstrong girl! I am ashamed of you! Is this your gratitude</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11915"></td>
        <td id="LC11915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for my attentions to you last spring? Is nothing due to me on that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11916"></td>
        <td id="LC11916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">score? Let us sit down. You are to understand, Miss Bennet, that I came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11917"></td>
        <td id="LC11917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here with the determined resolution of carrying my purpose; nor will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11918"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11919"></td>
        <td id="LC11919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whims. I have not been in the habit of brooking disappointment.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11920"></td>
        <td id="LC11920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11921"></td>
        <td id="LC11921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_That_ will make your ladyship&#39;s situation at present more pitiable;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11922"></td>
        <td id="LC11922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but it will have no effect on me.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11923"></td>
        <td id="LC11923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11924"></td>
        <td id="LC11924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I will not be interrupted. Hear me in silence. My daughter and my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11925"></td>
        <td id="LC11925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nephew are formed for each other. They are descended, on the maternal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11926"></td>
        <td id="LC11926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side, from the same noble line; and, on the father&#39;s, from respectable,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11927"></td>
        <td id="LC11927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honourable, and ancient--though untitled--families. Their fortune on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11928"></td>
        <td id="LC11928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both sides is splendid. They are destined for each other by the voice of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11929"></td>
        <td id="LC11929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every member of their respective houses; and what is to divide them?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11930"></td>
        <td id="LC11930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The upstart pretensions of a young woman without family, connections,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11931"></td>
        <td id="LC11931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or fortune. Is this to be endured! But it must not, shall not be. If you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11932"></td>
        <td id="LC11932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were sensible of your own good, you would not wish to quit the sphere in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11933"></td>
        <td id="LC11933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which you have been brought up.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11934"></td>
        <td id="LC11934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11935"></td>
        <td id="LC11935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;In marrying your nephew, I should not consider myself as quitting that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11936"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12019"></td>
        <td id="LC12019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall now know how to act. Do not imagine, Miss Bennet, that your</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12022"></td>
        <td id="LC12022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12023"></td>
        <td id="LC12023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In this manner Lady Catherine talked on, till they were at the door of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12024"></td>
        <td id="LC12024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the carriage, when, turning hastily round, she added, &quot;I take no leave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12025"></td>
        <td id="LC12025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of you, Miss Bennet. I send no compliments to your mother. You deserve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12026"></td>
        <td id="LC12026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no such attention. I am most seriously displeased.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12027"></td>
        <td id="LC12027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12028"></td>
        <td id="LC12028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth made no answer; and without attempting to persuade her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12029"></td>
        <td id="LC12029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ladyship to return into the house, walked quietly into it herself. She</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12122"></td>
        <td id="LC12122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The colour now rushed into Elizabeth&#39;s cheeks in the instantaneous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12213"></td>
        <td id="LC12213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To this question his daughter replied only with a laugh; and as it had</td>

        <td id="L12214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12214"></td>
        <td id="LC12214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been asked without the least suspicion, she was not distressed by</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12215"></td>
        <td id="LC12215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his repeating it. Elizabeth had never been more at a loss to make her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12216"></td>
        <td id="LC12216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feelings appear what they were not. It was necessary to laugh, when she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12217"></td>
        <td id="LC12217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would rather have cried. Her father had most cruelly mortified her, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12218"></td>
        <td id="LC12218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what he said of Mr. Darcy&#39;s indifference, and she could do nothing but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12219"></td>
        <td id="LC12219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonder at such a want of penetration, or fear that perhaps, instead of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12220"></td>
        <td id="LC12220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his seeing too little, she might have fancied too much.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12221"></td>
        <td id="LC12221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12222"></td>
        <td id="LC12222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12223"></td>
        <td id="LC12223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12224"></td>
        <td id="LC12224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chapter 58</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12225"></td>
        <td id="LC12225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12226"></td>
        <td id="LC12226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12227"></td>
        <td id="LC12227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Instead of receiving any such letter of excuse from his friend, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12228"></td>
        <td id="LC12228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth half expected Mr. Bingley to do, he was able to bring Darcy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12229"></td>
        <td id="LC12229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with him to Longbourn before many days had passed after Lady Catherine&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12230"></td>
        <td id="LC12230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">visit. The gentlemen arrived early; and, before Mrs. Bennet had time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12231"></td>
        <td id="LC12231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to tell him of their having seen his aunt, of which her daughter sat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12232"></td>
        <td id="LC12232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in momentary dread, Bingley, who wanted to be alone with Jane, proposed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12233"></td>
        <td id="LC12233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their all walking out. It was agreed to. Mrs. Bennet was not in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12234"></td>
        <td id="LC12234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">habit of walking; Mary could never spare time; but the remaining five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12235"></td>
        <td id="LC12235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">set off together. Bingley and Jane, however, soon allowed the others</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12236"></td>
        <td id="LC12236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to outstrip them. They lagged behind, while Elizabeth, Kitty, and Darcy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12237"></td>
        <td id="LC12237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were to entertain each other. Very little was said by either; Kitty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12238"></td>
        <td id="LC12238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was too much afraid of him to talk; Elizabeth was secretly forming a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12239"></td>
        <td id="LC12239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desperate resolution; and perhaps he might be doing the same.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12240"></td>
        <td id="LC12240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12241"></td>
        <td id="LC12241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They walked towards the Lucases, because Kitty wished to call upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12242"></td>
        <td id="LC12242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Maria; and as Elizabeth saw no occasion for making it a general concern,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12243"></td>
        <td id="LC12243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when Kitty left them she went boldly on with him alone. Now was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12244"></td>
        <td id="LC12244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment for her resolution to be executed, and, while her courage was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12245"></td>
        <td id="LC12245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">high, she immediately said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12246"></td>
        <td id="LC12246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12247"></td>
        <td id="LC12247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Mr. Darcy, I am a very selfish creature; and, for the sake of giving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12248"></td>
        <td id="LC12248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relief to my own feelings, care not how much I may be wounding yours. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12249"></td>
        <td id="LC12249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can no longer help thanking you for your unexampled kindness to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12250"></td>
        <td id="LC12250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor sister. Ever since I have known it, I have been most anxious to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12251"></td>
        <td id="LC12251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acknowledge to you how gratefully I feel it. Were it known to the rest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12252"></td>
        <td id="LC12252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my family, I should not have merely my own gratitude to express.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12253"></td>
        <td id="LC12253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12254"></td>
        <td id="LC12254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am sorry, exceedingly sorry,&quot; replied Darcy, in a tone of surprise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12255"></td>
        <td id="LC12255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and emotion, &quot;that you have ever been informed of what may, in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12256"></td>
        <td id="LC12256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mistaken light, have given you uneasiness. I did not think Mrs. Gardiner</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12257"></td>
        <td id="LC12257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was so little to be trusted.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12258"></td>
        <td id="LC12258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12259"></td>
        <td id="LC12259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You must not blame my aunt. Lydia&#39;s thoughtlessness first betrayed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12260"></td>
        <td id="LC12260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me that you had been concerned in the matter; and, of course, I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12261"></td>
        <td id="LC12261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not rest till I knew the particulars. Let me thank you again and again,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12262"></td>
        <td id="LC12262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the name of all my family, for that generous compassion which induced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12263"></td>
        <td id="LC12263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you to take so much trouble, and bear so many mortifications, for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12264"></td>
        <td id="LC12264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sake of discovering them.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12265"></td>
        <td id="LC12265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12266"></td>
        <td id="LC12266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;If you _will_ thank me,&quot; he replied, &quot;let it be for yourself alone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12267"></td>
        <td id="LC12267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That the wish of giving happiness to you might add force to the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12268"></td>
        <td id="LC12268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inducements which led me on, I shall not attempt to deny. But your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12269"></td>
        <td id="LC12269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_family_ owe me nothing. Much as I respect them, I believe I thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12270"></td>
        <td id="LC12270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only of _you_.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12271"></td>
        <td id="LC12271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12272"></td>
        <td id="LC12272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth was too much embarrassed to say a word. After a short pause,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12273"></td>
        <td id="LC12273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her companion added, &quot;You are too generous to trifle with me. If your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12274"></td>
        <td id="LC12274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feelings are still what they were last April, tell me so at once. _My_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12275"></td>
        <td id="LC12275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affections and wishes are unchanged, but one word from you will silence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12276"></td>
        <td id="LC12276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me on this subject for ever.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12277"></td>
        <td id="LC12277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12278"></td>
        <td id="LC12278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth, feeling all the more than common awkwardness and anxiety of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12279"></td>
        <td id="LC12279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his situation, now forced herself to speak; and immediately, though not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12280"></td>
        <td id="LC12280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very fluently, gave him to understand that her sentiments had undergone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12281"></td>
        <td id="LC12281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so material a change, since the period to which he alluded, as to make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12282"></td>
        <td id="LC12282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her receive with gratitude and pleasure his present assurances. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12283"></td>
        <td id="LC12283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happiness which this reply produced, was such as he had probably never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12284"></td>
        <td id="LC12284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">felt before; and he expressed himself on the occasion as sensibly and as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12285"></td>
        <td id="LC12285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warmly as a man violently in love can be supposed to do. Had Elizabeth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12286"></td>
        <td id="LC12286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been able to encounter his eye, she might have seen how well the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12287"></td>
        <td id="LC12287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expression of heartfelt delight, diffused over his face, became him;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12288"></td>
        <td id="LC12288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but, though she could not look, she could listen, and he told her of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12289"></td>
        <td id="LC12289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feelings, which, in proving of what importance she was to him, made his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12290"></td>
        <td id="LC12290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affection every moment more valuable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12291"></td>
        <td id="LC12291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12292"></td>
        <td id="LC12292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They walked on, without knowing in what direction. There was too much to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12293"></td>
        <td id="LC12293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be thought, and felt, and said, for attention to any other objects. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12294"></td>
        <td id="LC12294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soon learnt that they were indebted for their present good understanding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12295"></td>
        <td id="LC12295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the efforts of his aunt, who did call on him in her return through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12296"></td>
        <td id="LC12296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">London, and there relate her journey to Longbourn, its motive, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12297"></td>
        <td id="LC12297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">substance of her conversation with Elizabeth; dwelling emphatically on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12298"></td>
        <td id="LC12298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every expression of the latter which, in her ladyship&#39;s apprehension,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12299"></td>
        <td id="LC12299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peculiarly denoted her perverseness and assurance; in the belief that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12300"></td>
        <td id="LC12300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a relation must assist her endeavours to obtain that promise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12301"></td>
        <td id="LC12301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from her nephew which she had refused to give. But, unluckily for her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12302"></td>
        <td id="LC12302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ladyship, its effect had been exactly contrariwise.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12303"></td>
        <td id="LC12303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12304"></td>
        <td id="LC12304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It taught me to hope,&quot; said he, &quot;as I had scarcely ever allowed myself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12305"></td>
        <td id="LC12305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to hope before. I knew enough of your disposition to be certain that,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12306"></td>
        <td id="LC12306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had you been absolutely, irrevocably decided against me, you would have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12307"></td>
        <td id="LC12307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acknowledged it to Lady Catherine, frankly and openly.&quot;</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12495"></td>
        <td id="LC12495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dear Lizzy, where can you have been walking to?&quot; was a question</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12496"></td>
        <td id="LC12496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which Elizabeth received from Jane as soon as she entered their room,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12497"></td>
        <td id="LC12497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and from all the others when they sat down to table. She had only to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12498"></td>
        <td id="LC12498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say in reply, that they had wandered about, till she was beyond her own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12499"></td>
        <td id="LC12499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge. She coloured as she spoke; but neither that, nor anything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12500"></td>
        <td id="LC12500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">else, awakened a suspicion of the truth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12501"></td>
        <td id="LC12501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12502"></td>
        <td id="LC12502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The evening passed quietly, unmarked by anything extraordinary. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12503"></td>
        <td id="LC12503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acknowledged lovers talked and laughed, the unacknowledged were silent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12504"></td>
        <td id="LC12504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darcy was not of a disposition in which happiness overflows in mirth;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12505"></td>
        <td id="LC12505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Elizabeth, agitated and confused, rather _knew_ that she was happy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12506"></td>
        <td id="LC12506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than _felt_ herself to be so; for, besides the immediate embarrassment,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12507"></td>
        <td id="LC12507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there were other evils before her. She anticipated what would be felt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12508"></td>
        <td id="LC12508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the family when her situation became known; she was aware that no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12509"></td>
        <td id="LC12509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one liked him but Jane; and even feared that with the others it was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12510"></td>
        <td id="LC12510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dislike which not all his fortune and consequence might do away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12511"></td>
        <td id="LC12511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12512"></td>
        <td id="LC12512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At night she opened her heart to Jane. Though suspicion was very far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12513"></td>
        <td id="LC12513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from Miss Bennet&#39;s general habits, she was absolutely incredulous here.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12514"></td>
        <td id="LC12514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12515"></td>
        <td id="LC12515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You are joking, Lizzy. This cannot be!--engaged to Mr. Darcy! No, no,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12516"></td>
        <td id="LC12516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you shall not deceive me. I know it to be impossible.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12517"></td>
        <td id="LC12517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12518"></td>
        <td id="LC12518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;This is a wretched beginning indeed! My sole dependence was on you; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12519"></td>
        <td id="LC12519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am sure nobody else will believe me, if you do not. Yet, indeed, I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12520"></td>
        <td id="LC12520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in earnest. I speak nothing but the truth. He still loves me, and we are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12521"></td>
        <td id="LC12521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engaged.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12522"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12523"></td>
        <td id="LC12523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jane looked at her doubtingly. &quot;Oh, Lizzy! it cannot be. I know how much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12524"></td>
        <td id="LC12524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you dislike him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12525"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12526"></td>
        <td id="LC12526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You know nothing of the matter. _That_ is all to be forgot. Perhaps I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12527"></td>
        <td id="LC12527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did not always love him so well as I do now. But in such cases as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12528"></td>
        <td id="LC12528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these, a good memory is unpardonable. This is the last time I shall ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12529"></td>
        <td id="LC12529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remember it myself.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12530"></td>
        <td id="LC12530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12531"></td>
        <td id="LC12531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Bennet still looked all amazement. Elizabeth again, and more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12532"></td>
        <td id="LC12532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seriously assured her of its truth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12533"></td>
        <td id="LC12533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12534"></td>
        <td id="LC12534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good Heaven! can it be really so! Yet now I must believe you,&quot; cried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12535"></td>
        <td id="LC12535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jane. &quot;My dear, dear Lizzy, I would--I do congratulate you--but are you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12536"></td>
        <td id="LC12536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain? forgive the question--are you quite certain that you can be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12537"></td>
        <td id="LC12537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happy with him?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12538"></td>
        <td id="LC12538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12539"></td>
        <td id="LC12539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There can be no doubt of that. It is settled between us already, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12540"></td>
        <td id="LC12540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we are to be the happiest couple in the world. But are you pleased,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12541"></td>
        <td id="LC12541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jane? Shall you like to have such a brother?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12542"></td>
        <td id="LC12542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12543"></td>
        <td id="LC12543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Very, very much. Nothing could give either Bingley or myself more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12544"></td>
        <td id="LC12544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delight. But we considered it, we talked of it as impossible. And do you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12545"></td>
        <td id="LC12545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">really love him quite well enough? Oh, Lizzy! do anything rather than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12546"></td>
        <td id="LC12546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marry without affection. Are you quite sure that you feel what you ought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12547"></td>
        <td id="LC12547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12548"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12549"></td>
        <td id="LC12549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, yes! You will only think I feel _more_ than I ought to do, when I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12550"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12551"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12552"></td>
        <td id="LC12552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What do you mean?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12553"></td>
        <td id="LC12553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12554"></td>
        <td id="LC12554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, I must confess that I love him better than I do Bingley. I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12555"></td>
        <td id="LC12555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afraid you will be angry.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12556"></td>
        <td id="LC12556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12557"></td>
        <td id="LC12557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My dearest sister, now _be_ serious. I want to talk very seriously. Let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12558"></td>
        <td id="LC12558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me know every thing that I am to know, without delay. Will you tell me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12559"></td>
        <td id="LC12559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how long you have loved him?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12560"></td>
        <td id="LC12560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12561"></td>
        <td id="LC12561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It has been coming on so gradually, that I hardly know when it began.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12562"></td>
        <td id="LC12562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But I believe I must date it from my first seeing his beautiful grounds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12563"></td>
        <td id="LC12563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at Pemberley.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12564"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12565"></td>
        <td id="LC12565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Another entreaty that she would be serious, however, produced the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12566"></td>
        <td id="LC12566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desired effect; and she soon satisfied Jane by her solemn assurances</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12567"></td>
        <td id="LC12567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of attachment. When convinced on that article, Miss Bennet had nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12568"></td>
        <td id="LC12568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">further to wish.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12569"></td>
        <td id="LC12569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12570"></td>
        <td id="LC12570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now I am quite happy,&quot; said she, &quot;for you will be as happy as myself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12571"></td>
        <td id="LC12571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I always had a value for him. Were it for nothing but his love of you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12572"></td>
        <td id="LC12572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I must always have esteemed him; but now, as Bingley&#39;s friend and your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12573"></td>
        <td id="LC12573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husband, there can be only Bingley and yourself more dear to me. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12574"></td>
        <td id="LC12574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lizzy, you have been very sly, very reserved with me. How little did you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12575"></td>
        <td id="LC12575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tell me of what passed at Pemberley and Lambton! I owe all that I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12576"></td>
        <td id="LC12576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it to another, not to you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12577"></td>
        <td id="LC12577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12578"></td>
        <td id="LC12578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth told her the motives of her secrecy. She had been unwilling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12579"></td>
        <td id="LC12579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to mention Bingley; and the unsettled state of her own feelings had made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12580"></td>
        <td id="LC12580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her equally avoid the name of his friend. But now she would no longer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12581"></td>
        <td id="LC12581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conceal from her his share in Lydia&#39;s marriage. All was acknowledged,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12582"></td>
        <td id="LC12582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and half the night spent in conversation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12583"></td>
        <td id="LC12583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12584"></td>
        <td id="LC12584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                          * * * * *</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12585"></td>
        <td id="LC12585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12586"></td>
        <td id="LC12586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good gracious!&quot; cried Mrs. Bennet, as she stood at a window the next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12587"></td>
        <td id="LC12587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning, &quot;if that disagreeable Mr. Darcy is not coming here again with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12588"></td>
        <td id="LC12588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our dear Bingley! What can he mean by being so tiresome as to be always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12589"></td>
        <td id="LC12589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming here? I had no notion but he would go a-shooting, or something or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12590"></td>
        <td id="LC12590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other, and not disturb us with his company. What shall we do with him?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12591"></td>
        <td id="LC12591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lizzy, you must walk out with him again, that he may not be in Bingley&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12592"></td>
        <td id="LC12592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12593"></td>
        <td id="LC12593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12594"></td>
        <td id="LC12594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth could hardly help laughing at so convenient a proposal; yet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12595"></td>
        <td id="LC12595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was really vexed that her mother should be always giving him such an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12596"></td>
        <td id="LC12596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">epithet.</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12598"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12599"></td>
        <td id="LC12599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shook hands with such warmth, as left no doubt of his good information;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12600"></td>
        <td id="LC12600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he soon afterwards said aloud, &quot;Mrs. Bennet, have you no more lanes</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12602"></td>
        <td id="LC12602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12603"></td>
        <td id="LC12603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I advise Mr. Darcy, and Lizzy, and Kitty,&quot; said Mrs. Bennet, &quot;to walk</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12604"></td>
        <td id="LC12604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Oakham Mount this morning. It is a nice long walk, and Mr. Darcy has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12605"></td>
        <td id="LC12605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never seen the view.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12606"></td>
        <td id="LC12606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12607"></td>
        <td id="LC12607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It may do very well for the others,&quot; replied Mr. Bingley; &quot;but I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12608"></td>
        <td id="LC12608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sure it will be too much for Kitty. Won&#39;t it, Kitty?&quot; Kitty owned that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12609"></td>
        <td id="LC12609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she had rather stay at home. Darcy professed a great curiosity to see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12610"></td>
        <td id="LC12610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the view from the Mount, and Elizabeth silently consented. As she went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12611"></td>
        <td id="LC12611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up stairs to get ready, Mrs. Bennet followed her, saying:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12612"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12613"></td>
        <td id="LC12613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am quite sorry, Lizzy, that you should be forced to have that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12614"></td>
        <td id="LC12614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disagreeable man all to yourself. But I hope you will not mind it: it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12615"></td>
        <td id="LC12615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all for Jane&#39;s sake, you know; and there is no occasion for talking</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12616"></td>
        <td id="LC12616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him, except just now and then. So, do not put yourself to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12617"></td>
        <td id="LC12617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inconvenience.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12618"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12619"></td>
        <td id="LC12619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">During their walk, it was resolved that Mr. Bennet&#39;s consent should be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12620"></td>
        <td id="LC12620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asked in the course of the evening. Elizabeth reserved to herself the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12621"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12622"></td>
        <td id="LC12622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would take it; sometimes doubting whether all his wealth and grandeur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L12625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12625"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L12626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12626"></td>
        <td id="LC12626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to her sense; and she could no more bear that Mr. Darcy should hear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12627"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L12628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12628"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L12631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12631"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12632"></td>
        <td id="LC12632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the evening, soon after Mr. Bennet withdrew to the library, she saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12633"></td>
        <td id="LC12633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Darcy rise also and follow him, and her agitation on seeing it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12634"></td>
        <td id="LC12634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extreme. She did not fear her father&#39;s opposition, but he was going to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12635"></td>
        <td id="LC12635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be made unhappy; and that it should be through her means--that _she_,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12636"></td>
        <td id="LC12636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his favourite child, should be distressing him by her choice, should be</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12637"></td>
        <td id="LC12637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">filling him with fears and regrets in disposing of her--was a wretched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12639"></td>
        <td id="LC12639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking at him, she was a little relieved by his smile. In a few minutes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12640"></td>
        <td id="LC12640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he approached the table where she was sitting with Kitty; and, while</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12641"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12643"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12644"></td>
        <td id="LC12644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her father was walking about the room, looking grave and anxious.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12645"></td>
        <td id="LC12645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Lizzy,&quot; said he, &quot;what are you doing? Are you out of your senses, to be</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12647"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12648"></td>
        <td id="LC12648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How earnestly did she then wish that her former opinions had been more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12649"></td>
        <td id="LC12649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reasonable, her expressions more moderate! It would have spared her from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12650"></td>
        <td id="LC12650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">explanations and professions which it was exceedingly awkward to give;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12651"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12652"></td>
        <td id="LC12652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of her attachment to Mr. Darcy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12653"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12654"></td>
        <td id="LC12654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Or, in other words, you are determined to have him. He is rich, to be</td>

        <td id="LC12655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sure, and you may have more fine clothes and fine carriages than Jane.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12656"></td>

        <td id="L12657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12657"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12658"></td>
        <td id="LC12658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Have you any other objection,&quot; said Elizabeth, &quot;than your belief of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12659"></td>
        <td id="LC12659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indifference?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12660"></td>
        <td id="LC12660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12661"></td>
        <td id="LC12661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;None at all. We all know him to be a proud, unpleasant sort of man; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12662"></td>
        <td id="LC12662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this would be nothing if you really liked him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12663"></td>
