</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12664"></td>
        <td id="LC12664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I do, I do like him,&quot; she replied, with tears in her eyes, &quot;I love him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12665"></td>
        <td id="LC12665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Indeed he has no improper pride. He is perfectly amiable. You do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12666"></td>
        <td id="LC12666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know what he really is; then pray do not pain me by speaking of him in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12667"></td>
        <td id="LC12667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such terms.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12668"></td>
        <td id="LC12668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12669"></td>
        <td id="LC12669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Lizzy,&quot; said her father, &quot;I have given him my consent. He is the kind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12670"></td>
        <td id="LC12670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of man, indeed, to whom I should never dare refuse anything, which he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12671"></td>
        <td id="LC12671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">condescended to ask. I now give it to _you_, if you are resolved on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12672"></td>
        <td id="LC12672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having him. But let me advise you to think better of it. I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12673"></td>
        <td id="LC12673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your disposition, Lizzy. I know that you could be neither happy nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12674"></td>
        <td id="LC12674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">respectable, unless you truly esteemed your husband; unless you looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12675"></td>
        <td id="LC12675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up to him as a superior. Your lively talents would place you in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12676"></td>
        <td id="LC12676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greatest danger in an unequal marriage. You could scarcely escape</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12677"></td>
        <td id="LC12677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discredit and misery. My child, let me not have the grief of seeing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12678"></td>
        <td id="LC12678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_you_ unable to respect your partner in life. You know not what you are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12679"></td>
        <td id="LC12679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12680"></td>
        <td id="LC12680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12681"></td>
        <td id="LC12681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth, still more affected, was earnest and solemn in her reply; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12682"></td>
        <td id="LC12682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at length, by repeated assurances that Mr. Darcy was really the object</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12683"></td>
        <td id="LC12683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of her choice, by explaining the gradual change which her estimation of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12684"></td>
        <td id="LC12684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him had undergone, relating her absolute certainty that his affection</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12685"></td>
        <td id="LC12685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was not the work of a day, but had stood the test of many months&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12686"></td>
        <td id="LC12686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspense, and enumerating with energy all his good qualities, she did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12687"></td>
        <td id="LC12687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conquer her father&#39;s incredulity, and reconcile him to the match.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12688"></td>
        <td id="LC12688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12689"></td>

        <td id="L12692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12692"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12693"></td>
        <td id="LC12693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To complete the favourable impression, she then told him what Mr. Darcy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12694"></td>
        <td id="LC12694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had voluntarily done for Lydia. He heard her with astonishment.</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12696"></td>
        <td id="LC12696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;This is an evening of wonders, indeed! And so, Darcy did every thing;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12697"></td>
        <td id="LC12697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made up the match, gave the money, paid the fellow&#39;s debts, and got him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12698"></td>
        <td id="LC12698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his commission! So much the better. It will save me a world of trouble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12699"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12768"></td>
        <td id="LC12768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Elizabeth&#39;s spirits soon rising to playfulness again, she wanted Mr.</td>

        <td id="L12769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12769"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12771"></td>
        <td id="LC12771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you had once made a beginning; but what could set you off in the first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12772"></td>
        <td id="LC12772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12773"></td>
        <td id="LC12773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12774"></td>
        <td id="LC12774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I cannot fix on the hour, or the spot, or the look, or the words, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12775"></td>
        <td id="LC12775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laid the foundation. It is too long ago. I was in the middle before I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12776"></td>
        <td id="LC12776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew that I _had_ begun.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12777"></td>
        <td id="LC12777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12778"></td>
        <td id="LC12778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My beauty you had early withstood, and as for my manners--my behaviour</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12779"></td>
        <td id="LC12779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to _you_ was at least always bordering on the uncivil, and I never spoke</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12780"></td>
        <td id="LC12780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to you without rather wishing to give you pain than not. Now be sincere;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12781"></td>
        <td id="LC12781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did you admire me for my impertinence?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12782"></td>
        <td id="LC12782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12783"></td>
        <td id="LC12783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;For the liveliness of your mind, I did.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12784"></td>
        <td id="LC12784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12785"></td>
        <td id="LC12785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You may as well call it impertinence at once. It was very little less.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12786"></td>
        <td id="LC12786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The fact is, that you were sick of civility, of deference, of officious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12787"></td>
        <td id="LC12787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attention. You were disgusted with the women who were always speaking,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12788"></td>
        <td id="LC12788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and looking, and thinking for _your_ approbation alone. I roused, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12789"></td>
        <td id="LC12789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interested you, because I was so unlike _them_. Had you not been really</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12790"></td>
        <td id="LC12790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amiable, you would have hated me for it; but in spite of the pains you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12791"></td>
        <td id="LC12791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took to disguise yourself, your feelings were always noble and just; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12792"></td>
        <td id="LC12792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in your heart, you thoroughly despised the persons who so assiduously</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12793"></td>
        <td id="LC12793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courted you. There--I have saved you the trouble of accounting for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12794"></td>
        <td id="LC12794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it; and really, all things considered, I begin to think it perfectly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12795"></td>
        <td id="LC12795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reasonable. To be sure, you knew no actual good of me--but nobody thinks</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12796"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12798"></td>
        <td id="LC12798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Was there no good in your affectionate behaviour to Jane while she was</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12801"></td>
        <td id="LC12801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Dearest Jane! who could have done less for her? But make a virtue of it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12802"></td>
        <td id="LC12802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by all means. My good qualities are under your protection, and you are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12803"></td>
        <td id="LC12803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to exaggerate them as much as possible; and, in return, it belongs to me</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12804"></td>
        <td id="LC12804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to find occasions for teasing and quarrelling with you as often as may</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12805"></td>
        <td id="LC12805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be; and I shall begin directly by asking you what made you so unwilling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12806"></td>
        <td id="LC12806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to come to the point at last. What made you so shy of me, when you first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12807"></td>
        <td id="LC12807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called, and afterwards dined here? Why, especially, when you called, did</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12820"></td>
        <td id="LC12820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;How unlucky that you should have a reasonable answer to give, and that</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12821"></td>
        <td id="LC12821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should be so reasonable as to admit it! But I wonder how long you</td>

        <td id="L12824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12824"></td>
        <td id="LC12824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thanking you for your kindness to Lydia had certainly great effect.</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC12830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Catherine&#39;s unjustifiable endeavours to separate us were the means of</td>

        <td id="L12834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12834"></td>
        <td id="LC12834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hope, and I was determined at once to know every thing.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12835"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12836"></td>
        <td id="LC12836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Lady Catherine has been of infinite use, which ought to make her happy,</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12841"></td>
        <td id="LC12841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My real purpose was to see _you_, and to judge, if I could, whether I</td>

        <td id="L12842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12842"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L12846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12846"></td>

        <td id="L12853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12853"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12857"></td>
        <td id="LC12857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">From an unwillingness to confess how much her intimacy with Mr. Darcy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12858"></td>
        <td id="LC12858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been over-rated, Elizabeth had never yet answered Mrs. Gardiner&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12859"></td>
        <td id="LC12859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long letter; but now, having _that_ to communicate which she knew would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12860"></td>
        <td id="LC12860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be most welcome, she was almost ashamed to find that her uncle and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12861"></td>
        <td id="LC12861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aunt had already lost three days of happiness, and immediately wrote as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12862"></td>
        <td id="LC12862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follows:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12863"></td>
        <td id="LC12863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12864"></td>
        <td id="LC12864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I would have thanked you before, my dear aunt, as I ought to have done,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12865"></td>
        <td id="LC12865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for your long, kind, satisfactory, detail of particulars; but to say the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12866"></td>
        <td id="LC12866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truth, I was too cross to write. You supposed more than really existed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12867"></td>
        <td id="LC12867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But _now_ suppose as much as you choose; give a loose rein to your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12868"></td>
        <td id="LC12868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fancy, indulge your imagination in every possible flight which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12869"></td>
        <td id="LC12869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subject will afford, and unless you believe me actually married, you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12870"></td>
        <td id="LC12870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot greatly err. You must write again very soon, and praise him a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12871"></td>
        <td id="LC12871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great deal more than you did in your last. I thank you, again and again,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12872"></td>
        <td id="LC12872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for not going to the Lakes. How could I be so silly as to wish it! Your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12873"></td>
        <td id="LC12873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">idea of the ponies is delightful. We will go round the Park every day. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12874"></td>
        <td id="LC12874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am the happiest creature in the world. Perhaps other people have said so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12875"></td>
        <td id="LC12875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before, but not one with such justice. I am happier even than Jane; she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12876"></td>
        <td id="LC12876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only smiles, I laugh. Mr. Darcy sends you all the love in the world that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12877"></td>
        <td id="LC12877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he can spare from me. You are all to come to Pemberley at Christmas.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12878"></td>
        <td id="LC12878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yours, etc.&quot;</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12880"></td>
        <td id="LC12880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Darcy&#39;s letter to Lady Catherine was in a different style; and still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12881"></td>
        <td id="LC12881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">different from either was what Mr. Bennet sent to Mr. Collins, in reply</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12885"></td>
        <td id="LC12885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12886"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12887"></td>
        <td id="LC12887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be the wife of Mr. Darcy. Console Lady Catherine as well as you can.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12888"></td>
        <td id="LC12888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, if I were you, I would stand by the nephew. He has more to give.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12889"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12891"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12892"></td>
        <td id="LC12892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Bingley&#39;s congratulations to her brother, on his approaching</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12893"></td>
        <td id="LC12893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marriage, were all that was affectionate and insincere. She wrote even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12894"></td>
        <td id="LC12894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Jane on the occasion, to express her delight, and repeat all her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12895"></td>
        <td id="LC12895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">former professions of regard. Jane was not deceived, but she was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12896"></td>
        <td id="LC12896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">affected; and though feeling no reliance on her, could not help writing</td>

        <td id="L12898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12898"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12899"></td>
        <td id="LC12899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The joy which Miss Darcy expressed on receiving similar information,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12900"></td>
        <td id="LC12900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was as sincere as her brother&#39;s in sending it. Four sides of paper were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12901"></td>
        <td id="LC12901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">insufficient to contain all her delight, and all her earnest desire of</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12902"></td>

        <td id="L12903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12903"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12904"></td>
        <td id="LC12904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Before any answer could arrive from Mr. Collins, or any congratulations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12905"></td>
        <td id="LC12905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Elizabeth from his wife, the Longbourn family heard that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12906"></td>
        <td id="LC12906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Collinses were come themselves to Lucas Lodge. The reason of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12907"></td>
        <td id="LC12907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sudden removal was soon evident. Lady Catherine had been rendered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12908"></td>
        <td id="LC12908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so exceedingly angry by the contents of her nephew&#39;s letter, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12909"></td>
        <td id="LC12909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Charlotte, really rejoicing in the match, was anxious to get away till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12910"></td>
        <td id="LC12910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the storm was blown over. At such a moment, the arrival of her friend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12911"></td>
        <td id="LC12911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a sincere pleasure to Elizabeth, though in the course of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12912"></td>
        <td id="LC12912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meetings she must sometimes think the pleasure dearly bought, when she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12913"></td>
        <td id="LC12913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw Mr. Darcy exposed to all the parading and obsequious civility of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12914"></td>
        <td id="LC12914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her husband. He bore it, however, with admirable calmness. He could even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12915"></td>
        <td id="LC12915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">listen to Sir William Lucas, when he complimented him on carrying away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12916"></td>
        <td id="LC12916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the brightest jewel of the country, and expressed his hopes of their all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12917"></td>
        <td id="LC12917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meeting frequently at St. James&#39;s, with very decent composure. If he did</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12918"></td>
        <td id="LC12918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shrug his shoulders, it was not till Sir William was out of sight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12919"></td>
        <td id="LC12919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12920"></td>
        <td id="LC12920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Phillips&#39;s vulgarity was another, and perhaps a greater, tax on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12921"></td>
        <td id="LC12921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forbearance; and though Mrs. Phillips, as well as her sister, stood in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12922"></td>
        <td id="LC12922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too much awe of him to speak with the familiarity which Bingley&#39;s good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12923"></td>
        <td id="LC12923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">humour encouraged, yet, whenever she _did_ speak, she must be vulgar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12924"></td>
        <td id="LC12924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nor was her respect for him, though it made her more quiet, at all</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12925"></td>
        <td id="LC12925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likely to make her more elegant. Elizabeth did all she could to shield</td>

        <td id="LC12926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him from the frequent notice of either, and was ever anxious to keep</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12930"></td>
        <td id="LC12930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">added to the hope of the future; and she looked forward with delight to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12931"></td>
        <td id="LC12931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the time when they should be removed from society so little pleasing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12932"></td>
        <td id="LC12932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to either, to all the comfort and elegance of their family party at</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC12933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pemberley.</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12937"></td>
        <td id="LC12937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Chapter 61</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12938"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12939"></td>
        <td id="LC12939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12940"></td>
        <td id="LC12940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Happy for all her maternal feelings was the day on which Mrs. Bennet got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12941"></td>
        <td id="LC12941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rid of her two most deserving daughters. With what delighted pride</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12942"></td>
        <td id="LC12942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she afterwards visited Mrs. Bingley, and talked of Mrs. Darcy, may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12943"></td>
        <td id="LC12943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be guessed. I wish I could say, for the sake of her family, that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12944"></td>
        <td id="LC12944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accomplishment of her earnest desire in the establishment of so many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12945"></td>
        <td id="LC12945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of her children produced so happy an effect as to make her a sensible,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12946"></td>
        <td id="LC12946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amiable, well-informed woman for the rest of her life; though perhaps it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12947"></td>
        <td id="LC12947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was lucky for her husband, who might not have relished domestic felicity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12948"></td>
        <td id="LC12948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in so unusual a form, that she still was occasionally nervous and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12949"></td>
        <td id="LC12949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invariably silly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12950"></td>
        <td id="LC12950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12951"></td>
        <td id="LC12951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Bennet missed his second daughter exceedingly; his affection for her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12952"></td>
        <td id="LC12952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drew him oftener from home than anything else could do. He delighted in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12953"></td>
        <td id="LC12953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going to Pemberley, especially when he was least expected.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12954"></td>
        <td id="LC12954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12955"></td>
        <td id="LC12955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Bingley and Jane remained at Netherfield only a twelvemonth. So near</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12956"></td>
        <td id="LC12956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a vicinity to her mother and Meryton relations was not desirable even to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12957"></td>
        <td id="LC12957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_his_ easy temper, or _her_ affectionate heart. The darling wish of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12958"></td>
        <td id="LC12958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sisters was then gratified; he bought an estate in a neighbouring county</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12959"></td>
        <td id="LC12959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Derbyshire, and Jane and Elizabeth, in addition to every other source</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12960"></td>
        <td id="LC12960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of happiness, were within thirty miles of each other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12961"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12962"></td>
        <td id="LC12962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Kitty, to her very material advantage, spent the chief of her time with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12963"></td>
        <td id="LC12963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her two elder sisters. In society so superior to what she had generally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12964"></td>
        <td id="LC12964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">known, her improvement was great. She was not of so ungovernable a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12965"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12966"></td>
        <td id="LC12966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she became, by proper attention and management, less irritable, less</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12967"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC12970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">balls and young men, her father would never consent to her going.</td>

        <td id="L12971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12971"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12972"></td>
        <td id="LC12972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mary was the only daughter who remained at home; and she was necessarily</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12980"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="LC12993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wickham, you must be very happy. It is a great comfort to have you so</td>

        <td id="LC12994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rich, and when you have nothing else to do, I hope you will think of us.</td>

        <td id="LC12995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am sure Wickham would like a place at court very much, and I do not</td>

</td>

        <td id="L13002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13002"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13019"></td>
        <td id="LC13019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Though Darcy could never receive _him_ at Pemberley, yet, for</td>

        <td id="L13021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13021"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L13025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13025"></td>
        <td id="LC13025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13026"></td>
        <td id="LC13026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Bingley was very deeply mortified by Darcy&#39;s marriage; but as she</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13027"></td>

        <td id="L13028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13028"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC13032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pemberley was now Georgiana&#39;s home; and the attachment of the sisters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13033"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13035"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC13039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasantry. Her mind received knowledge which had never before fallen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13040"></td>
        <td id="LC13040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in her way. By Elizabeth&#39;s instructions, she began to comprehend that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13041"></td>
        <td id="LC13041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a woman may take liberties with her husband which a brother will not</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13042"></td>
        <td id="LC13042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always allow in a sister more than ten years younger than himself.</td>

        <td id="L13043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13043"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13044"></td>
        <td id="LC13044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lady Catherine was extremely indignant on the marriage of her nephew;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13045"></td>
        <td id="LC13045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and as she gave way to all the genuine frankness of her character in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13046"></td>
        <td id="LC13046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her reply to the letter which announced its arrangement, she sent him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13047"></td>
        <td id="LC13047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">language so very abusive, especially of Elizabeth, that for some time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13048"></td>
        <td id="LC13048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all intercourse was at an end. But at length, by Elizabeth&#39;s persuasion,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13049"></td>
        <td id="LC13049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was prevailed on to overlook the offence, and seek a reconciliation;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13050"></td>
        <td id="LC13050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, after a little further resistance on the part of his aunt, her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13051"></td>
        <td id="LC13051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resentment gave way, either to her affection for him, or her curiosity</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13052"></td>
        <td id="LC13052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to see how his wife conducted herself; and she condescended to wait</td>

        <td id="LC13053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on them at Pemberley, in spite of that pollution which its woods had</td>

        <td id="L13054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13054"></td>
        <td id="LC13054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received, not merely from the presence of such a mistress, but the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13145"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13220"></td>
        <td id="LC13220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">access to or distributing Project Gutenberg-tm electronic works provided</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13221"></td>
        <td id="LC13221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13222"></td>
        <td id="LC13222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13223"></td>
        <td id="LC13223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">- You pay a royalty fee of 20% of the gross profits you derive from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13224"></td>
        <td id="LC13224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     the use of Project Gutenberg-tm works calculated using the method</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13225"></td>
        <td id="LC13225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     you already use to calculate your applicable taxes.  The fee is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13226"></td>
        <td id="LC13226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     owed to the owner of the Project Gutenberg-tm trademark, but he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13227"></td>
        <td id="LC13227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     has agreed to donate royalties under this paragraph to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13228"></td>
        <td id="LC13228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation.  Royalty payments</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13229"></td>
        <td id="LC13229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     must be paid within 60 days following each date on which you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13230"></td>
        <td id="LC13230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     prepare (or are legally required to prepare) your periodic tax</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13231"></td>
        <td id="LC13231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     returns.  Royalty payments should be clearly marked as such and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13232"></td>
        <td id="LC13232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     sent to the Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13233"></td>
        <td id="LC13233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     address specified in Section 4, &quot;Information about donations to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13234"></td>
        <td id="LC13234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     the Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13235"></td>
        <td id="LC13235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13236"></td>
        <td id="LC13236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">- You provide a full refund of any money paid by a user who notifies</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13237"></td>
        <td id="LC13237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     you in writing (or by e-mail) within 30 days of receipt that s/he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13238"></td>
        <td id="LC13238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     does not agree to the terms of the full Project Gutenberg-tm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13239"></td>
        <td id="LC13239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     License.  You must require such a user to return or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13240"></td>

        <td id="L13324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13324"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13325"></td>
        <td id="LC13325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13326"></td>
        <td id="LC13326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Project Gutenberg-tm is synonymous with the free distribution of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13327"></td>
        <td id="LC13327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">electronic works in formats readable by the widest variety of computers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13328"></td>
        <td id="LC13328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">including obsolete, old, middle-aged and new computers.  It exists</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13329"></td>
        <td id="LC13329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because of the efforts of hundreds of volunteers and donations from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13330"></td>
        <td id="LC13330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people in all walks of life.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13331"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13334"></td>
        <td id="LC13334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">goals and ensuring that the Project Gutenberg-tm collection will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13335"></td>

        <td id="L13336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13336"></td>
        <td id="LC13336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation was created to provide a secure</td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13380"></td>
        <td id="LC13380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Foundation is committed to complying with the laws regulating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13381"></td>
        <td id="LC13381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charities and charitable donations in all 50 states of the United</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13382"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13383"></td>
        <td id="LC13383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considerable effort, much paperwork and many fees to meet and keep up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13384"></td>
        <td id="LC13384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with these requirements.  We do not solicit donations in locations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13385"></td>
        <td id="LC13385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where we have not received written confirmation of compliance.  To</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L13386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13386"></td>
        <td id="LC13386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">SEND DONATIONS or determine the status of compliance for any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13387"></td>
        <td id="LC13387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular state visit http://pglaf.org</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13388"></td>
        <td id="LC13388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13389"></td>
        <td id="LC13389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While we cannot and do not solicit contributions from states where we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13390"></td>

</td>

        <td id="LC13394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">International donations are gratefully accepted, but we cannot make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13395"></td>
        <td id="LC13395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any statements concerning tax treatment of donations received from</td>

        <td id="L13404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13404"></td>
        <td id="LC13404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Section 5.  General Information About Project Gutenberg-tm electronic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13405"></td>
        <td id="LC13405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">works.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13406"></td>
        <td id="LC13406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13407"></td>
        <td id="LC13407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor Michael S. Hart is the originator of the Project Gutenberg-tm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13408"></td>
        <td id="LC13408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concept of a library of electronic works that could be freely shared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13409"></td>
        <td id="LC13409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with anyone.  For thirty years, he produced and distributed Project</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13410"></td>
        <td id="LC13410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gutenberg-tm eBooks with only a loose network of volunteer support.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13411"></td>
        <td id="LC13411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13412"></td>
        <td id="LC13412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13413"></td>
        <td id="LC13413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Project Gutenberg-tm eBooks are often created from several printed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13414"></td>
        <td id="LC13414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">editions, all of which are confirmed as Public Domain in the U.S.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13415"></td>
        <td id="LC13415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unless a copyright notice is included.  Thus, we do not necessarily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13416"></td>
        <td id="LC13416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keep eBooks in compliance with any particular paper edition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13417"></td>
        <td id="LC13417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13418"></td>
        <td id="LC13418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13419"></td>
        <td id="LC13419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most people start at our Web site which has the main PG search facility:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13420"></td>
        <td id="LC13420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13421"></td>
        <td id="LC13421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     http://www.gutenberg.org</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13422"></td>
        <td id="LC13422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13423"></td>
        <td id="LC13423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This Web site includes information about Project Gutenberg-tm,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13424"></td>
        <td id="LC13424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">including how to make donations to the Project Gutenberg Literary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13425"></td>
        <td id="LC13425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Archive Foundation, how to help produce our new eBooks, and how to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
</table>
